The game has no big issues other then some hitbox issues but other then that if you like killing and eating/wearing monsters then the best game for you is this one.

its not the monsters that are being hunted.. its the monsters doing the hunting )BUT!deviljoh... he's a massive t rex basically whos hitbox is an entire area and nothing at the same time depending if hes attacking you or your attacking himhes apparently meant to keep fighting when wounded but this runs across entire maps barely even fightingbroken monster&amp there are alot of people who play this and join your Sessions and hunts and cannot play for their life

+Challenging+Fun with friends+Good Graphic+Gameplay+Free DLC+Unique Collaboration Experience+50hr+ contents+Keep updating+finally 29 9 support+Master Rank coming soon The armor isnt as good looking as previous MH minor problem after alt tab the game Failed to join quest Story RNG Grind

Product received for free. I played around 300 hours on the PS4 and hundreds upon hundreds on the previous titles. I absolutely adore the MH series and this game is no exception. There are a great many things better and worse than in previous titles but this one is by far the most polished and easiest to get into compared to the other titles. If you love grinding and doing what is pretty much a series of boss fights then I say go for it.

Great Monster Hunter game as always. Released with some bugs but they will get fixed very soon. Dont be afraid do play this game for 15+ hours Monster has alaways been hard to start. If you are an beginner to the series give it a try with at least 15+ hours otherwise you wont see how the game really is.

"I've been playing every single Monster Hunter game since ""Monster Hunter Freedom"" for PSP and not a single one was even remotely bad.Monster Hunter World is another very good game with lots of changes to make the game even better.Watch a video / stream and see if this type of game is for you if it is definitely give this one a try."

If you're into grinding and farming then this game is for you. This is the best monster hunter game mechanics wise though still lacks contents. I wish Icebourn would solve that problem. It's totally addictive and fun to play if you have the patience9/10 recommended

Pretty fun game. It's a bit grindy at some points but no worse than some other games I've played. At the moment I have 75 hours in game and I've crashed twice. Not a terrible ratio but a little frustrating when it occurs. There's a modding community that makes some nice convenience of life mods. I reccomend the Soverign Light Pillars mod for anyone new so you can see all the Monster Break parts. They can be kinda hard to see but with the mod it adds light pillars to them for easy spotting.

This game usually find its home on nintendo consoles I am happy this exists for other consoles and pc. While the usual monster hunter games have things that i prefer than in world I am happy with world and what it has over the nintendo ones. Somewhere between monster hunter games like generations ultimate and world is the perfect monster hunter.

good game two legged cats with mallets they speak dragons combat loot so much loot. graphics are awesome multiplayer option is amazing. need more stable connection in some of the multiplayer instances but thats about it get the game if you like two legged speaking cats with giant mallets.

No ultrawide 21 9 Support. Game needs to reset if you want to change the resolution. Xbox one controller stopped functioning after few game reboots. Last but not least... DENUVO.Good job.Now after months they added the 21 9 and many features.. well thanks! finally

Definitely not the game for everyone but I can say with confident that this is one of the best game I have played so far. Every fight is a thrille. The story may not be the best but the gameplay is god damn good. Lots of free content keep getting given out make me probably can never see the sun again.

Product received for free. Hated the DS versions of this game. Never thought I would like this one. So glad I got into it now. Super fun very challenging BUT very rewarding and very satisfying.Will purchase as a gift for friends.This game was gifted to my by friends.

Being new to MH series gave me unsettling moments while playing the game but every since i learned how to play it correctly you'll just keep on exterminating those monster for materials and creating weapons armors to your liking &lt 3Overall satisfied

This game is awesome. There are so many thinks you can do to improve your character and skills.The game is challenging and addictive.The only bad thing that i have experienced are a lot of network problems.At least Capcom is trying to fix those.(Sorry for my bad englisch D )

It is my first seris of the monster hunter game and had some worries before buying this game. As soon as i hunted a first boss monster my worries were already gone and a special feeling excited me which the game industry nowadays have been failing to make me feel that way. This game is a must buy game if you want to feel becoming better overcome difficulties and great achivement.

This was everything i wanted in a Monster Hunter port to the PC. Some of the more annoying grind mechanics (gathering fishing etc) have been streamlined and the combat is as complex and rewarding as i remember from the PSP days. Be aware the first hour of game play is positively the longest and most drawn out tutorial in existence but push through the first three Hunter ranks and you'll be golden. 10/10 would spend 2 hours designing my perfect cat fren again.

Game is absolutely great! Ultra wide screen support should not be a problem at 2018 but somehow it is. Fix that and we have real jewel here (and also a positive review)Edit 22.1.2019 Ultra wide support is here! Can't really complain about anything else )

There's nothing quite like dc'ing from every single mission nor with horrible pc optimization where it doesn't use my gpu at all and instead uses 100% of my cpu. Nice to see capcom learn from their mistakes like mvcu who would've thought technical issues can kill a game?Edit Game still isn't optimized but it is a lot of fun with friends.

Great community. Fun both single player and with friends. Beginning mid and end game are all great. There's always something to grind for. Having said that while the grind can get a bit tedious at the time you'll never want to resort to multi tasking on your second monitor to keep you entertained while you grind. The only other downside is occasional random DC's.

"The game is pefect. Good graphics sound and monster designs.There is one glaring problem... the freakin' handler! I swear Capcom created her just to annoy the player. Constantly nagging taking credit and yelling ""PARTNER.""I would happily buy a DLC that omits her from the game. 100/10 Game of The Year 2018"

This is my first Monster Hunter experience I've been missing out! It's a great game played solo or with others. The environments are well done and enjoyable to travel through. Every fight feels just challenging enough to keep the game engaging and there are plenty of strategies to try out so combat never feels stale.

"It was a rough launch(did you ever heard of ""For Honor""?) but finally stable for multiplayer experience. I understand why so many people are mad because we have to wait more than half a year for this port and they even said it takes time to make something right(which it isn't) but now we have it the first and only MH on PC. The game is great even for single play/solo and now multiplayer are working(*but mind the out date/old fashion lobby though)."

Good game you get to explode things with bombs and explosives. Sleep best thing ever.EDIT Also having the ability to kill your friends when they first start playing the game. I've done that and it felt great because he ran headfirst into the barrel bomb and boom.

A game about hunting monsters. When you first start out every monster scares you. By the end of it YOU are the monster. Single player is pretty vanilla but the co op makes it enjoyable. The real fun begins once you reach the endgame. There is grind but it's the fun type of grind because you're helping other people and being awesome.Pro tip for new players Don't attack monsters with your face.

With the added 21 9 support the game looks great on my monitor! A very fun game with countless ways to play and many hours of fun to be had. It can get a bit repetitive after a while but any game you can sink over 100 hours into for the price of a normal game is worth it in my book.

This was my first Monster Hunter experience and I had a great time.Beware the game can be a bit challeging at first but nothing a bit of practice cant solve.This game has the perfect formula to keep you playing over and over despite fighting the same monsters. Lots of weapons to pick different biomes fighting against multiple monsters and many other variables will make every hunt a new experience.Monster Hunter has a fame on its own and if you dont know why you should try this game.

You hit a chicken which armor isn't even good You make the chicken's weapon and it isn't even good Fight a spiked thing and it one shots you Make the armor and you can one shot the chicken Then you get one shot by a fire lion Armor doesn't helpWriting this I have no idea where I was going. Nor do I know what I'm doing still playing this game.

Yeah it's worth the money. If you're really interested watch videos on the mechanics of the game b/c there is a learning curve to this game and 1 review can't help you out with that curve. Watch youtube videos on each weapon and pick a cool one.I started with Sword and Shield then pretty much used every other shield type weapon and I've been loving Charge Blade recently

I honestly like all the Monster Hunter games since it was in the psp console. This Monster Hunter World really has cool mechanics added on it and the way it fights it's just so good. More monsters and collaborations on future would make this game very very exciting and interesting. I highly recommend this game for people out there thinking if this game is worth buying the answer ia YES. Get it and try Hunters

A fine addition to the Monster Hunter franchise. The visuals are wonderful and the gameplay is solid. My only complaints were the connectivity issues when the game first released but those have since been resolved. Also there seems to be a lack of monster variety but that should be solved with the upcoming expansion. 9/10 would recommend!

"Monster Hunter at its finest. Currently one of the only games I ""go back to"" from time to time for events and for good reason. This game is worth every penny especially considering all the AAA/microtransaction issues that the gaming industry is facing right now. One of the few franchises that still give us hope for an honest gaming era.10/10 HR999 here I come"

amazing game. defineatly one of my favorites if not my favorite. outstanding graphics and a good challange. I just wish it was less expensive and had a few more big randomised fights. Very addictive. The mechanics are super fun and the grind doesn't feel unbearable. Have had no trouble with multiplayer. Sometimes I'll lose my online session if I alt tab but I'm just careful not to do that while I'm actually on a quest with other people so it's a non issue.

I love the game. Played about 150 hours on Xbox when it was initially released. And recently started again on PC mainly because it loads a lot faster with the SSD. I will say that Xbox online session seems to more stable I have only drop once during mission in months. Where on steam I been disconnected during mission once a week. Oh It's not that I got booted as in these cases the monster and other players usually freeze for 30 seconds before I got disconnect.

I love this game grab some friends though it can be a slog to play solo. its grindy but its that fun grind. you really get the sense that your working towards a bigger goal and when you accomplish that goal (killing a monster you've been struggling with finally getting your armor and stats exactly the way you want them) the payoff feels immeasurably good.

This game is the greatest middle finger to all the money grubbing AAA games out there. It's reasonably priced it's intelligent it gives freedom to your epic adventure and last but not least this game doesn't have any loot box and micro transaction nonsense!Great work Larian Studios. This game will go down as a cult classic!!

9.8/10 hands down I may give it a 10 but have yet to get to play the full version. However This game is amazing I love all the tactical strategies that you can make depending on party make up and types of magic used. This game truely incorporates individual choice in play style which is great for team building and the Dungeon creation is sure to give me many more hours of game time after I complete the main story.

Amazing game with great attention to detail that rewards exploration. Multiple ways to progress and no handholding.Best RPG out there in my opinion. Just some minor bugs here and there so far but nothing game breaking. 9/10 10 when the bugs get fixed.

damn I grew up with this kind of RPG and I love it.spent way to many hours in games like never winter nights and pillars of eternity and I'm sure this game will devour them as well.although I spent only 2 5 hours in this game I'm sure this will be in my top list in a few weeks.Edit I hit the 206 hours mark and still going and most hours played in my list P DAMN I love this game

I played only arena (pvp) for a while but i can tell that Source points are OP having an option to play without them would be really nice. Camera needs some getting used to and they need to fix the chat because if its your turn and u start writting in the chat ur character starts to do weird things (keyboard shotcuts are still active). Other than that game runs very smoothly for EA game 60fps without any problems on ultra. Will update this when i find more to say about it.

10 out of 10!!!!!! This is a great RPG. I highly recomend this game to anyone looking for a new RPG. Divinity has a good story action magic and game play that actually makes you get involved with the game to solve puzzles/mysteries/winning intense combat when outnumbered. Looking forward to see what happens with the rest of the game!

Do you like customization?Do you like a good story?Do you like making your own story?Do you like challenges?Do you want to play the best RPG on the market?Then this game is for you! I've already put in 28 Hours and I've barely scratched the surface of the story.

A fantastic game built upon the source engine that provides thousands upon thousands of hours of endless content and things to do through user modification and the steam workshop. The game is phenomenal and very fun to play with friends either on a private server making use of mods you and your buddies have downloaded or on matchmaking as they're are plenty of different game modes to play. The game is also incredibly fun on singleplayer through the endless amount of things you can do.

There's many things to do in Gmod Make funny/cool poses having NPCs fight each other downloading fun maps off of the workshop and just having overall fun. If you just wanna lay back and have a fun time get Gmod. However I'm not too much of a fan of TTT or Prop Hunt but that's just my opinion. I rate this game 8/10.

This is literally one of the best games that never get old nor get boring.Even with its half life 2 graphics its still a overwhemingly perfect game for when your bored or just want to make amazing contraptions! or you want to mess around and shoot a ton of random npc's like me v(dont believe me? Just play it yourself or watch other people play it i guarantee after a few hours of seeing what this game can offer you you might really want to try it out for yourself too v)

This game is clearly my favorite game it is amazing. I am into these 2D games like Terraria but this is just better than the other ones (like starbound which i also like). Don't listen to people who compare it to Minecraft because it is much much different!

This game brings some of my most creative side out and i'm pretty thankful for it since i like to get caught up in doing my own work. I tend to get carried away when i'm only doing a few houses and stuff The HUD may seem weird to some people but you tend to get used to that pretty quickly. You may seem lost on what to do but if you talk to the Guide (Right click him) He can give you advice that helps you out through out the entire game.

Want a game like minecraft in a 2D style with more bosses and tons of more item while still manitaining that crafting experience? This game is what you're looking for.I always pick this up every year and start a fresh character playing again and absolutely become addicted to it everytime. While the startup is slow (just like Minecraft mind you) when you start progressing through the game it really speeds up.

This game shows people what minecraft could be. Minecraft is a great sandbox game but has nothing beyond being sandbox. Terraria takes that gameplay style and gives it a story and sense of progression/goals. If you were interested in Minecraft at any point but stopped because you got bored this game is for you. Would recommend to anyone though adult or child (though if you're really bad at video games then you might have trouble completing it).

One of the best time wasters i can think of. There is so much to do in this game if you like crafting loot and killing bosses. there isnt much to do in the end game really unless you want to put restrictions on yourself to make the game tougher. 9/10 )Also they are always working on updates. this game has been out for quite a while but they are still adding new cool stuff!

Started by making a base in a tree. Got confused on what to do and dropped the game.A year or two later I open the game back up look up a guide start a new world and fought and died on my way to the wall of flesh then the three mechanical bosses then plantera then all the way to the solar pillars and fought against the moon lord and beat him first try with a lot of cheesing the game.Overall good game.Side note Duke Fishron.

Almost 300 hours and counting. If you are looking for a game to relax and enjoy alone or with friends then this will do it.Terraria take the feel of minecraft and puts it into a 2d platform. It also expands upon the build aspect by letting you create a home base and recruiting townsfolk. There are many different biomes with unquie monsters to fight both above ground and below.On top of all that the dev team has release so many updates that it is worth the full price let along a sale price.

This is a very fun game and I reccomend it very much. I've had such a fun time playing it and Terraria can be played by all ages the game isn't too violent and there is a Turn off blood option even without turning this off the blood is not very visible.

Let me just start out by saying that Terraria is one of the best games I have had the privledge to get my hands on. When I first started it I felt indifferent about the game and it seemed rather boring. But then I dipped my toe in a little deeper and a monster dragged me under until I was fully submerged in the most beautiful fun and exciting experience I have ever had. This game is amazing. 11/10

one of the best sandbox games out there D i love its style and its game play DIf you are a fan of 2D games this is a must play game Di enjoyed every hour played it and i still do D8/10 Fallen Approves!Update for 1.3This game never stops to amazes me!!The number of items added and the overall gameplay you can dump on this game is unbelivable!!!!!

Ah... The one game refered to as a rival of Minecraft.... How much I LOVE this game. Weither its from the hundreds of items and mobs to find or the thousands of things to build its great. I honestly can't express how many hours I've had fun on this game solo or with friends. I 100% recomend this game!

If you are a grown up person and value something more than graphics in a game definetly pick this. The amount of fun solo/coop content this game have is astounding. If you already played years ago there's always a lot of new challenging stuff when you come back.

This Game is very good!Its very balanced between fighting exploring and building!Because of the huge amount of possibilities (e.g. Class Playthrough Multiplayer Going Derp Mode Building big and Synergie tests) I am never getting tired of this game.For 10$/ (even less if you wait for steam sale) this game is totally worth to buy!It also updates alot giving alot of new content on each update!

If 2D doesn't turn you off this is more than worth the price. Ontop of that it's on 60 75% sales quite often.Really no reason not to own it unless this is totally not your cup of tea.Not much more to say. Everything it does it does well. Great example of how game development developers should be. This was a great game when it came out and there have been so many free content updates adding over 2 3 times what was in the base game.9.5/10 0.5 for the dungeon gaurdions when you play hardcore )

This game is insanely unique interesting and your possibilities are unlimited! It may not be focused on building but heck it does it well. Even though im talking about building there is much more. All the bosses are creative! Everything about them! As well as the weapons. And if you are a bit stuck you can always search youtube or the terraria wiki. Honestly this is literally the best game i played in my life.11/10

I like this game. It's the next best thing to Minecraft but cheaper better and more. Loads of bosses and enemies to fight swords and tools to craft massive terrain to explore there's so much to do. It will take a very long time until you get bored because it's the best game ever. D

This is an awesome game that brings out a person's creativity! The only limit is your imagnation (and the size of the world that you have chosen).I highly recommend this game to anyone who seeks adventure likes to fight zombies (&amp some awesome bosses) and has a need to build amazing things. Just when you think you have unlocked every secret in the game you find a new one!

I've had dozens of hours on this title and I do have to say Terraria never gets old. Never.I have played this since around 1.1 and I've been a devoted fan since then. And with time this game can only get better.Best played with a group of friends you would be surprised what a group of idiots and dynamite can do.

Been playing Terraria for years now both alone and with my little brother. Together we've probably banked roughly 1500 hours. Challenging exciting addictive and super re playable. I've made hundreds of worlds and every time I do it's just as fun as the first time. We can't wait for the next installation from Re Logic! I absolutely recommend this game to everyone and their grammy.

An Incredible game Its addicting becuase theres allways something to look forward too and your allways eagar to explore the world Definetley reccomended for anyone looking for a cheap game that can provide hundreds of hours of fun And that passes the time.

This game is NOT a minecraft ripoff it actually came first! Go ahead and check anyways this game is soooooo much better. More weapons armor bosses and litterally everything else. This game is just better and its cheaper too! And that dosent mean it loses quality far from it! Sure minecraft is 3 D but terraria is better with 2 D. Can you imagine 3 D terraria I cant. So I say get the game!

The new districts civics and revamped wonder system are great additions to this wonderful franchise. My only complaint is that Firaxis needs to iron out the various bugs and problems that have been here since launch.Final Verdict It's a really good game but if you can stand to wait you could wait till they fix the issues before you buy.

The game is very nice I had to get used to the new interface but the district system is absolutely fantastic in my opinion.Religion victories are a bit hard in this game though and they should lower the infantry production cost or make their strenght slightly better because right now AT Crew has the same strenght is cheaper to produce and has a bonus versus horses. I would give this game a 8.5/10

Going from Civ 5 to Civ 6 is like upgrading to the new iPhone you essentially get the same thing couple of cool new features better looking design but a hefty price tag to wrap it all upHowever any Civ fan should definately give this a go but any new players should get Civ 5 to try out for a much cheaper price

This is something of a change form the older civ titles. For the most part it works out very nicely. The're some roughness around the edges but I think in a short amount of time these will be addressed. With some dlc and expansions the game could be some thing special in the civ universe. Some of the new features make great additions. I have been trying to play civ v and civ vi and I keep noticing that I prefer Civ VI even though V is a much more complete game.

After 1000 hours of Civ5 I've been waiting for this eagerly since it was announced. I played my first game on Prince and used it to learn some of the new mechanics but never felt sufficiently challenged by the AI so I cranked it up to King for my second match. My empire was all rubble from Brazil's conquering army within the first 50 turns T_T10/10 Would become enslaved by Pedro again (and probably will).

Brilliant. Feels like there is even more going on than in civ 5. Uses tile improvements by builders aswell as a new district system to unlock specialised buildings.Cultural advances are researched just like science. In mid late game you can bundle units together into a corps (2) or an army (3).When you level culture up high enough you can change your government and use cards based on your cultural research to aim your civ at specific improvements.

Another excellent entry in the Civ series. The addition of Districs to Cities make the city management and planning aspects of the game more interesting.Religion is now more enjoyable to persue as a victory condition.Entire game has gorgeous graphics throughout..

It takes some getting used to as its a completely new format compared to Civ V once youve played a few hours though you start getting used to all the new functions gfx seemed a bit cartoony at first but if you look closer theres far more detail than previous games all in all a really good game but does take some getting used to if you're an old school player like me )

"It's drug totally drug. If your boss teachers or parrents were able to keep you from any of the series of Sid Meier's Civilization please you should listen to them. Once you unfortunately touch it even the God couldn't stop your clicking on ""next turn""...Love yourself Enjoy the life and let you and Civilization stay isolated..."

i like the game its very smooth running even on windows 7 (it's designed to run on 10) the only problem ive found thus far is the other players declare war on you when all you are doing is trying your damndest not to get murdered when you get two barbarian encampments spawn right outside your gates! are Barbarians a city state ally of the AI players now? and if so why do they want to me over by pillaging me when ive not met a city state in this map yet!

At 22 00 Me Mom just one more turn!Mom Just don't stay up too late okay?At 24 00 Mom You are still here?!Me Just one more turn!3 00 in the next day Mom GO TO YOUR BED!!Me Just one more TURN!! pleaseAt 13 00 in the next day Mom YOU HA Me JUST ONE MORE TURN DAMN IT!...And I'm still here ._.

"its a civilization game it stands up to the ""test of time"" and once you start playing you want just 1 more turn just 5 more minutes before you know it its 4 am and you have work the next morning .. its addictive like every other civ game i have played before"

I said I'd give Gilmore Girls a chance while I played this game. See why everyone liked it so much. Just something for background noise.I have now watched 8 seasons. And I don't even like Gilmore Girls. WHich can't be true I've atached all 8 seasons. Still haven't concured the world

Finally! The most important thing about this game has been implemented! Time to rename every city. Honestly the AI is very difficult to befriend (though possible) but I'd act the sameway if I were to start my own civ. The trust issues are real. Curently having fun playing alone and with friends.

Awesome game! Best release version of Civ in a long time. That being said game does feel incomplete at times. Small things like no world Congress or UN makes the game lack of a sense of cooperation with the AI when playing single player. However any small complaints with the game are sure to be resolved within a patch or expansion or two. Highly recommended.

It needs some work. The AI especially could use a lot of tweaking but overall it's a fanatstic launch and setup to be the best Civ game to date. The mechanics are similar to Civ 5 but different enough to take a couple games to figure out. If you're not enitrely sold I suggest waiting until a couple patches or expansion packs come out but if you're a hardcore civ or 4x fan it's absolutely worth diving into.

Civilization VI is a worthy installment in to the Civilization series. It launches with the most features of any of it's predecessors. The visuals are rather pleasing crisp warm and colourful. The gameplay is leaps and bounds over Civilization V. All in all a highly enjoyable game.

In time this will evolve into a great addition to the series as its predecessors have. Along the way expect to be nickel and dined to death. At least incremental improvements lessen the learning curve. I'm surprised they haven't added a unit screen in the latest update. Seems they rely on a mod to fill that gap while they attend to other priorities. All and all an addictive and expensive experience

I played two different civilations I found it a bit differcult at first to get the hang of the new set up from the creators but ultimately it was enjoyable and I woould play the game a couple of more times just stay away from Marathon if you don't have any patience or time to do it.Overall i would recommend this game to new players of this franchise

I am enjoying the game so far. I am happy that it didn't have the Civ Beyond Earth glitches!!! Firaxis has brought a few of the original aspects back from Civ 4 which were left out of Civ 5.... very nice touch for us Sid Meier followers!!! Integration of a 'card run' civil direction addess a diverse aspect to government management! As I have been playing Civilization franchise since 1993 this is the most engaging and indepth Civ to date! Well done Sid Meier!!!!

+Amenities &gt Happiness+No more wonderwhoring+Districts are neat (production district too valuable though)+Leader ability+Civ ability adds more versatility+Great people are more unique (specific abilties relating to what the person did in history) AI dumber than a bag of rocks UI poorly designedOverall very good

Innovative changes have been made throughout large areas of the game to create the best CIV launch experience we've ever seen. One can only imagine that with expansion packs they will continue this to create the definitive Civilization experience. It also seems like they have good community interaction and are addressing relevant issues fairly well on the community forums with representatives addressing individual issues with impressive regularity.

I'm still getting used to the new game mechanics but it's a definite step up from Civ V (and a massive improvement on Beyond Earth). My only real gripe is with the ever present and continually (and I mean *continually*) respawning barbarians which make the early game much harder than it needs to be and the later game more tedious in having to constantly deal with them over and over.

Great game. Best civ game ever on release. If you judge it by the last civs then it has about 1 and a halfs dlc content plus the base game on release already.The AI leaves things to be desired but i am confident that these issues will be addressed. For the base game the cheap price of $60 in store is a great deal i recommend it to everyone who loves an RTS and/or loved civ 5.

A solid step forward for the franchise in almost every way. Exciting improvements to many of the core systems make for the best gameplay experience in a Civ game. I don't like the cartoony leader aesthetic the confusing fog of war or the soporific music score but everything else is so good that I do recommend it to all fans of the series or genre. If you're new to Civilization or 4x games in general you should really check this one out.

The good The game is great.The bad The interface was designed by aliens in a serious step back from Civ 5. Many things that SHOULD be told via context pop ups must instead be read in the Civilopedia. Several factors affect e.g. build times but aren't explained in the Civilopedia at all.

This game is amazing I don't understand the hate. Sure it has it's quirks and the DLC is but the main game is a huge improvement over civ 5 graphics and gameplay wise. I highly reccomend to all fans of civ 5 but be warned it is a bit easier and there is no real good dlc right now. Either way playing with friends is great and I definitely think it is worth your money.

Love the new disrict systems and I know some dislike the new graphics but I actualy like the new art style. If anyone has ever played civ rev then Civ 6 is that but far better. The new civics tree and eurkea moments really make a big change from civ 5 in a really nice way.

Love this game always looking for new dlc and mods to improve an already great experience! With this said there are a fair few negative reviews coming in and I understand some of the frustrations. Hopefully issues such as stupid AI will continue to be tweaked and rebalanced. As a side note please makes forests have more trees!!!

It felt like an incomplete product on release but my most grevious complaint the lack of teams has since been corrected with a free patch. Plenty of DLC has come out to expand the factions and there are some great mods.There is however still an unfortunate lack of diverse maps compared to its predecessor. Overall it's good but leans a little more heavily on its modding community than Civ V.

Game is really good ..expect something completely different then civ 5...civ 6 will only get better...yes there is some stuff that still needs to be fixed..but they're doing a good job so far...at the beginning it was a train wreck...yes I would recommend buying it..the better your CPU...the better it plays and looks...Have a niice day... )..

"Having fun starting as the Congo at the southern coast of a continentMontezuma found in the east.""Well crap I'll look elswhere...""Alexander found in the West""Maybe its not all bad...""America shows up from the north.""At least if I don't go to war I am safe...""US and Montezuma declare joint war and roll over me.Restart game on new map.Rinse and Repeat 10/10"

Had a choice between this game and battlefield 1... ea...Very funny meme of a game lots of fun a lot better than 5Russia for lifefunny meme timemy friend and i decided to do a civ 1v1 with civs on europe.of course the decides to go england and russia's spawn was on the coast so rip meor was I???moved my setller back one tile and wiped out all of europe with warriors boi quitbest meme gameplz get much memays DAMN daniel

Loved this game until recent update. Something wrong with deals especially regarding luxury resources. Seems I can trade 1 orange for someones entire empire. While comical it defeats the purpose of the game. Still giving a thumbs up in hopes they fix the bug.

This game and all the others before it have been a great joy to me and a way to stay connected with my brother. I am very thankful for the timeless happiness it gives me even when my heart is near sorrowful to death with depression. Thank you all who have made Civ possible.

Civilization VI is an excellent game easily one of the deepest and most rewarding 4X experiences I have played. As with all Civ games however it does only a meagre amount to improve upon the previous iteration which could put off players with extensive time invested in Civ V. Recent updates have tweaked and improved systems to make the game more balanced and therefore enjoyable as a whole.

I don't see why everyone is throwing a fit over the Deluxe Edition. Mine has downloaded each of the packs for free as it was supposed to. It doesn't show up as purchased on the store page but it does in game. Really seems like people are over reacting before actually taking the time to look and see if they have it or not. This is a game company that is out to make a profit like any other company if don't like it than don't buy it least of all whine and cry like the ***** you are.

I can say that I'm really enjoying the game out of what I've played. Of course the hatred of multiple nationalities and nations is back but I mean it's Civ. The fact that Firaxis has managed to release a Civ game that isn't terrible upon release is an achievement in itself! The game also gets some free points for finally including Norway regardless of Norway more or less being not that great in this game.Overall yeah it's good. I like it.

One of the best entires in the series. Give it time to get patches mods and expansions like CIV5 and it'll be perfect.9/10Edit Revised after Rise&amp Fall. The game is one step closer to being it's best. The next DLC in February seems to promise that final step!

Definitely a good game. When you first get the game it is truly a blast. It takes a while but it might eventually get less enjoyable if you keep trying the same difficulty. At this point you can either challenge yourself with a harder difficulty start playing multiplayer or download mods. All of which can extend playability enourmously. With the announcement of the new DLC this could easily become the best civilization game in the series.

"The main question in a thumbs up / down ratings system is ""Did I enjoy it and do I think others will?"" Yes I am enjoying it.Its not perfect. It shares a number of problems that have always plagued the series (played since Civ II). But is it worth playing? Yes."

Improving from civ 5 were a big task but with the expansion and hopefully the upcoming 2nd expansion they have done it. Civ 6 is in my humble oppinion the best the civ series have been yet.It takes some time to get used to the new way to upgrade cities but in the end its worth it.

Stoked the game is out have wasted more of my life in this series than any other game I think. Well perhaps WoW rivals it but I've played this series since the first release so there is a good chance I'm hooked more )Still digging this new version quite different from previous version but once you figure out how the AI is motivated you can make it work out. Glad I didn't win every game so far!

If you look through the honest reviews the only complaints about the game you'll see are about the AI. While the AI is certainly the weak spot of this game AI has never been Civilization's strong suit and people tend to not realize that writing a fair and balanced AI is incredibly difficult (hence why not even mods have been able to fix it in any Civ game.Civ VI has several other minor flaws to be sure but overall it's a very solid Civ game and a vast improvement over V.

The best core CIV game I have played and with this recent patch 95% of the issues I had have been resolved. I only hope to see more content and more balance as time goes on. Small note that online multiplayer still tends to be unstable and any desyncs connects or disconnects can cause the game to freeze up and not recover. Play online at your own risk and be prepared to put effort in staying with a group.

I don't agree with a lot of the negative reviews. I have realized that I am a more casula CIV gamer than a lot of others so perhaps I didn't notice the flaws of the game. The important thing is that I had fun playing this game and that is the only thing that matters.

SCORE 9.6/10This is the best Civilization yet and feels like it has already has a major expansion. It took everything good from IV and V and combined them with some new stuff like districts and honestly a gorgeous art style. I've played them all and this one is the best and will continue to add and improve for years!

Is it perfect? No. But this game has come a long way since release. To say this is a bad game would be totally wrong. It's a different experience than past Civ games but the core aspects are still there. It is definitely worth the money and there's a healthy mod comunity. Personally I wanted to hate the game for changing so much but honestly through all its flaws it's still very fun.

"A good iteration on the Civilization formula with multiple paths to victory supporting a variety of play styles. The ""just one more turn"" feel has been ramped up even in the end game now when things tend to slow down there's always a steady stream of micro goals to be planning and working toward."

I'm a fan of the series and this one is clearly an evolved in the right way title. I enjoy the AI's levels and also it's aggressiveness.I still dream of a day where I can stack multiple unit types to for a proper army but I was happy with the triple stacks given.

This game by itself does not satisfy me at all. The steam workshop is the only thing keeping the game alive at this point. I really like Civ 6 when I have 50+ mods on. The sad thing is that I beleive some of the modders have more knowledge on what people would enjoy than the Civ 6 developers do.

"These guys are incredible. At first I didn't like the game graphics are not to my liking and the new system of districts just seemed to make everything too ""different"" so I went back to play Civ 5 instead. But after a while once you get the idea of the districts workers etc... you realise this is the ultimate Civ game now kudos to the creators! Still don't like the graphics but it's never been about graphics with this game )"

I've been playing the Civilization series since Civ II. The need for micromanagement has dropped off in the last few games graphics have improved and I'm loving the ability to use community mods nowadays. The ability to customize my cities with districts now is SUPER cool.

Very different from Civ V but in a refreshing way. Builder charges are a really cool concept and I love the civic system vs the different paths in Civ V. The fog of war map thing is kind of weird but the visible map is beautiful. Districts and tile management spices up the micromanagement side and provides another way to obsess way too much about the optimal choice. Great game so far.

I like this game I really do. I would recommend people to get the dlc's and play with AI mods or friends cuz the base game AI needs a bit of improvement. My only regret about this game right now is that I play with to many mods and that I need to play more. Also it'd be great if we could get a minimap review at the end.

Honestly one of the best games I have ever played and I've played quite a few. It brings such a different exiting approach to games. Being a lover of Football and cars this is the perfect combination. Also great if you want a break from FPS games.Would highly recommend!

This has become one of my favorite video games of all time I have even more game time on Xbox than PC. The ceiling of skill is so high and the floor for a casual player to pick up and play is very low. Perfect game for anyone. If you haven't tried this game you should.

"Rocket League is the sportiest sports game on the virtue of demanding nothing but personal player input and having a high skill ceiling but fair learning curve on top of being ball related. Game has six unique game modes and dozens more mutators for players to keep coming back to. Visual/audio design is fantastic and contributes to ""game feel"" for lack of a better phrase making scoring a goal never stop feeling good."

Hello I have a problem ... I have 2 accounts in rocket league. So i got a ban on one of them for 7 days for bad words (yes I agree I'm wrong here and it right) but then decided to change my account to play so i got my second account. played a little but decided to go back. When I started the game on the main account I found out that all of my items were disappeared. Pls help me. Thx .

It's football with cars! and rockets and sometimes explosions! A brilliant little pick up and play that's easy to get on with nigh on impossible to master 5 minutes of fune that never really stops being fun over and over and over. I really can't recommend this enough!

I really like the concept of the game and how so there are many varieties of moves and tricks you can attempt in the game. I also really like the constant updates of new maps crates and maybe even gamemodes and how it just makes the game more and more unique. 5 Star Rating everyday of the week.

Hit the ball hit the ball hit the ball HIT THE BALL!!! Who cares where its going to go (every PlayStation player)But seriously though this game is amazing to play with friends or by yourself and I could not recommend any online only game more then this one.

This game takes first place when it comes to hour count on any game in my steam Library and for a good reason. You see... Rocket League is easily the best money I have spent on a game. This game is not just a game its a sport. Something to be competitive about something to sink your time and hone your skills in. The DLC doesn't affect the gameplay it's just for funsies. The crate system is much like tf2 and csgo. Go PSY!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Rocket league is a fast and exciting game. I love that it combines flying cars with soccer I loved SARPBC and this does not disappoint. It might take you a while to become competitive (as do most games) but it's so worth it. Keep practicing and don't let your low rank or losing many games discourage you. We've all been there.

This game should end with a mandatory cool down phase where you look at something and are only then allowed to pilot a vehicle after you are no longer a menace to society.Fun game you'll never be as good as in the clips you see on those video sites. But get 1 3 buddies and you'll have a blast playing this.

"Very funny game.quite hard to play it is very difficult to hit this giant ball.But i think 20 for the game might be a bit much. Thy have to release some more features then it is awesome.So to summarise in a nutshell this game is great gameplay is great graphic is great but it is just"" football with cars.so in my opinion cause of the great fun factor 8/10"

One of the greatest sports video games ever created.Easy to get into difficult to master.Low price and years later it continues to get new free content.Highly recommend it!Update Years later and still playing.New content is regularly added for FREE and the game is still wonderful.Rocket League is awesome!

This game is awesome. HOWEVER I've found that you must get just slightly better at it before it really becomes fun. What you see the pros do is a TON harder than it looks. I put about 20 hours in just playing with my friends occasionally but not really enjoying it. As soon as I started to understand some of the more complex mechanics I fell in love with the game. Great game 10/10. But first u must git gud.

This game is amazing combines one of the few most famous kinds of games racing and soccer and even better they added Boosts it is amazingly fun and I definitely recommend to buy this game worth $20? Definitely You can fly around the map with the boosts too D ALSO KILL PEOPLE WITH THEME MEMEMEMEMEMEE

Easy to play hard to master. A ton of casual gamemodes too for those concerned with not wanting to be too competative. Whilst the ranked games test your ability and help you to improve. Rocket League has come a long way and long may it's journey continue!

This game is actually pretty fun when you're winning and playing with your friends. And nothing beats the thrill of slamming in a difficult goal. But I'll be damned if this game doesn't have one of the most toxic communities I've seen it rivals CS GO sometimes. Other than that though I definitely recommend.Edit I hate this game now

A great game that doesn't get old both casual and competitive people can enjoy this game the only negative thing that i can say is that sometimes the servers are a little bit wonky it can be frustrating to watch the ball teleporting right before your eyes but it isn't really that frequent to hinder the experience.

Probably one of the most fun games i played with friends. still fun by yourself though.the main issue is with the servers and the fact they copied fortnite with the rocket pass/ battle pass. It is a good aspect market wise but the game was unique. i give this game a 9/10 with friends.

Product received for free. Rocket League is The Best game that i ever played i recommend this game for people who love to watch soccer also this game can teach a lot about mechanics . The most important thing about this game that you will not be angry make sure that you will enjoy this game and check the website as well . https //www.rocketleague.com/news/

"Great game with some amazing content for the competative side of players out there. You will start out being amazed at the arial acrobatics happening around you in game then all of a sudden you are in Ranked match honing your skills against others players attempting to best you with skill speed witt and "" Demos "" . "" What a save!"" Highly recommend and encourage you to give it a try if you are on the fence about this one."

"Even after almost 350 hours this game still gets me intrigued to play. The amount of time and effort this game takes to even consider ""good"" is a lot. Now I switched from Xbox to PC with rocket league and I have around 700 hours and I can't believe how many new ways I discover how to score a goal. It feels amazing yet frustrating that I can't be as good as I know I can."

It has got nice cars nice graphics action different modes. You can play it competitively or just for fun. I recommend playing it with friends that way it's much more fun than playing alone! This game combines muscle cars and soccer if that sounds good to you get the game!

Everyone should play this game. Kids should be encouraged to play this game over shooters etc. Easy to play difficult to master ridiculously entertaining to play and watch. Genuinely the best game ever made in my view. Psyonix run it really well. Regular free updates and quality paid DLC. Worth every penny and will never be outdated. Oh and RLCS is brilliant too. So much fun.

i've been playin gthis game for 3 years and still there's so much to do.ok so it's easy to play hard to master type of game where it have alot stuff you need to learn to master the game and don't mention the brilliant idea this game has to offer and there's ranked for all those sweety people out there and there's different modes to the game that makes the game so good finally i highly recommend the game to the people that don't have it yet (

was my favorite game ever even if the competitive got challenging. With the new rubberbanding update i would not recomend any download this game. even if it was free. unplayable just a giant headache at this point. will update if it gets fixed Seems to have been fixed. recommened whole heartedly

This game is great and I reccomend it to everyone. When you hear about it the concept seems dumb but it's actually great. This game is worth all the money I spent on it. I have over 1000 hours on this game across many platforms and I still love it. If you have enough money to buy this I would.

I personally really like this game as the skill cap is so high and there are always new mechanics being found. I have played over 2000 hours on ps4 and it is hard to get into at 1st but once you get to a level where you have the basics nailed it really starts to become enjoyable.

Rocket League is a team based action game which includes lots of stratigies along with great time with friends. Many intense games come with a very toxic community unlike rocket league which is a very welcoming and kind community. Rocket league is a community based game with community made maps abilities to upload workshop maps aswell. With a low system requirement makes it still playable on many budget computers and still the maps are very visually stunning.10/10 Recommended Game!

"After 300 hours over 4 years I'm finally writing a review for one of my favorite games ever. For me this game is a source of endless fun and challenge. There's nothing more fun than grinding in ranked with one or two of friends or getting the whole gang to play some ""friendly"" 3v3s.Devs are constantly putting work into the game and always running fun seasonal events.10/10 would boost again."

. Some poeple might hate it because you have to work. But that's part of the fun! Yes I ranked up! Aww I lost but now I know what I have to work on to get better and rank up! (Not that simple but you get the picture) If you got $15 to spare wait for a sale and get it!

"Great game easily the best $20 I've ever spent on a game. This game does the ""Easy to play Hard to master"" concept GREAT! The high skill cap means you get to see yourself constantly improve and get better. And a good ranking system to help keep track of your progress. Also literally no P2W in this game which is a huge pet peeve of mine. All items are just for looks!"

Recommend this game as it is really fun when you start off and it is a friendly game unless you get toxic people in your lobby. The game has a great motivating factor in ranked which wants you to push your limits and get to the highest rank you can possibly get which is quite difficult but overall the game is loads of fun

This is a game that is just loads of fun. I don't want you to not buy it so in the words of Billy Joel I must tell you about it tell you about everything I feel give you a reason to accept that it's for real so here it is. Listen Boy I don't want to see you let a good thing slip away you know I don't like watchinganybody make the same mistakes others made. It's a real nice game and she's always there to play. You're a big boy now buy the game.

I purchased Rocket League on July 23 2015 as my first ever steam game and I havent had a period longer than a week where I didnt want to play it. If you can get commited to this game and get past the toxicity then this game is amazing and worth buying.

Incredibly addicting gameplay. The fun level is off the charts! This is the closest thing to a true sports game I've ever played you are truly rewarded for your time investment with ever increasing skill. The developer is constantly adding new incredible features mostly based on community feedback. This is the best time money ratio of any game I own.

I do recommend this game I love it so much however I have had so many times where I wanted to completely quit this game. There are people who think that just because it's a game it's ok to call people bad or useless or even tell other to kill themselves. This games community is super toxic but if you can look past that then this game is amazing.

I originally bought Rocket League as a second game I would only play if I was with friends but it's turned into the main game I play! I highly recommend this to anyone who loves cars and/or soccer. And if you have friends who own it multiplayer Rocket League is the best!

TL DR Concept sounds dumb Great fun It's highly addictive. )Played for probably 1500hrs (1000 on my account and roughly 500 with my brother at his place) and i'm still not great at it. Maybe slightly ok... but i just can't stop playing that damn game. So i guess i would recommend getting the game. )

This game simply creates emotion. Whether it's pure frustration or elation you will experience it. Scoring a last gasp winner or conceding a heartbreaking own goal it's all part of what makes Rocket League great. Psyonix have a very active community and they re trying to engage with fans of the game in all sorts of ways. The e sports section is also growing which culminates in a yearly World Championship which is viewed by more each year.10/10

This game at its most basic form is literally soccer with rocket propelled cars. But it's so much more than that. There's different angles on how to hit the ball. There's using your boost to propel you into the air rather than to speed up into the ball. On top of all that it's a team based game. If you don't work together more than likely you're not going to win. This game is incredibly complex for how seemingly simple it is.

12 Dollars!?!?! This game on sale is basically the best thing ever. Its worth $60! Its fast paced and well thought out. chat spamming should be a little more strict but man this game is fantastic. KEEP DEVELOPING IT! I feel like more maps user maps and more cars/game modes would make this a game to threaten the popularity of Halo and CoD.

Possibly one of the most unique games you can play right now. The skill cap is practically infinite there are many different game modes to keep you interested and overall its one of the best games out there right now. The only issue is the servers as the U.S. West one's can be questionable to say the least and there isn't U.S. Central servers. Regardless I have 500+ hours in as of writing this and I don't intend to stop playing it any time soon. 9/5/10.

I found this game to be very fun although not everyone may think the same i would like to say that it was more then i expected.At first i didnt like it cause of it stingy controls but arter a while you get use to them and you dont get botherd by them.

Very casual and addictive game. Content (besides crates) is being added frequently and bugs are getting fixed (from what I understand). The only real downside to the game is the excessively toxic community (even worse than csgo). Nothing lacks the game gameplay is awesome everything is perfect.

RECOMMENDED!!!At first it looks like an absurd concept of playing football with cars specially for all fifa lovers who think that this game will not have tactical and skill play moves but believe me when I tell you tha it has all that and much much more this game is based on pure skills even the slightest movement and positioning error can change outcome of a match.It gets regular updates and it just gets better with every new one. Must buy.Must have.Totally worth the price.

game is about 90% luck 10% raging. skills doesnt matter to win if you are lucky you win if your opponent is lucky no matter how good you are he still wins. Overall this game is fun until now i've only entered the hospital a total of 12 times due to over stress. 10/10 would enter the hospital again !

This is a 10/10 game. I have easily put 700 hours into this game and I will put in 700 more! Then 700 more! There's not much I can say besides get this game! Worth it.Edit Just updating my review. I still think it's a 10/10 game. I even have 3700+ hours at the time of this edit which is 1600 more hours than I said I would have total when I said I would add 700 more and 700 more again.

Very fun game. Once you get better competitive gets very fun and enjoyable. I highly reccomend playing with friends because it makes it highly enjoyable. The fact you are driving flying cars just makes the game very fun. I would rate this game 10/10. Very fun. Also anything non multiplayer isnt very fun. 10/10!

This is one of the best games I have played in a long time. Great fun with friends and to mess around in. If you are into competitve games than I STRONGLY recommend this game if you haven't played it already because it can get very competitive the more time you invest in this game. The better you get at the game (which all comes with time) the more fun the game gets for you. 10/10

"Such a great and fun game... Great for both the casual and hardcare gamer. Dont let the concept of ""football with cars? how childish"" fool you this game requires high skill to play properly. One of the best times I have had with a game in quite a while. Whether its the online competition or the much missed split screen gaming of old this game is great!I highly recommend this game ! two thumbs up XD"

Soccercars has changed my entire outlook on localcoop online coop gaming. Grab one or two buddies and pick this up. has 4v4 too but ITS MADNESS. As much as i'd like to go into the lack of game modes or the limited customization..the truth is this game is fantastic and lacks very very little. Soccercars is my new love.

Havent had so much fun on a game in years! This game is epic and if you dont have it yet you should buy it now PTrust me. You need Rocket League! Cross platform with PS4 so lots of people onlineRuns smooth as silkGraphics look AwsomeFully supports xbox controller10/10

"Easy to play incredibly difficult to master. Rocket League is a simple game with an ever increasing skill curve. Matches are 5 minutes long which have attributed to many ""Just one more..."" Power sessions. Incredible game. Incredible devs. This is easily my favorite game."

absolutely great game perfect to waste time on with a small game time of 5 minutes. at first you may be daunted by the people in your games making aerials all the time but the more time you put in to the game eventually you'll be doing that too and its great. rocket league for me is a 10/10.

You are guaranteed to love this game if you either have a social personality or a competitive one. The beauty of it is you can take it seriously to play the ranked system or you can have fun with your friends no problem or both. Also the devs are always coming up with new fun ways to play the game and further entertain their fans. Good game over all.

SUPERSONIC ACROBATIC ROCKET POWERED BATTLE CARS SEQUEL LONG AWAITED YOU CAN MAKE YOUR CARS LOOK AS GAY OR AS STRAIGHT AS YOU LIKE THERES NO DISCRIMINATION. GAME OF THE YEAR AWARD 2015 CONFIRMED ITS PRETTY INTENSE.(Could probably do with a controller though unless you are PRO AS F**K)

Good controls on the controler if you like using that i personaly do. This game is a fun time with friends then alone. The game is very competitive with online people. That makes the task hard when making a group but is so worth it when you get the perfect people together!

To me this is this year's biggest surprise. I tried this game on the PS4 because it was free on PS+ and I got hooked immediately. It's an amazing skill based game with simple controls but with high skill ceiling. The you can with this game's simple controls is nothing short of extraordinary.I wholeheartadly recommend this game to anyone who loves videogames and having tons of fun playing them.

Easy to learn difficult to master.So much fun to be had in this game pulling off epic goals and last ditch saves. A game only lasts 5 10 minutes to its great for a short session. In built ranking ladders and car customisation give you a sence of progress and you wont want to put this game down.I highly Reccommend you play with a controller though as it is the best way by far!

Nice shot!Nice shot!Nice shot! Great controls. Simple but it has a high skill ceiling. Fun and addictive gameplay. Awesome developers that listen to the community. Frequent updates.One of my fav games of all time. It is a great party game or you can play ranked which gets really hard as you progress through ranks.Go buy it and hook up your controller ASAP!

I know that i just played 1 hour but before i bought this game i was playing on the cracked version wich it don't have no multiplayed but it was a lot of fun even with bots and then i decided to buy the game on Steam abd i'm enjoying a lot more!! I recommend you to buy this game! Just buy it!

I may not have the full 100 hours under my belt currently i am at 4 hours but believe me this is the most fun i've had in 2 years! The controls bit wonky at the start but really easy to pick up but hard to master. So many different strategies in one football/soccer game! And it even is entertaining to watch! I bought this game and it did NOT dissapoint i know i will get many hours out of this game!The lootboxes are quite a let down but oh well wat can you do about it

When I saw friends playing and looked at videos I thought sure this may be fun but it's not for me.Then they convinced me to try. 15 minutes later I was hooked bought my own copy and can't stop playing.The arcady controls combined with a good physics engine just makes this game awesome. try it!

Amazin game I've been looking for a game like this for ages. The balance that the devs managed to get between simplistic design and yet extremely advanced gameplay is amazing. No matter how many hundreds of hours you play this game you'll always improve unlike many other games. People complain all the time about the servers but honestly I never experience lagg. Ez Pz 10/10

Rocket League has a good learning curve decent matchmaking systems for low to midtier ranks and overall fun and satisfying gameplay with a variety of modes. It's a nice game to play while listening to music or podcasts and the like. 800 hours in and I'm not bored of it mostly because there's a lot of room to improve.This game is getting updates that add more customization maps and gamemodes every few months or so.20 euros/dollars/pounds are definitely worth it in my opinion.

Good game with a lot off featuers .rocket league is one of the best games about soccer i ever played fifa is too boring for me kappa. In free time you can trade with other pepole using items what you loot in game andBTw. this game is good to make new friends.i aproved that game have fun

Ah sweet Rocket League. The game the gets you screaming after getting a Long Goal or hitting that Epic Save. This game is an incredibly fun and crazy game and I'm surprised the idea took so long to produce. Though sometimes frustrating this game provides countless hours of ball hitting fun and I love that it's so goofy. This game is a definite must have is you enjoy cars and soccer or even one by themself. P.S. get the DLCs they're great.

Rocket League is just a gorgeous game.I'm sitting at an amount of 1 400 hours writing this review and I have no plan of ever stopping to play it.I could praise this game for actual hours praise the way it makes you want to improve praise the fun this game includes but I don't really want to.There are some other really great reviews out there and I just wanted to mention how much I love this game and give it another positive review.

If you are playing from Asia do not buy this game!Every continent has its own server only Africa and Asia there are no servers...The ping will be high and everybody playing close to the server will get advantage.Good game but not for asians yet...EditedNow they do have asian and many another regions servers.Thanks devs.

With over 2500+ hours across PS4 X Box One and Steam and over 2 years of owning the game on PS4... I feel that you can trust my review. Rocket League is one of those games that you play when you don't know what to do. Rocket League is amazing. I have met new friends and progressed past my expectations. If you take a break for a few months you will lose most of your skill... Trust me I know.If you haven't played Rocket League buy it. I've never met someone that regrets the $20 investment!

I was sad to let go of Rocket League for a second time(the first time when i switched from xbone to PC) and i am missing it already as it is one of those once in a generations lifetime where it has so much charm in it that u feel like its that friend u love see everyday as they give u the fun times

Literally the best game I have ever play. So much replay value. Takes complete skill by user no assists at all so everyone is on a level playing field. Only takes the time and effort of the user to excel at this game. Honestly the best game I have ever played.

Spend years obsessed with random little game called Rocket Power Battle CarsOnly game I'm good atEverying beats me at other games cause I don't practiceCry for yearsRocket League comes outOnly one with rocket car skillsWreck everyone with 5+ goals every gameThen the game server goes down cause it's the first day of launch and that happens with every game. Now I'm back to being a loser.Please buy so I can finally beat you too

at almost 3k hours think it's time for a review.One of the best games i played with very high skill cap. More time you invest the better you get. Trading make this even more fun when you want to take a break from playing and upgrade your car! Constant updates hearing the community is the key to success and it's filling both.

Not a big fan of soccer (not since 2001 anyway) and cars are nice but I don't consider myself an enthusiast.But put those things together and man u have a MASTAHPIECE. Addictive gameplay fast and smooth lobbies for a quick online bout sweet customization options yadda yadda yadda Rocket League has it all.I usually don't have time for more than 2 3 online games in my life at any given moment but this one always makes the cut.10/10

"This is the ultamate ""Just one more"" game. Even if this game was 60 bucks I would recommend the game. You will find yourself in this game for hours on end. Granted there is a learning curve but you will find that you have the skills needed just by playing."

I really like this game but there is just one problem.Well in this game there are 2 maps that people who have lower specs pc lag i get 25 fps...Sometimes i cant hit the ball because of this lag...So if the put that we dont like the map why do i play on it for like 1 in 5 times? Just for derank me?I would like to dont play in this maps because i cant just play on them.But Rocket League still a fun game and an awesome game Recomend )

Absolutely Amazing Game!One of my friends introduced it to me a month back and I havent stopped playing since. I will say that it is very frustrating on the different servers that have some lag even if you know you have a decent connection and CPU. Not to mention some of the mouthy and arrogant people that also tend to bring this game down. I highly recommend this game to those who love fast action games. 9/10 D

Such an awesome game. With high intensity gameplay and fast paced gameplay it's a game I was not expecting to have such a long game play value. The learning curve is very little and tutorials/training makes starting out easy.Currently the only con would be the server issues the game are having but of course this is just due to massive amounts of players wanting to play. Give a couple minutes and you will get a game.Highly recommend.

Definitely one of the best competitive games and really freshening in contrast to the strung out matches in shooters.It's also a great deal for casual gamers since the ranking system considers their individual skill. Matches just last a few minutes (5 + goal cam) and it's perfect to dawdle away some time (even though you will mostly start one game after each other ) ). Long story short it won't be a mispurchase.

I like upgrading my car i just got an import body its sickk!!I love playing with my bro yyrkoon and gc playa who would of thought of cars playing soccer but i wish you could buy crates thats the thing hope they make a change to that soon butm still its an awesome game i think you should get it you could even join the clan

One of the Best Games on Steam it's so much fun to play pulling off amazing tricks and scoring give you the greatest feelings you can possibly have towards this game it's a Must Play 10/10 would flip through the air to hit the ball into the goal again!!

"I don't like cars I don't like soccer I don't like digital sports I don't like rockets nor jet propultion I don't like leagues I don't like being told ""What a Save"" when I let in a goal and I don't like the person I've become. I wish I never bought this game. 7/10"

Honestly when I first saw it I thought it was a cool concept and all but I didn't think it was worth $20. But then my friend gifted it to me so we could play together and now after about 20 hours of gameplay in a little over 2 days I can say this was probably the best $20 gift I've ever gotten.

This is an awesome game it's one of my favourites. The matches aren't heavily time consuming so it's a great game to pick up and kill a few minutes. It also has a great competitive system if you are into ranks.Lastly I highly reccomend a controller to be used. I played this with keyboard and mouse for a long time and I could definately see the difference in performance once I started using an xbox 360 controller on my PC. It just makes the gameplay smoother.

Probably one of the best games i have ever played this game is SO damn addictive and i cant stop playing it! Once you get the hang of it it will be even more fun D Im playing on a keyboard but im probably gonne get myself a controller since ive heard its way better! p

Approaching 1000 hours and no regrets.Rocket League is by far my favourite game of all time. I love seeing an eSport grow as the pros are still modest and humble the players are still friendly and the community is contantly growing!From a game perspective great concepts and fluent gameplay. Furthermore the devs dont f*** around they have and continue to release great content and updates. Keep doing what you're doing Psyonix.

This is a good competitive sports game that is a blast to play with friends. I have a few issues with it however overall it's a very solid release and I highly recommend it.Pros * Fun game play* Online Matchmaking* Easy to start hard to master* Large active communityCons * Needs better keyboard / mouse support* Needs ability to further tweak graphic options (some fog and post processing is always enabled)* Needs a more refined match making rank system.

It's amazing game. And the rankings could not be better. When your a rookie you learn from big mistakes. When your a semi pro your working on gettting a advanced skill set and getting better overall. And from Pro and beyond you master of being a good rocket leaguer. This game takes time. But I hate soccer but I love this game. Please buy this.

Love This Game so much Played it First on Xbox and Moved to Pc one complaint I have is not being able to trade from xbox to pc and Xbox not being allowed to trade keys i think it Would be an easy fix if i am wrong im sorry but i belive it wouldnt be hard to implement

So adictive and so fun packed in this Car + Football game. Such simple premises couldn't be more right the adrenaline and the excitement you get in the field is great. Also the community is awesome for casual and competitive gameplay. Try to enjoy with friends.

Rocket League is one of my favorite games of all time. I have been playing it for months and I don't get tired of it no matter how frustrating it is at times. It's a weird game in that the lows are vastly outweighed by the highs so you keep coming back.

Rocket league is all about the tense moment right before you start an aerial. The ball floating above the goal. All u must do is execute a perfectly double jump aerial to nudge the ball forward into the back of the enemies net. All of a sudden ur car decides to backflip instead of jumping. You miss the goal. The other team clears their shot goes in. Forever Potato 1.... (10/10 would backflip again)

I don't think I've ever played a game that I thought was perfect until I played Rocket League. If you're not into sports you'll love this game. Nice shot Psyonix!!Really an amazing game!! Nicely done.Rocket League is more of a skill based game where you are given everything in the beginning of the game.. your experience or rank doesn't give you any extra boost and any better car..
