Its a greate game and I do recommend trying it...you will end up spending a lot of time playing it.Enjoy D

This game is easy to pick up but hard to master. It's good whether you have 10 minutes to play or a few hours and even better when you have friends to play with. The community in this game can be a bit.. unfortunate sometimes but other than that I've enjoyed this game much more than I expected to. If you're on the fence about getting this game I'd suggest giving it a try.

Great fast paste game. Rocket jumping becomes mandatory if you want to get good. Despite the simplicity its not an easy game at all!The ranking surly has some probems we got 4 5 points each win and than we got obliterated and got like 11 points.The community ist mostly friendly but people leaving when they realise the game is lost... thats just sad. Game handles that very well though first a bot jumps in and then a player joins as soon as possible.

Look this game is cool but you should fix the Bans i tried to play online and controller disconnected then i went to reconnect my controller and had some problems when i came back i was kicked for being idle and couldn't rejoin also i was banned from matchmaking Ranked and Unranked

Pretty good when playing in a party with multiple modes to pick from. The Rumble update added a new fun gamemode which changes up the game significantly and is much fun to play with friends (my hours on this game increased by at least 20 within the first week of the Rumble update). The game does get rather boring when going solo but that is down to the team that you get put on XD

I never was a fan of soccer games and not really too much of a fan of car games but this combination is very fun!This is a fanastic game with a very high skill cap that gives you hours of play in an increasing variety of game modes. All added maps and game modes in patches are free to play which is pretty awesome. They add a few small DLCs that are pretty low cost and add a few extra cars to play with and decorative items.

Really fun game for anyone that just wants to chill or get competitive. It's great to play with friends and there are plenty of gamemodes to keep you interested. I highly recommed this game to anyone looking for a good time especially if they enjoy soccer basketball and driving games.

This game is totally awesome and I've spent huge amount of time playing it.But recently I have an issue with it. After the upload the interface changed into Russian and I as a native speaker can say that Russian is very poor. Translation of some words is completely wrong and sometimes it's absolutely not clear what it says (makes no sense).I may even offer you my help with the translation but Russian language in Rocket League needs changes )Thank you!

Even though it takes a while to get used to the game is insanely fun to play. The premise of the game may seem simple/boring but it's really not. Slightly disappointed due to unavailability of cross platform parties but other than that the game is well worth the money spent on it.

"A very fun game that is really enjoyable with friends. On the other hand I can't say I've enjoyed the game on my own 90% of all the games I joined had toxic people typing ""ez ez"" and what not. Apparently they get satisfied by typing""botgame"" ""easy"" ""forfeit pls"" etc i'm not triggered just dissapointed. One tip set chat to team only or disable it awhole (in audio settings) to have a more enjoyable time on Rocket League ."

"Rocket League""What I'm not addicted.......you don't know my life.....I can stop whenever I want......"" Rocket League theme Music starts playing *3hrs laterJust one more matchJust one more matchJust one more match Chat is disabled for 3 Seconds ............Just one more match______________________________________________________"

Think i've found my Best Game Of 2015 right here everythings great about this game can't praise the devs enough everything they've done is great nothing is pay to win they've listened to community feedback and made adjustments to the game based on that feedback not buying the DLC's wont exclude you from any matchmaking it's all just perfect.

Very fun. If you watch a gameplay video an think to yourself Thats Looks Awesome! Your gonna love this game. One thing i do wish they would add tho Is a multiplayer freeroam mode or Like a Tag Mode. Both Would Be really Fun. Would Love to see a tag game mode!

"Short review The GOTY of 2015 for me! Ridiculously fun and outrageous fastpaced multiplayer sport action! So easy to learn yet so hard to master! A game that makes you think ""Just one more game"" over and over again until you have to go to bed to even have the slightest chance to function properly the day after! An instant classic and a must buy for everyone even the slightest interested in any kind of sport game! Utterly recommended!"

I didn't realise how high the skill ceiling was until watched Kronovi.Easy to pick up hard to master but when you do get your first aerial goal you will feel like a god. Even now after 308 hrs(!) I still get that feel when I pull off an awesome goal (albeit rarely for me (). Looks simple but there is depth. Just watch Kronovi that guy is ridiculous (I'm sure there are others too that's just who I've seen).

FIFA for men.All jokes aside this game is amazing. With mechanics that make me question how the hell I just shot a ball into a goal from halfway across the field in a car with a rocket strapped to it the game clearly wasn't built around the concept of how but rather why not?The bots are a little dumb sometimes with a goal every now and then being a bot just driving into their own goal with the ball in tow.A must buy for anyone who likes ingenuity.

This game is so ing fantastic even better if you have friends to play with. There's nothing like the joy of pulling a Messiesque play and having your car projected across the whole field after the ball explodes as it enters the net. It also comes with a very neat replay editor.Besides some server issues at the time of launch (there's a ton of players online at this moment) the game is really worth it. Also the devs have been very quick to respond to the connection issues and they are amazing.

After countless hours of gameplay still a lot a fun and with and infinite learning curve since you can always improve.The devs continue to be very active throughout so don't worry with minor bugs they're getting patched constantly.10/10! Would fly after the ball again.

The learning curve for this game is so high. When I started people were hitting insane shots that I never thought I would be able to hit. After 1 100+ hours in this game I can finally do all the cool stuff that I had wanted since I started. This game is so much fun especially when you have a friend or two who like it as much as you. Give this game a chance you won't regret it.

It's funny because I don't really enjoy racing games and I also don't enjoy Football yet for some reason I enjoy this game. It seems like such a silly idea yet it's extremely addicting fun and I can play for hours! There always seems to be room to improve. I would highly recommend this game! (Dank Soundtrack too)

I never thought I'd see the day when I could tell people that my favorite sport involves slamming balls into a net from midair. With a car. That's right a f***ing car.Well I guess that day has come.10/10 most fun I've had playing a game in a while. Even more fun with friends. Buy it you won't regret it.

Very simple mechanics makes this physics based Rocket Car soccer game easy to learn but very difficult to master. The competitive nature of this game keeps you on the edge of your seat and every goal feels ridiculously exciting. The ease in which you can follow whats going on in the game makes it a shoe in for the next big e sports game and I look forward to seeing it develop.

I can't remember the last time I played a game THIS fun! It's challenging competitive fast paced.. Controls may be quite hard to master (I mean it must not be easy to hit a bouncing ball with a car) but once you do (it won't take long... you just have to figure out how the ball's and cars' physics work) it really gets soooo exciting.I totally recommend this game! It's worth every cent!

I find it fun to play beautiful graphics fun with friends.One thing though. The season rewards if you do the comp 12 games won itll make you do the amount of games your rank say gold 64 games all over again. I would reccomend it to have fun but not competitvly.

I have played the game before getting it on steam. If you're looking to kill some time this would be the way to do it. ProsFun gameplay.Great mechanics.Easy to play.Hard to master.ConsThe community like most competitive games is cancerous.EDIT I am editing this for a badge my guy.

100% recommended. I dislike football. I'm not interested at all into cars.I dislike both Football games and driving games. But GOD ROCKET LEAGUE IS SUPER MEGA AWESOME *_* And it fullfill all kind of competetive thoughts someone could have the maximum skillcap of this game is like.... UNLIMITED *_*

This game... Oh man where do I start. I have to say I love this game no matter how hard it is when you first start out its just too much fun. play with friends its even better. there is so much you can do in the game and thats what i love. its too much fun even if you are loosing.

Think of soccer.With cars.With rocket boosted cars.That can fly.On a soccer pitch.With a ceiling and walls.With a giant ball.That explodes.Up to 4 players on a team.Absolute chaos.And everyone chasin' the ball just to get it into that glorious goal.And that is what Rocket League is.You should get it.P.S. *cough* Rocketpass is stupid don't waste your money *cough* *cough*

After 250+ hours playing RC I can just say... After couple of hours practicing it will became your life. There is no way back after your first areal. The game by it self is amazing. No bugs almost every 2 months an update. The only downside about this game is not really the game it self. ITS THE COMMUNITY. People arent nice but there are few exeptions. 10/10 would buy again.

Rocket League pretty much sums up the old adage Easy to lean hard to master.At the start you'll be happy every time you hit the ball but by the time you get a hundred hours or so into the game aerials become the thing yyou chase after. It's a never ending chase after sicker and sicker plays and it's brillianr.

While I only have 240hours gameplay I'd recommend playing it for these few reasons.1. DLC every couple months and also very cheap adding new items into the game2. There are many different playstyles you can have to learn.It's a game where you can either choose to learn and come out on top. Or fall miserably to the players who have 700 hours of practice under them.

One of the few games you play and just keep playing because it doesn't get boring! Every match is different and the community is so amazing. And the developers are the real heroes because they make free new updates every single month! With new game modes maps cars items and more awesome stuff. Defenitly my favorite game right now!

"I think the central genius of Rocket League is that it compounds the accessibility + depth of soccer with the accessibility + depth of racing games. You can understand the game immediately upon seeing it but it's totally fresh and it supports a rich infinite and easily understood skill progression. It's one of those rare games that lives up to the ""a minute to learn a lifetime to master"" mantra."

Keep coming back to this game over and over. Great for a quick fix or a marathon. Great learning curve where it is easy to pick up and play yet will take a long time to master as you gradually get better over time. Great cross platform play. I had to play for a long time on my PS4 before the SteamOS / Linux version finally came out. Plays fantastic on my 1060 NVidia card.

"Occasionally my wife will walk in the office and say ""Ugh. You're playing that stupid remote control car soccer game again?"" and I say ""Yes. Can you make me some pizza rolls?"" and she says ""Make them yourself.""10/10 but I still have no pizza rolls.UPDATE Over 400 hours in. Still addicted"

Surprisingly fun and challenging. I can't put it down once I get going. It takes a lot more skill and finesse to control the cars than you would think. A breath of fresh air. The style and overall atmosphere of the game is top notch as well. The devs hugely support this game and I think it will be a staple in gaming for a long time. Highly recommended.

Honestly I was a bit turned off at first. The controls were hard to master and I thought that just hitting the ball around was kind of boring. But once I actually got better I started to enjoy Rocket League. It gets a bit repetitive at times but the devs are great at adding new content and aesthetic items to keep it fresh. Plus now that I'm a bit more advanced I'm getting some really great plays!

Great game. Very fun and what's good is that there's always room for improvement in this game. All kinds of game modes (1v1 2v2 3v3 and 4v4) which I like a lot. I play this with my friend and we have so many great laughs together as well (Something not entirely common in games). I'd reccomend to anyone if they like soccer/racing or not. Fantastic.

"I nominated the game for the ""Just 5 more minutes"" Award.Cars and soccer... Simple concept done great! 20 bugs is an absolutely fair price.+ many game modes+ free maps and new game modes coming with updates+ not connected with steam market+ very funny especially with friends+ skill based game with a huge learning curve toxic community dlc cars"

It's Soccer/Football in cars that can jump roll and fly. Games are short (5 minutes) fast paced and intense. Like all sports you get scpre blow outs at times but they aren't overly common. Even a 2 or 3 goal lead can (and does) evaporate quickly. Buy it. Play it. You will not regret it.

I get to drive around blowing up other cars while playing soccer hockey basketball or this weird floor thingy. Over all very enjoyable and simple idea that has been done in an amazing manner. Bonus points for flailing uncontrollably through the air in a failed attempt to hit the ball. 10/10

This game is alot of fun... But if u dont have a friend or friends to play with it can get boring after awhile so I recommend to buy it if u have someone u can play with! But overall this game is amazing. A bit glitchy but that doesnt show as often as on other games. I recommend you to buy this game if u like fun/action/car/football games DD

Its football with a car. Sounds like a partygame right? Something u will play one time and never touch again? U HAVE NEVER BEEN MORE WRONG ABOUT ANYTHING IN YOUR LIFE!I bought this game 2 weeks ago and have played 60 hours already..ITS SO FUN AND AND AND.. just freaking buy it it keeps you hooked for aslong as you want . Customization feels epic scoring feels epic and lets not even start about how flying into a ball feels...9/10 Buy. It. Now.

By now you already know what this game is about so no need for an introduction. Highly competitive skill based game. It will take a huge chunk of your time to master but you can enjoy it at all skill levels. More content like cars cosmetics and maps are added from time to time in the from of DLC.

High skill cap every time I play I see people doing tricks that are better then me so I continue to strive to become better. Lots of replay value because of the high skill ceiling and the devs are patching and communicating constantly. Highly recommend if you are a fan of soccer or cars or rockets or just play ole fun. Controller strongly recommended.

one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match one more match...

640 hours in I can honestly say this is one of my favorite games of all time.It fits my schedule perfectly being that I often only have 30 minutes to play between other things I'm doing.This game is extremely easy to learn and EXTREMELY HARD to master.I have purchased copies of this for several friends and constantly prosthelytize it.I can't recommend it highly enough definitely check it out.

What can I say about this game?A M A Z I N GI'm not a big fan or soccer or cars in real life but this game is just so much fun I can't get tired of it! The music is awesome many different maps you can costumize your car and even trade items there are regular updates which always manage to amaze me and make the game ever better. Rocket League is just fun that's all I have to say about this masterpiece now go and buy it 3!

A game that you can play for short breaks or hours on end. Nothing beats playing 3v3 with a group of your friends. High skill ceiling and you never stop learning. Company continues to add new features and maps for no additional cost. Why don't you own this already?

Awesome game easy to learn but very hard to master because of the high skill level. But once u get used to it its great for quick games since matches are just 6 7 min and so u dont need to spend too much time for each game. However you will need to spend a bit of time to get good and to get the nuances.But you will enjoy it no doubt.

Well I've been playing this game for a long time and I love it but theres one problem. The maps. Aquadome needs to leave asap. People with computers that aren't like amazing can't handle it. It should at least be non playable on ranked because it kills my game. I've seen many people that actually have good computers complain about this map. This is just a suggestion obviously but if you could do anything that'd be great.

Lemme tell ya what this game is top LOL. its fun and i have become pretty decent. Considering im like the Ray Charles of real soccer this makes me feel good about myself. If you struggle with coordination like 1 in 4 people like me this is the game for you.

Definitely my favourite game. Enjoyed the prequel on PS3 and this game ramped up a brilliant idea in every way. It's hilarious and fun due to everyone being bad at the start and enthrallingly competitive once you get better. I'm at 3000 matches and counting definitely a hard game to put down! The e Sports scene is very entertaining to watch as well.10/10 reccommended!

Why I like about this game Its easy to play with friendsI love soccer and cars this brings them both together DFun gamemodes like Hoops rumble etcCompetitive game modes if your feeling competitiveIts cheap runs on bad quality computersWhat I dont like about this game the crates are rigged (not really) but they do take forever to getno rewards for completing achievementsIs the game worth it? Well yes indeed it is it is very addicting and fun to play with friends aswell as streamers from twitch!

So Rocket League ... is just one of the best games currently out there if you like skill games. It's really easy to get into but so hard to master. I've had hundreds of hours of fun with it so far an it's simply one of the deepest game mechanics i've seen in any game ever. Even after of these hundreds of hours there's so much space for me to improve. Also it's great to play with one or more friends.Easy 10/10 for me and definately recommended.

I always thought this game looked stupid. Then i bought it only because i though it would be a good (of very limited options) splitscreen game when my pc was hooked up in the living. In no time i was hooked. Super fun game. Its amazing how such a simple game can remain fun after 100 hours.

I would highly recommend this game to the one who seeks for an addictive indie and competitive sport game. Also it's an excellent time killing game because a match takes only five minutes. The game is easy to learn but hard to be pro at it. More interestingly playing with friends would be perfect and fun as communication is very important. It can be ridiculously hilarious at times especially when playing with friends!

"Rocket League is a very fun and enjoyable game even if it is somewhat lacking in variety. Much more exciting than ""normal"" football and a lot more tense. Controls are easy to learn but hard to master allowing more skilled players to shine above others. Matches are short and can seem quite hectic but a team with proper tactics will still be in a better position to win than a team that doesn't work together. Could easily see this becoming a proper eSports game somewhere along the line"

"&gt Bought Game&gt Installed Game&gt Launched Game&gt Played Tutorial&gt Realized ""Damn I'm really good at this game""&gt Played Online&gt Got My Kicked&gt Tried Single Player&gt NPCs are Tough and Kicked My br&gt &gt Raged and blew up ever other car in every game i played&gt Pulled off one sick goal&gt PLayed Crappy the rest of the games10/10 One of the greatest games ive ever played and ive only played it for like 3 hours"

Because i dont like soccer nor cars i did not think i would like this game. But i guess if you combine 2 things you hate it ends up consuming your life. It can be really fun with friends (if you have any) and very competitive. And you get to blow people up.

I would never recommend this game to a true friend as I value their life and time. This game is like an abusive relationship. You will get infatuated then get abused and humiliated repeatedly but keep coming back. It will ruin your life. You will think about it when not playing that you should get out of this one and move on. But you will come back to it again.If you are not my friend recommend 100%.

"Pros Rocket cars Racing Explosions Great gameplay and graphics Hats! and lots of customization options and hats! Easy to get in too Doesn't require much memory or a beefy graphics card to run. Basically all you need in a game in one game!Cons Addictive. ""Just one more game then I'll quit"" 10 games later..."

At the beginning your all rookies and everyone struggles at making a goal celebrating when one does go in then yo get to semi pro and pro and people start making better shots thennnnn you get to veteran and expert where people start making crazy aerials and theennnnnn you get to master and legend where everyone is a flying god on wheels and then roocketeer which i have not seen yet.

Genuinely fun game. The mechanics are simple and awesome. Polished to a mirror sheen. Fun the first time you boot it up and fun the 100th time you boot it up. Awesome with friends awesome solo. Would recommend to players of all skill levels and time investment levels.

I bought this at the same time as my friend we thought it would just be a casual game. How we were wrong. This is brilliant the range of skill is huge and there will always be room for you to improve. I must say Rocket League is better with at least one friend. Highy reccomended you can get so many hours from such a small price. BUY IT NOW (Be prepared for frustration when you first start)

I could sit here all evening figuring out how to tell you guys how good this game really is. Instead i'm gonna keep it short and just tell you this I was never a fan of soccer videogames nor racing games. This is still super amazing and awesome and I completely love it and so will you. Just buy the damn game xD

Simple soccer game but with cars so it's like 9000x cooler. Flying around in rocket powered cars to score goals. Simple concept flawless execution game you and every one of your friends should play.I've only set it down to take food and water breaks since I got it (and the occasional downtime from having unreliable internet). What I'm saying is it's awesome.

"One word summerises this game.. ""fun"".I was a bit uncertain if I would enjoy it not a big fan of car games or soccer games. But together.. well its fun. Extremely accessible to new players.. but clearly difficult to master. Can't see i'll get sick of this game anytime soon."

This game is really fun. There's not much to say about it the gameplay is great and dispite other people's reviews I have great connection on servers. The graphics would be great but with my mediocre PC I had to lower the settings quite a bit. Other than that I would highly reccomend this game to just about anyone.

Amazing gameFun fun fun fun. If you loose play again and win. If you win play again and win. Graphics is really good as for my Radeon HD6870 its about 45 55 FPS.But really I didnt know what to think about this game before buying this. Very postitive feedback!

So if you have friends this is the best game ever!!! PIts only like 10 euros on Spaces cuz steam cencors it xD) so really no excuseNow they added a trading and crate system with cosmetic items which I admit has persuaded me to spend 10 euros or so...Pros Super fun Don't need to be good to have fun Don't need to like football New updates and DLC's come out often Lots of game modes + competative mode Easy to learn Hard to master Doesn't get boring New Trading/Crate system Cons Rip Life

I like to keep me reviews short so here it goes Pros Unique game style like never seen beforeSimple gaming structure yet fun!Very good support and dev's are good community listenersGood musicGreat graphicsAmazing gameplayCons Matchmaking needs improvement.Community flamers is around 2/3 for me

Far too many mainstream games these days are very similar and following the same old boring industry cliches.For the first time in years I can honestly say that I experience pure joy from playing this game. Even losing can be really fun.The game is very simple and straightforward yet hits the nail on the head in terms of gameplay mechanics and it's simple objective. It's very fun and I highly recommend it even to people who don't neccasarily like sports type games.

This game is one of my favorites. Pretty friendly and competitive community. No . Developer that keeps delivering new content. DLC's that are worth buying for a few bucks. Playing with friends until you rage quit. Quick chat was never this easy and annoying.10/10

I didn't plan on buying this game. A friend gifted it to me because he wanted someone to team up with. The concepts are easy. You can pretty much jump in and start winning just knowing the basics. Once you learn the more complex maneuvers however this game becomes incredibly addictive. It's a blast with friends. Everyone should play this game.

I have to say this game is absolutely astounding. I don't like games with cars all too much and I hate sports games but rocket league is just right. And even though it seems like it might be the same thing over and over it's always interesting and something different every time you play.

I never again need to run out of arguments to annoy my younger brothers! 5/5 +overtime I can never be mad at losing no matter the score I'll be laughing my face sore! 10/10 losses/would lose again If you're used to Losing then this game will make you lose with a smile on your face if you win well....Miracles do happen AWESOME GAME

This game is absolutely amazing if i wouldn't have had $20 before i bought it and i knew of the pure ecstacy available within it i would have done some pretty terrible things to get it. $20 well spent my friends. if you havent already bought it. please do so immediately. 10/10 would shoot goal again.

The game is awesome! Lots of fun and the way the game is done is just spot on DBut I have to say after 190h of gameplay rocket league has the worst and most toxic comunity I ever played in. Allmost every game ends in rage complaining acusations and negative coments from either one of the teams... It seems like people are not interested in having fun in it only conplain about everything that happends. But if you play with friends its tons of fun DD

I might be nubby but If I know anything this game is something EVERYONE should play now you might be asking. I hate soccer but I love cars or I hate cars but I love soccer. Trust me give this game a whirl and you'll fall in love only problem is the matchmaking I see Vets facing Legends or Rocketeers but point aside this game is one of the best I've played and i totes rec. it.Even better once you put enough time into it

Playing PC Games for more than 20 years but this masterpiece is more fun than 99% of all the games I played! Multiplayer Highlight!!UPDATE Still Playing! Still fun! Still getting better (slowly) ...UPDATE 2 It's nearly 600 hours ... time to bash the game now like a normal troll? Won't! Still great!

Rated E for everyone certainly no toxicity to be found anywhere within this game./sThis is a truly brilliant game. Perhaps a hallmark of it's status among other competitve games is that it has it's very own toxic community.Play without friends at your own peril.Play with friends at your free times peril.

i got this game for free on ps4 loved it so much i wore out the right trigger on my ps4 controller from gripping it so hard loved it so much i bought it for the pc as well. i highly recommend this game and also highly recommend using a wired 360 controller instead of keyboard and mouse for this game.game is simple to pick up and learn but very hard to master simple controls simple but good enough graphics good competitive game.

This is my favorite game on Steam currently (I have 340 total games with all my accounts) and for good reason. I throughly enjoy Rocket League the tactics of it the replayability the awesome wheels and car builds I can unlock and just the game in general. I honestly have no idea WHY I love this game but it's truly got me hooked right now. Please someone help. xD

Oddly enough I've never enjoyed online PvP games I've always sucked when playing other people. I'm also not a huge soccer guy.I love Rocket League! Super simple to start playing and there doesn't seem to be a skill ceiling. I've still got a ways to go as far as skill but I enjoy every game I play. It's much more than a simple arcade game.

I generally don't like either racing or sports games on the PC but Rocket League manages to combine and transcend both genres in a very fun way. I do play it with a Logitech F310 controller which is a very cheap way to get a lot more enjoyment out of the game. The replay value and fun to be had are well worth the price of this game even if you think you don't typically enjoy the genre.

"Brilliant Game!Easy to get into but hard to master. Can't remember when I was last this pleasantly surprised by a game. It started of as a ""Fun to play with your friends"" game But it left that mark at the same point as you leave the ground. After that you can't play together with those that doesn't see clear enough to realize this is one of the best games ever made!Now if only could get good at this..."

Things that are good FUN! addictive gameplay multiple game mods never let you get bored customization Things that are not so good i can fool the game by leaving tthe match any time i think i will loose a season match thus i will alwasys have perfect score in any season i play

Love the game Can just come home after work turn it on and chill playing it for an hour or two.It really is just a pick up and play and if you need to head out well thats fine because rounds only last 5 minutes.Only thing wrong with it is the smurfs. I don't understand why people smurf you're not good if you can only beat people who play it casually )I'd recommend a buy anyhow seen as most smurfs cry hard when you can beat them which is funny to see xD

Amazing game with great looking cars! Awesome games physics and concept..Totally love it!Personally I think the best parts of this game is to control the car with complete freedom and ofcource the dope af songs!Although should add an option for playing songs during the matches.

As shown by the 93% of positive evaluations this games is good very good.Content is frequently added and the community is huge.A lot of customization available including in game settings which can really enable you to create unique and fun experiences.This is one of those games that are very easy to learn but extremely difficult to master. The difference in skills is absolutely all that matters a gaps in experience will greatly show ingame.Lots of fun ahead of you go buy this game.

Easy to pick up highly addicting game. The gameplay gets more exciting and fast as you learn more complex techniques such as aerial shots. The cars are great and the extras and customizations are neat. The game seems stabile and not overdone although some fields (maps) seem to lag a bit more than others. Highly recommend teaching yourself the right techniques to save yourself and your teammates frustration. Watch the pros compete too you'll learn what works.

Why are you even reading these to figure out if you should buy the game? You know at elast one person who would attest this is pure greatness. Just buy it love it and then write Psyonix a letter saying how this game allowed you to become a better person.

This game is really fun with friends. Car customisations are really nice with some very cool combinations. The gameplay itself? Simple concept difficult to master. The game devs really work hard to improve this game and listen to the community. The devs add extremely cool and unique DLC which are worth the price. The devs already include a lot of free stuff for everyone so support them. What are you waiting for? Buy the game!

Though I dont like soccer games neither cars games(though these last ones I can play and maybe enjoy if it is good) because I am more FPS kind of player though this game is another level I have had enjoyed hours playing with friends and with random people as well it is something very competitive and nice! excellent game I enjoy it a lot!

Wow. I have been looking at this game ever since I started seeing clips of gameplay on reddit. I thought it looked cool but was worried that it would get boring. I took a chance and let me tell you....I LOVE THIS GAME. It's simple yes but it's really fun to play. Every game is different. I am not into sports IRL but this game gets my adrenaline flowing. I find myself throwing my hands ip in celebration after every goal! Very fun!

Rocket league is not just about hitting a soccer ball with your car. It is a about controlling your boost and driving skills. You can hit the ball in the air or on the ground to score goals and defend the enemy team. Rocket league also has competitive modes and regular modes for more casual players.

Extremely addicting. I started playing about 2 weeks ago and I get better every time I play. I haven't had this much fun with a multiplayer game in a long time. The controls might be a bit wonky on keyboard though so I suggest picking up an old xbox 360 or ps3 controller. 10/10

This game is incredibly fun however as of late the player base has become extremely passive agressive and toxic.There are still a few players that are genuinely good sports but they often are drowned out by all the people with their heads up their own asses.play with friends report toxic players.

This is the most fun I've had with a multiplayer game since battlefield 4. Solid game mechanics with no bugs I've seen in 200+ hours. One of the few games that gets better with each update (psyonix really seems to care about this game) instead of worse. Seriously just buy it.

This is probably the best game I have played in a few years there is an awful lot more than meets the eye with split second aerial trick shots huge helpings of strategy flying cars all turned up to 11. It's very hard to put down too vehicle personalisation and simple yet effective communications with both hotkeys and VOIP make this a very community accessible game with cross platform party system to come doubly so. Strongle recommend must be tried!

Product received for free. If you like Monster Jam like a true fan as myslef.. you will enjoy this game beacsue of the constant smashing and speed.. use the hotshot because it gives the highest damge to the ball.. i also suggest turnign the cheering fans off because it is quite annoying.. hjonestly i dont even know if t hey are cherrign for mne or naught.

I really enjoyed playing this game. The thematic is awesome and has a great potential to be an e sport.There's one thing I really miss in the game which is the absence of a mini map.I hope on the next roll up updates that could be included.Recomended.

Rocket League is incredibly accessible to any player (especially if they have a controller hooked up but even with K/M).I can honestly say I haven't had more fun by immediately launching a game and hopping online with friends.The game is simple but fun and well worth the retail $20 pricetag.

Great game and superadductive. Team up with a group of friends and just have at it. Slightly mild learning curve at first but once u get the physics and the vehicles controls down the rest just comes naturally.One thing I would recommend for me using a console controller just felt a lot easier for controlling thr vehicles compared to a mouse &amp keyboard combo. I picked up a 360 usb controller got some gripit's to put on the joysticks and been loving it ever since!!

Rocket League What else is there to be said?Pros +Simple yet addicting gameplay that only gets more fun as you master its mechanics+Easy to pick up and put down if you have a few minutes+Consistent content updatesNeutral &gt Gamepad required (IMO) Keyboard and mouse users are welcome to have at it&gt Lack of game modesCons Horribly toxic community PSN cross platform Reporting players is basically useless (unless you provide extensive proof)

While it has a steep learning learning curve Rocket League a vehicular sports game that resembles soccer is a great game. PROS Eyecatching graphics Great gameplay One of a kindCONS Quite difficult The community can sometimes be but most games are like that. Becomes a bit repetitive.

For all those that enjoy devising strategic solutions while under pressure as one engages in a battle of wits that will surely adapt oneself to a setting that may always prove unpredictable challenging and may also trouble many whom possess addictive personalities as they spiral downwards with an addiction that puts so many drugs to shame that this game might as well be illegal.

First game that I...100% ed x2Bought 2 times (PS4)Bought all DLC's x2Played for more than 250 hoursPlayed on my new GPUPlayed online multiplayer (I'm a single player person) that's saying a lot right there if you can't find something in this game you like there is something wrong with you even if it's just the music

Lots of fun quick online matches puts you right into the action. Pretty easy learning curve but hard to master. Definitely would recommend for when its on sale. Doesn't feel like a complete enough game for a full retail game though. Either way I'm enjoying it a lot.

A lot of fun to play with friends and totally worth the 20 dollars. I would recommend using a controller with this game since it makes it way better to control your car but the controls are nice and easy to learn. If you're looking for something to play with your friends this is a good game to get.

Cars with rockets playing soccer what's not to love. The price point of this game seemed high until I played the game. It's super fun and casual and I have gotten a lot of play time out of it. Even if I'm losing or playing poorly I rarely get salty when playing this game. Fun to just chill and relax while playing with friends. Of course there is also a growing competitive scene with a high skill cap.

Very fun game some people don't like it after a while but I enjoy this game a lot and I think that it will go very far. It's fun alone but it's even more fun with friends because then you can communicate and strategize the field. Overall I think it was worth the 20 dollars. )

Addictive game. Great gameplay servers are typically good the business model has gotten worse with time. Putting cars in the crates is obnoxious although I'm sure it brings more money in. Hopefully they're working on a new game as one can only be a one trick pony for so long even though it's an incredibly COMPELLING one trick pony.Protip turn off crates in settings before you're even tempted. You can buy plenty of better things than $1.50 CHANCES at cosmetic items.

I hate football but love Rocket League. It's a awesome game to play with friends or with randos. Definatly worth it even at full price. You can rankup from Rookie to Pro to Veteran etc. It's always funny when your pwning someone who is higher rank.I recommend this game to anyone.

Hit kick and fly your way through the fun action packed high pacing game of RL. Car soccer? Really? Yes that s right and it works. You can play casuals and have tons of fun by yourself or with a group of friends. But if you want to play competitive well you will realize how much you suck at the game. With free map updates and good server support this game is a definite grab for your library.

I love this game so much. But there are still some things I would love to see in the game.Car designs It would be so much easier for me to change my car designs if I would be able to save my setups. Being able to have different patterns for different teams.I would be so happy if you would add these things to the game )

This is definitely some of the best $20 I have ever spent. Huge player base right of the start and has a huge competitive capacity! I definitely couldnt recomend this game more the only negative I have encountered so far is limited customization on car parts. Though maybe that will come.11/10 Car Explosion SimulatorDefinitely Pick This Game Up!

This is the first game to get me excited about playing in many years. There is something so teeth clenchingly fun about rocket powered soccer cars. I lean left and right and forward along with my car sort of like how you lean when you play Wii Bowling.Honestly just get this game. Even at full price you won't regret it. It's honestly the most replayable game I've ever owned and my life is better for me playing it.

What more can I say that hasn't been covered a 1000 times before? Easy to pick up and get involved but nearly impossible to master. This game is addictive engaging and a blast with friends. The competitive scene is massive and microtransactions are cosmetic only. The only true downside for me is the toxic community. If it bothers you to see childish racey and disrespectful remarks simply disable text chat and keep voice to your party only through discord or another service.

I honestly can't say anything negative about this game. I can wholeheartedly recommend it throughout on all aspects. The servers are well established and allows cross play from PS4 and PC. The mechanics in the game are flawless and I see no bugs. This game has A TON of potential for ups for sick moments and for hilarious moments. You won't regret buying this game whether you're alone or a group.

This game is very well optimized and it works even on a weak PC. I am playing it on Very High and it works very well and i have just an ATI Radeon HD 6790.It is very fun and you willl never be bored to play a match. The most interesting part is that you can play/troll with your friends so it is a very funny game. Recommended

The guy who created the concept to this game must be a no s giving genius! Cars playing football why the not??So addicting has got me 400 hours until this exact moment of both joy and frustration always learning new techniques and tactics to become better and better.Multiplayer with friends or going all solo this game is amazing. 10/10

Rocket League is quite the good game. Who knew that rocket cars flying around in an arena casually blowing each other up and hitting balls could be so exhiliarating? When I first got this game I thought it was cool but didn't think I'd spend 200+ hours on it and yet here I am. What an amazing deal this game was and will be as I play more and more of this fun game.

This is one of those games that is generally awesome. Like the old cart racing + fighting games. It takes minutes to play and a very long time to master. I'd recommend anyone who likes driving games of any kind to give Rocket League a try. Watch some videos of others playing and decide for yourself.

Amazing games are those that are the first thing you think about when you wake up and is the last thing that you think about when you go to sleep. Rocket League is one of these amazing games. It has really cool features such as car customization and multiplayer. There is nothing that I can really think about that can fault this game. I definitely recommend this game to everyone. Thanks.

Cars. Cars and balls. Cars and balls and rockets. Cars and balls and rockets adn goals. GOOOOOOOOALS! Seriously though this game is fantastically addictive and is one of those titles that you'll find yourself loading up for a couple minutes just to play a round or two before leaving the house for the day. Awesome game play with solid graphics for the genre however you really do need a controller in order to play the game properly so keep that in mind before buying.

This is probably the best game I have ever played I'm hooked. Its competetive mode doesn't take nearly as much time as say CS GO or LoL and it's perfect for eSports. A player who has never played or heard of the game can easily watch and understand a tournament where very good players are competing. (Unlike games such as LoL) Even when you think you're really good there's always someone who discovers another hard and useful thing to know. 11/10 would post this review again

Plusses The controls are tight and the gameplay is deep the graphics are slick the music is bumpin' and the game is fun.Minuses The community is not as friendly as it could be not a lot of content or story. Other notes There is paid DLC but it is tastefully done. The mechanical skill required is difficult for newcomers but rewarding to learn.

What is there to say? This is probably one of the greatest all around games ever created. It's probably the most fun approachable multifaceted time consuming watchable games ever. No doubt. If you're actually reading this and you have not purchased Rocket League do it now and you won't regret it. Unless... by regret it... you might regret all of the time you'll lose as you sink your life into this game.

One of the best games I've ever played. The developers are great and add all sorts of stuff to the game free of charge. One of the few games where I will pay for cosmetic DLC just to support the makers. Rumble is chaotic fun this game just keeps getting better and better.

One of the best games I have ever played. The 5 minute game length makes it perfect for when you want to take a break inbetween working sessions. It's easy to play but hard to master which means it has a very high skill ceiling. You can play for hundreds of hours and still have a lot to improve. Remember to keep your camera locked to the ball and only switch when you are going to turn back and get the boosts!

hate football gameshate car gamesLOVE rocket leaguegreat game to play with friends or alone to pass time or even get sucked into.there is always new tricks or tactics to learn and always a way to be done over by the other team very challenging at times but in a way to push you on to become a better playerthis game is like a really hot girl with an STD really bad for you but you cant help but come back for more

I love it its fun and so addictive when you score wether its just a normal shot to an arial goal. its friendly most of the time people get salty if you miss now and again but it took a while for me to experiance that side of the game. overall great game and fun gamemodes.

Hands down the best $20 I've ever spent on a game. Don't even hesitate to buy! Only takes a few mins to get the hang of before you can play PVP but having months of skill will still pay off. This is one of those games where you can play for years and still enjoy it. Beautiful polished and fun for any age.

"This game is fun to play with friends! You could bump into their big butts and steal all their goals to prove your friendsip is real! D Other than that you could also fly like a butterfly to make your friends feel jelly of you. And also don't forget to ""HAHAHA"" at your friends when they missed the ball XD"

I would have paid $20 just to have the original on PC. This is a straight improvement over the original with more content on top of the amazing gameplay. I regret not purchsing this at launch. If you have played the original or just plain enjoy fun this title will blow your mind.

Very fun game. Pros Easy to learn but hard to master. Great e sport potensial. Great community Fun both alone and with friends. Unranked and ranked multiplayer. Good servers and good conectivity Cons None i can think of after 46 hrs ingame.Do i recommend it Oh yeah. I think this is a very fun game.

I've only logged 14 hours at this point but so far i absolutely love this game. Now i know this is my personal opinion and that everyone may not feel the same. The simple tuth here is that if you like a game that features intense competition then you will love Rocket League. That is unless you're some kind of wierdo ).Edit After 100+ hours i can now say that this is the best competitive multiplayer ever! Buy it now )

5 mins games (plus overtime if needed) and about 1 min to start the game and find a match. Brilliant game cant get enough of it. Servers are a little dodgy at the moment but they say they are working on it as they didnt expect the game to be so popular which is fair enough )

This game...is really good! I love this game so much it's really fun to play with friends and pretty simple when you think about it...but good graphics I love the backrounds on the arena they look like they have so much work put in to them. I'd suggest you get this game.

If you haven't purchased this game by now you're wrong especially with the steam summer sale going on currently. This is a great game with a tremendous amount of replayability. The concept of the game is quite simple however mastering it is nearly impossible. Psyonix is continously releasing DLC and updates tailored exactly to what their fans want. There is also a great eSports league dedicated to this game which is incredibly fun to watch. tl dr BUY IT!

This game is a great game. The only problems i have encountered have been the fake ranks that people have. i.e. rocketeers making rookie accounts to win more games and people using fake accounts and leveling up faster. Other than that it's a good game 11/10 would recommend.

Started playing RL at my ps4 the game was a free playstation plus deal that month. Great game so I bought it some months later on my PC! Still enjoy playing it and there are still point to improve myself that's also what keeps me playing. Nice to play with friends and solo is do able because the community is very nice. Nice dlc system not expensive and not pay to win but it adds a lot to the game.

"This game is a game worth trying out it's loads of fun and very addictive. It can be played both for fun and competetively. There is quite a bit of skill in this game and there'll be moments where you'll be ""WOW I MADE THAT SHOT"".Seriously worth every penny."

its an amazing game and I have some suggestions to improve the game in my opinion as listed below 1 adding mini map.2 switch to turn on/off infinite boost in training mode.3 team training with switch for infinite boost.thank you and enjoy this amazing game with friends and experience the adrenaline rush

Cool gaem. Simple premise executed well. Fast matchmaking fun to play by yourself or with your crew.The one problem I can recall is that controls are kind of lacking for PC version (peasants' fault as always). For instance there's still no acceptable mouse look implemented (although it might be planned).

"Rocket League Because ""Super Sonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars 2"" was too long.Seriously though this game is amazingly good fun with a few friends. I own it on PS4 and PC and can honestly say best multi platform game purchase I have ever made.Solid 10/10 from me."

"Rocket League pfft I see Rocket League like Randy Orton ""Watch out watch out RKO out of nowhere"". As this spectacular game comes out of the blue and for me and others stuns with it easy handling and basic system but with some additional skills can make some amazing goals."

I can't believe how much fun this game is. It sounds stupid when you describe it to people but I simply can't stop playing Rocket League it's soooo much fun. Great game to kill a few minutes enjoy split screen with friends take way too seriously or for a hilarious night with some buddies.

Rocket League is a very polished game. I've been playing it since the Alpha and it has far exceeded my expectations for a game that is only about scoring goals. The devs keep pushing out solid content and the competitive scene keeps growing. If you are looking for a game that is a blast all around I recommend Rocket League.Pros Competitive Fantastic devs Good community Great content for the priceCons Steep learning curve Crate System is hit or miss.

Really fun and addicting game. It is easy to learn but hard to master.I think it is easier to use a controller but I enjoy learning to play it with just a keyboard.Soccer + cars Usually I am no big fan of either but in this game I think they combine just fine.I think it is totally worth every penny!

It's a fun game that you should play with friends. This game is really fun so here are some pros and cons +fun+addictive+cars+great graphics+many customizations+challenging at times+both offline and online bad connections sometimes addictiveGreat game!9/10

"Product received for free. Buddy of mine bought this for me after weeks of begging to play with him. At first I was like ""nah.""Now I just gotta ask why you're reading reviews instead of scrolling up and hitting ""add to cart.""One of the best multiplayer games of all time!"

"Regarding value of your money you get a lot. This game is on discount nearly every sale so I d look for that if you re interested. Quick matches with or without friends offer tons of fun. Classic ""only 5min longer mum!"" feeling made this game one of my most played games in my library. Recommended!"

Best game I have ever been addicted to. I don't usually write reviews because I play a lot of games. But this one deserves it as it is by far the best game I have played. It has a experience like no other game. And it is hard to explain but it's like getting injected with adrenaline and running wild waiting on a outcome and sitting on the edge of your seat just to see your team win or lose. Love it great job Psyonix!

This game is one of the few that i have put my time into.When i first heard of this game a year ago i immediately bought it and began playing together with a few friends.this game has a great community and an easy learning curve. Like any other multiplayer game there still exists salty players which are trying to destroy the community.It has a nice and easy learning curve but it takes a long time to master.so i would rate this game 9/10.

"The first description of this game that was given to me was ""It's like soccer only with Hot Wheels."" I was skeptical at first. But after playing a few games with a friend who had this game I've been playing ever since.You can play casually or competitively. You can customize every aspect of your car. But best of all you can do a flying dunk into the goal and then fly away in style. This has become a go to game for me. 10/10."

Warning! Things tend to get loud when you play Rocket League do not buy this game if you have any of the following a) An unstable internet connection with terrible pingb) An unstable room mate with crippling anxietyc) An unstable neighbour who works too much 9/10

"It's like a drug. You first try it and are like ""hmm. This ain't too bad."" Then you try it again and again and again. Soon you're addicted. You need it. You have got to have it. It ruins your relationships because all you can think about is this drug. All you can do is this drug. This magnificent nasty life ruining drug called Rocket League. Probably need to open up a rehab center just for Rocket League. I highly recommend it. Best game I've played in years. 420/10 IGN blaze it."

"When you first buy the game it is HILARIOUS because you suck so bad but once you have played quite a few hours you can ariel and such then you start getting competitive. Every game is different. Amazing goals and saves really get you going along with those long overtimes that last FOREVER. And you must know there will ALWAYS be ""that one"" teammate who you will hate. (or love if he will be on the opposing team)I have spent over 100 hours on this game and it has not gotten old. 10/10"

I've never written a Steam review before in all my years......until now.It looks fantasticIt sounds fantasticIt plays smooth as butter whether you're in online matches or notIt's one of the funnest video games I've ever played. Period. And I'm picky. I've been begging my friends all day to buy this game. It's just ridiculous and insane fun.

You hate the game you love the game.It's so much fun everyone is equal so it's a really competitive game. It will feel random in the lower ranks but the game requires and rewards skill the higher and better you get.Free updates and paid cosmetics seems fair.The only thing I want is cross platform parties to play with my friend who is a console pleb )

Some of the most fun I've had playing a game in a long time. Fun by yourself or with friends. Nothing more satisfying than flying all the way accross the field in a rocket powered van. Very competitve feel to it but also is very fun if you're just playing it casually. Cross platform compatibility with PS4 makes it even better so there are more people to play with.Highly recommended and worth the $20.

Soccer with cars that sounds dumb Il just play FIFA. How wrong I was I held out far too long on this Game. When I finally bought Rocket League it has become one of my all time favorite games. Quick matches make it easy to fit in a quick game but like any quick game the time passes fast as you keep saying one more game.

&gt Playing ranked. &gt Trying to get my first aerial goal. &gt Do aerial freestyle into the goal with 0 seconds left to tie the match for OT. &gt Celebrating for epic win and goal. &gt Other team gets an epic save. &gt Lose match. &gt get demoted from elite to challanger. &gt Ragequit.pdf&gt 11/10 IGN would get game tying aerial goal stolen again.

"Very well made game it has a huge variety of ways to ""complete your goal"" the graphics are brilliant the gameplay is smooth. The only issue may be the occassional disconnect with servers but it definitely does not outway the excitement and replay value of this game. Could play for hours without getting bored... and if I didn't have to work ( 10/10"

This game continually gets better with each update. It runs extremely well and has short fun games to play against people. Also the constant drops of free hats sprays and trails make the game even more rewarding to play. Highly reccomend this game to any person who likes racing/ competitive games.

This game is A M A Z I N G !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!When I first got into the game I was sure it was going to be hard. But after you get the basics there is no limit for what you can do.Pros Endless tactics to score goals together as a team Entertaining gameplay All upgrades are just visuals Graphics are GREAT ! Upgrades for the cars are very nicely designed and it has some really funny ones too! wubba lubba dab dab Cons I actually couldn't find any.2139123712890730921310/10 would play again.

This Game is all about Timing..... and mastering the Games mechanics! Your Task is very simple...get the Ball into the Goal preferrably in the Opponents Goal. At first it can be very frustrating but when you are familiar with the controls it is one of the best Game s you will ever play.

Rocket League. Rocket. League. I love Rocket League. Like other people love heroin or affordable mating professionals. It s you up it makes you scream but you will always come back for more because when it hits you it feels soooo good. even after hundreds and hundreds of hours.15min overtime backwards turtle poolshot goal. gg ez.

The game is very addicting... I spent all night yesterday playing it and already went from lvl 0 12 due to the combination of my favorite things European Football and cars (RC cars in this case i guess). DEFINETLY WORTH THE PLAY IF you don't have a job....cause you'll forget you ever had one P

I really had no interest in this game despite having friends and family telling me I should play it. Finally became available for a free weekend I played for 5 minutes and purchased it.The assumption was it was simply a driving game but it's far more and quite more entertaining than expected.

One of my favorite games in a long long time.Very simple rules very simple inputs very interesting concept. It's soccer in a car that can fly.The fun in this game comes from how much can be achieved using the easy to pickup but impossible to master control you have over your car.To me it produces the feeling of playing Hockey / Soccer combined into videogame form. And it costs 20 dollars. I have payed that to get 1.5 hours of icetime. Buy this game

After playing this game for about a 1000 hours I can say that this is the game I've enjoyed the most per hour out of any game I've ever played. Only times I've ever not enjoyed playing Rocket League are caused by other people. But on the other hand all the time I've enjoyed and had hilarious games were with my friends in this game.

So much fun... the developers are brilliant!If you have a house that you can't scream or cheer out loud then this isn't the game for you! We play as a team of between 2 4 people and are always so loud that each of our respective family members have gotten upset! I hope that the developers can offer free counseling and gifts when necessary!

I almost died while playing this game... NO JOKE!The game was starting so I started rushing and took a huge gulp of coke and then next thing I know I started going dizzy and passed out for like one second on the floor this game is ING HARDCORE! BUY IT!

Theres not too much praise you can ever give this game.I would like to see in the future Customized chat commands to ie. change great pass to nice play ect.Make the goalposts transparent when at certian angles in the net your entire screen is black and you are effectivley useless.Other than that couldn't ask for more!

SUCH a fun game. In a growing E sports community this game continues to add the coolest customization new cool maps and the RLCS tournaments just keep getting better and better. The prize pools just keep getting bigger and bigger too. I cant recommend this game to enough people.

This is an all time favorite for me. the graphics are insane and the gameplay itself is just phenomenal and this game has hours and hours of replayablility. and to top that off the soundtrack is perfect for a game like this. also if your a total scrub at games dont worry you unlock an item after every game you play.

It's a very fun game. You can play with friends or random people. Games are set at 5 minutes but you tend to end up spending hours in one sitting. The basis of this game is amazing with how the game runs and the casual and competitive side to it.Also how could you say no to cars &amp rockets?!

The game is pretty simple and is hella fun. Eiter playing solo or with your friends you can expect hours and hours of fun without getting bored.Graphics are very good gameplay is simple and to the point and the soundtrack is really good!I think they still can improve the matchmaking experience a bit but they're always improving the game so i expect this game to be one of the most played on Steam. Top 5 maybe!9/10

Rocket League is a game dedicated to either team composition or strategic plays (either on your own or with others) and making sure your team is the best and rising to the top. I would HIGHLY recommend this game to anyonr looking for a game dedicated to teamwork!

Best game to play with your friends win cool items cool cars.The amazing reaction and scream you give your friend when make a sick pass and he makes a sick freaking goal this game is gold.Who tought cars and football would go well in a game? Well these guys did and they nailed it.

Awesome game really enjoyable as a begginner extremely challenging as you go up the ranks. Love the soundtrack and gameplay great for having a bit of fun with your friends. Ranked queues are quite engaging if you want to become the (very) best. Community is not salty (yet?) which is already better than most competitive esports' communities.

Soccer is boring. Soccer with cars is boring. But soccer with cars with rocket engines and the ability to climb walls and fly is amazing. Also incredibly addictive. Every match lasts 5 minutes so it's basically just highlights of a longer match.Rocket League is also easy to learn and get into but really hard to master.If you have friends that you like playing co op games with I strongly recommend this even if you don't care about soccer at all.

I Love this game so so much D Its great fun and there's all sorts of cool techniques to learn and master. There is never an end to how good you can get and in this game it is clear that practice makes perfect. Good satisfying intense friendly great to play with friends fun game D

If you like Driving a car and smashing it into an object from playing soccer you will love this game. It is driving and soccer combined into one to make a smashtastic soccer match. Throw your car at the ball to basically do anything in a regular soccer match stealing shooting ect. I highly recommend trying it because of all the combination aswell

This game make me go good I am never toxic and is like good game with me. Everybody like when they play against me it is like great fun. It is like non stop fun with this game. 1v1 is great to see how much you suck and it is really nice. Very gud nice.

This game is truly special its one of the best multiplayer experiences you can find anywhere. Whether its through the excellent split screen or online I've spent hours and hours at a time playing this with friends. Its extremely fun to attempt to master the intricacies and difficult aerial skills that go along with higher level play as well such that even though you may have started playing with friends for fun you'll find yourself coming back to it again and again.

Very competetive and endless amounts of fun. Having both regular and competative makes playing this game challenging and fun of your choice. I love the amount of varieties of cars you could pick from and how you could change it. You never find a car that looks the same as the last. Definitley recomend it to anyone looking for a non expensive game that is both challenging and fun.

Do you enjoy hydraulic equipped lowriders capable of flinging themselves gloriously skyward before succumbing to the inevitable embrace of Sir Isaac Newton's cruel overbearing guidance? day 3hunna i am hopelessly addicted to rocket league. i've begun to do flips around my house hoping i can hit some sweet shots. there is no ball though. nothing is real. except rocket league that is very real. we are rocket league you are rocket league this is rocket league. i bow in submission.

I love this game. My only complaint is that Aquadome that snowy map and Starbase arc are very laggy. I would highly recommend this game to anyone that has a good computer and 20 dollars. Never played the original but i can say that from what i have played and how much fun i keep having online and offline if you like competive and fun games just give it a try. ive had loads of fun with this and am looking forward to new maps and additions.

Very awesome game!The only thing that I don't like about it is that in the menus while using a controller you still have to deal with the cursor which is kind of annoying. I myself have enjoyed nearly every FIFA and racing game there has been. So what do you get when you put it together? This masterpiece! A strange concept done flawlessly included features that I have always dreamed of. The game is beautiful and the sound effects as well. Very fun and super addicting. Low learning curve makes it fun to play right away without to much of a hassle of learning the controls. There is also many layers of depth and complexity that will challenge an experienced gamer. The servers are great and I really love the fact that one is able to play with Playstation users!9.5/10

"As a fan of football (Soccer for all the people who are wrong) and cars this game is just the best dream come true.With nice graphics awesome physics the amount of customisation Rocket League is plainly manic fun especially with friends! Some people say they don't like soccer games or car racing games but they love Rocket League and it's easy to see why! Easy to get into but hard to master! It has become one of my recent favourite games to play and its even better when yopu play with mates.

Driving the rocket cars is by itself an enjoyable experience. The game has tight controls combined with a nice learning curve where you constantly learn new ways to better bend the vehicle to your will.Combine this with a very compelling game of soccer a thriving community and an excellent and responsive dev team. Rocket league deserves all the accolades it gets and more.

I really did not think I would enjoy this game. But this has been a few hours of enjoyment. A really enjoyable game in single player just trying to get my moves down. Probably one of the most fun games I've played in a while. Soccer with rocket cars is quite the idea. Pretty awesome that it's cross platform able. At least with the playstation 4. Anothe cool feature is plugging two controllers in gives you the option to do split screen. 10/10

Rocket League is always fun to hop in to a quick game. It is easy to play and challenging to master.I love the simplicity of the controls but depth of strategy. I recommend this game because everyone should experience the joy of making the perfect shot.

Amazing game very well polished and I have not yet seen one cheater on this game. It's worth your money. This game is simultaneously one of the most enjoyable and most difficult games I've ever played. It's fun because it's very easy to get the hang of and have a good time but it's difficult to master. It's quite the addiction. Online or offline. Simple concept executed very well.

It seems insane to say but this weird little car soccer game is possibly the purest expression ever of what actually playing sports is in video games. It's laughing uncontrollably even though you just lost and demanding to play again. The cars have hats.You need to own this game.

"This game will toy with your emotions. Experience the joy of seeing your firstborn by winning a tight match in OT and endure the shame of someone noticing your sweatpant erection when you score an own goal. Matches are quick but this electronic heroin will have you playing ""one more match"" until your eyes bleed."

This is one of the best purchases I've made.I've played its predecessor Supersonic Acrobatic Rocketpowered Battlecars on PS3. I can assure you that they kept the gameplay and style the same in this new HD version.The intense and also very fun matches can keep you playing for a long while.They also added A LOT of customization options for the cars which adds nicely to the battle playfield.Overall a great game I can fully recommend. 10/10

Really great playing solo but game really shines when you're in a group with a friend or more.Great game definelty recommend it.The amount of kids trash talking is bad in this tho so better turn off opponents chat and voice and you'll have a good time.

Rocket League is a true masterpiece. I like cars and I like soccer but I wasn't really sure about putting them together. Then I played this. Even though I spen most of my time in this game accidentaly dodging the ball missing aerials and flying into the opposite net or corner and generally screwing up I still love the game and it feels truly fantastic when I do something useful or hit a sick aerial. So... sometimes i wonder why dafak i play this game so much but then i realise that playing this game makes me want to kill myself sometimes and because of that i found a reason to live... I bought Rocket League because of a friend who said that it was fun and addicting.We were mad about CSGO crappy players and cheater so i gave it a shot.Following that I proceeded to play with him and some other friends.We were so bad but laughing so much that there's no way that I could say that this game isn't awesome.

Why does love always feel like a Rocket League?Tight controls and engaging gameplay make it a very enjoyable experience. This is also enhanced by the fact that DanielZo0 always manages to score epic goals and Vala makes incredible saves!An xbox controller is highly recommended when playing this game but other than that just purchase the game hit up some friends and let the beyblades rip as far as I'm concerned.10/10 would buy again.

Soccer with rocket powered cars. Sounds stupid and it kind of is but it's also one of the most enjoyable gaming experiences I've ever had and I just can't stop playing. It's a simple enough premise but the skill ceiling is so high that even after hundreds and thousands of hours of playing you're still always getting better and better learning new techniques and honing your car control.Grab a few friends boot up Rocket League and you're guaranteed to have a blast. Can't recommend enough.

Had family? Had friends? Had a life?Now you don't.10/10 played 17 hours in the last 3 days. As another guy said it made me forget about masturbating.Seriously one of the best games I've ever played and I'm so happy to have bought it at launch. The servers acted up the first 2 days (due to the massive amount of players 90.000) but now they are stable. PICK THIS UP!

Realy has the potential to be one of the best games here on steam.It is very fun to play alone or with firiends while even split screeen is an option.Play it casual with friends or alone or play it competetive in rankeds.Realy amazing and fun to play even if u dont have that much time to play some days.Highly recommended!

tl dr + Great graphics+ Great gameplay(controller makes it easier)+ Easy to pick up and learn the basics+ Extremly hard to master+ Surprisingly nice community+ Free Patches with new maps toppings antennas &amp so on+ Publisher that listens to it's community and is really active in the community hub+ DLCs that just add new cars which you dont need because they dont give you any bonus at all addicting

+Great game+Challenging skill curve very rewarding if you practice a bit+Very active Developer constantly adding new features+Developing Pro scene to follow Ranking system not perfectIts just driving and flying into a ball after all but you can go incredibly deep tactically and technically

"If you want to age 10 years via stress and heart palpitations buy this game. If you want to say ""I've got this win"" then get smacked down within 30 seconds and eventually lose buy this game. Its like soccer but with cars. It is faster paced but also easy to pick up. There is a high skill ceiling which makes mastering the game difficult to do and allows for longer game play. There is also nothing else in the store like this so it is a unique experience in itself.

Buy the game. Play the game. Love the game. Quit your job to play the game more. Leave your wife and kids for the game. Use your unemployment to rent an unfurnished rundown studio apartment where you and the game can be together without distraction. Live out your days in bliss.

The first day of playing was the most fun I've had with a game in quite a while. That's likely because when you start out you get matched up with rookies as well. The difficulty has significantly increased since the first day but that's not necessarily a bad thing.It's definitely a great game. Easily worth the $20. HOWEVER I would not shell out the cash if you don't have someone you can play with and communicate with whilst doing so.

An amazing game that will make you completely lose track of time and that also has the support of the developers and the community. The constant communication between the developers and the community regarding all aspects of the game allows this game to grow exponentially even years after release!

Rocket League is a really fun sports/car game!Driving a cool customized car while playing soccer basketball or ice hockey. This is one of the best casual games I've ever played. Doesn't require a super powerful computer and supports split screen on PC which is a big deal for me. I love the game and all the free updates with new maps and game modes that they've been adding.

Fast easy and simply just works. Great if you have just a few minutes to game wich can just as well turn into hours of gameplay. Once the round is done you are mere seconds away from the next one. Dont need to be a FIFA fan or race driver fan to enjoy this.

At first i was skeptical...not being a sports fan and not owning a controller. A sale came along I decided to roll the dice and couldn't be happier. Great game awesome gameplay graphics options and continuous content make this all the more worth the purchase!

Love this game with a passion. Game always stays up to date. Developers Listen to the community 100%. Easy to pick up and play but can take some time to master. Rocket League is a great rocket car powered soccer game. There are multiple levels to gameplay as you get more advanced. Great competitive game that's fun at every ability level but has an extremely high skill cap. The community is relatively nice in game and I've made more friends in RL than any other game I've played. If you like pvp racing games soccer and or explosions this could be the game for you!
