Can run on a potato because it's so well optimised.Update After playing more than 350 hours the above still stands. There are some maps that don't run on a potato and there are some frequent server issues. Don't let that stop you playing the game though!

pros very fun game with friends love the competition great variety of cars and skinscons pretty stupid ranking system (i dont know how Psyonix determines your wins/losses) some unfair match ups (e.g. experts matched up against legends) a few ball glitches and weird physics that could defintely be fixedOverall its a very fun game and has a lot of gamemodes. I would say its worth buying but the competitive side to this game can be frustrating.

Overall a great gameBUTthe community is ing toxic and cancer and the devs want to fix this by banning you from chat if you curse too much.which is ing stupid.They could have easily just blocked curse words so you couldnt even send it in the chat because if you get banned because you get angry on some idiot then you will get banned from text chat so you cant even answer to a normal person who wants to talk or trade or anything...Gr8 job psyonix.

Really a great game takes time to get good at but fun with friends! Definitely recommend! 10/10EDIT After awhile of playing this game because I reviewed it at about 28 hours I can definitely say that I am much better than what I was. So glad I bought this game and is still one of my daily games I play. Love the new update with crates cars and the new rumble gamemode. Honestly nothing bad I can say about this game.

I can't fly with my cars but I'm having loads of fun with my friends. Plus I can wear a wizard's hat and leave a trail of sparckles behind.Although repetitive not to mention that I don't like soccer this is a fun and enjoyable kick back and relax swear when you miss the goal game.

This game is worth your money everything about it is just so amazing. It's not easy to learn how to play but flailing your car about in a desperate attempt to score whilst screaming with your friends is just so exhilirating. Sick aerial goals feel better than cross map tomahawks anyway. Not recommended for anyone who wants to have a life outside of their houses. BEWARE Lag and performance issues are common! Make sure your that both your system and internet are good!

Absolutely addicting Game! Has a very high skill ceiling so be aware that you will have to invest a lot of time if you want to get really good. After 500+ hrs in I'm the 3rd highest Rank (Champ) and i would say I've just about mastered 50% of the things you can do in this game. Would recomment to anyone who likes fast paced competetive games.

Rocket League is the best team based online game I've played in years. There's a lot of gameplay here in such a simple package. The community can be a little toxic to be honest but that is true for many online games.The developer is tweaking ranked play and I think it will be solid in the next season.

This is one of the best games I have played in a very long time. It can be very challenging in some matches and completely hilarious is others. The developers continue to add new and exciting content with many cosmetics that allow you to customize your car. I don't spend money on costmetic items for video games usually...rocket league is one game that I make an exception for. Buy this game!

I love this game.I first tried it on PS4 with friends and I actually didn't like it at all.I gave it a try on PC during last sales and it's another experience. I highly recommend buying it well worth the 20$. It's my second most played games at the moment.And yeah try using a controller.

Went to a game of pickup soccer with friends and scored using my car. Killed the goalie but got a free hat. 5/7 would do again.The use of crates to supply DLC is a decision I fully support as it gives people a chance to trade for items instead of just purchasing them while those who have the money to do so can open the crates and support Psyonix.

good game overall but boring without friendspros +so much cars and items &amp and u trade with other players+skills and teamwork is the main thing you need (not pay to win)+you can create private server for you and your friends+singleplayer and season mode but very easy for most players+another sports modes+so much maps to play in+tournamentscons ranked system is terrible kids everywhere servers

I'd give a thumbs up and definitely recommend it.It's a lot of fun but players are a bit out of control latey. Cussing you out and then reporting you for their obscenities.Don't tell people not to ride your cootchie they will ban you for that but not bad the other players calling you a .Cootchie is much more harsh!!!

A game which made me yell and laugh out loud waking my neighbors and made me want to throw my laptop through the window. Getting used to playing with the 360 controller takes some time but once you get used to it (and sending wrong quick replies/commands with the d pad) you won't go back to the keyboard

I have aprox. 165 hrs on this game and I can say that its very fun but if you ever want to become actually good at the game you have to practice absolutely everything. It's like a full time sport where you have to put a crazy amount of time and effort in to break through the lower ranks. it is highly rewarding to be a good player though like any other sport.

"This game has consumed a large portion of my waking life so naturally I will explain why. I have no idea why I first played this game seeing as I do not enjoy ""sports"" games if that label even applies here. However I was instantly hooked and amazed at this games ability to be both simple and rich in depth of skill. Although they've become a bit gluttonous with their micro transactions this game still has incredible value."

Probably THE most addictive game i've played on a PC... perfect game design and simple yet genious gameplay mechanics using physics as a main toolEDIT After almost 1000 hours I'm still hooked to a game that I never thought I would play more than a few games )... a must buy!

If you like soccer and jumping cars well you got just the thing. Rocket league is a very fun game and you could go competetive if you'd like a fairer match. But if your ping is bad I don't recommend because you'll end up not playing and teleporting like a mad man. Otherwise it's a very good game.

Rocket League is my first love. The first game I owned to get over a hundred two hundred three hundred hours. It has been a complete joy to play. I recommend this to anybody who likes to play with friends. It has everything thing that you would want in a game. A casual and more stressful mode for people looking for more serious competition. Its perfect.

This game........THIS GAME!! It is a very simple concept yet difficult to master. While there is 1v1 this game is best experienced if played with a team preferably with your friends. At first i didnt expect this game to be groundbreaking but now i think its safe to say i love this game more than other big titles such as CS. This game was perfect from launch day and the updates can only make the game better. 50000000/10

This game taught me the concepts of sin cos and tan. It taught me how to calculate geometry on the fly. I am a better person at math because of this game.This game also taught me that i can break a controller really easily by slamming it against my desk.10/10

This is the game that I've been spending most of my time on it and it never gets me bored. The core gameplay is just so consistent and interesting that I could play alone or with my friends at any time. The variation of customization also drives me crazy with excitement. I love this game! I LOVE IT !

Rocket League is a game that is best understood after a game played. For me I could not imagine liking this game. A friend got a four pack about a year ago and after one game I was hooked. This game is my favorite. The game is so simple that anyone can understand how to play but so difficult that nobody can master it. Truly a masterpiece.

300+ hours and still trying to learn new skills within the game. This game is very easy to pick up but rather hard to perfect. I can't recommend this game enough especially when it is only $20!Edit Now have over 800 hours and am still learning new skills

Great game....... If you play with a group that understands DONT hit the ball towards your own goal. Once you get the hang of flying and flips with accuracy you will rule the field. Just remember teamwork and every so often stuff will happen that will make your jaw drop.

Massively fun immersive &amp thrilling esport on the brilliant Unreal 4 engine runs really smoothly even on an older system while still looking beautiful. There is a competitive league and various more casual game modes. Only missing a racing mode. Matches last about 5 mins each so it's always easy to pick up and put down... and then pick up again!Can't believe how addictive this is maybe thanks to the continued support from the developers?

"Clocking in at 1000+ hours and there is still more to learn. A stupidly high skill ceiling will ensure that the next 1000 hours are spent climbing the ranks.The developers are actually trying to give the players a better experience with every update.As for the award you know how the saying goes ""Can't end the night on a loss."""

Football + Cars + Rocket Booster Rocket LeagueFly around make epic goals epic safes and have tons of fun!! Very performance friendly Cross plattform (PC/PS4) Easy to learn Hard to master Nice graphics Customizations Rockets on Cars Funny Game Modes More Customization

This game of car football started off small with just normal football then it made Ice hockey then it made basketball sure these wernt popular but i gave good content to the community that psyonix but sure 2 years after the game was launched the server are still but with the competitive system and the gamemodes for the casual players is enough to entertain anybody!

Best sports Game in years!Constant free contant updates as new game modes new arenas and new items! And they do listen to the comuntiy and do change a lot of things the comuntiy recomands for example Saveable presets of Car s being able to set different items to each color of the car.I played it almost everyday since i got it. And since they added the Rumble mode its like a totaly new game. Great mode! Ok sometimes new added Achivements are bugged but they fix it after some time )

"It's really rather simple. Live your life or play Rocket League. There is no ""do both"" option once you start. Get a hold of some friends (or play with other random addicts online) and forget time place job girlfriend/boyfriend kids to eat etc and so on and just play this game."

The best $20 I have ever spent on steam. Hands down.An absolute RIOT to play with friends.EDIT Still the most fun game I've played with friends.EDIT STILL the best 20 dollars I have ever spent.EDIT STILL the best 20 dollars I have ever spent but the Rocket Pass is kinda aids.

Easily my most played game of all time. Maybe Final Fantasy 7 can give it a run for its money but by and large this is the most addicitve game I've ever played. I love it. I want to bone the cars sometimes because it's so good. That said invest in an indestructible controller because sometimes you will get so you will on your controller before throwing it off a mountain. Really.

Cool Unique and fun gameThe perfect game to play with friendsAfter 1200h it is still one of the most enjoyable games ever.You can always improve and learn new playing styles.After 1600h they made Rocket League great again. By releasing sports to the ranked playlists. Amazing.Side note Some bugs have been in the game for a long time.

Another glorious rage quit simulator. If you have enough tolerance for children who are on the same level and constantly insult you then it is a good game.With enough friends to play... it is pure joy. After exactly two years since I wrote this review you can have I feel of accomplishment by reporting harassment of any kind AND some days pass you log in you get a message that something was done against someone you reported. Yay?!

Rocket league is one of the best games i've played in years and the best to play with friends.The thing i like most is that you dont have to always be competitive so you can just go around and learn how to freestyle and have fun. while other people who like the competitive side of the game more can play competitive with other people who like that aswell. Thats why i nominated Rocket League for the best game of the year

Just BUY IT! This is the most awesome game I've ever played or seen. You can jump in for 1 or 2 matches or play 5 hours straight. Play in casual mode or test your skill in ranked. Rage with team of randoms or gather your friends and kick some It is still lot of fun.If you really don't know wait for sale but I assure you it's well worth the money. Hell I'd sacrifice my leg and some non vital organs if I had to.

A friend recommended this game and i was like meh.... But this is the most fun i have had with a game.... (going back to NES times in my brain....) .... ever!!!! Really... buy it... Even if you do not like soccer or driving games... And if you should be a fan of the former Top Gear Team.... BUY NOW JEREMY COMMANDS!!! .... and me too. You will not regret it... especially with some good buddies!

The game is basically football with cars instead of people but have to say haven't played a more fun sports game than this one. The game is very interesting and would recommend it to anyone who is searching for a game to have fun with although there is a competitive part to the game as well.

"10. For (i monday i++) 20. morning of ith day 8AM 30. ""I'll play 3 games of rocket league and get to finish some really important work. ""40.50. 10 hours of rocket league later 60.70. ""I'll get up really early tomorrow to compensate for today.""80. Continue Loop.10/10 would destroy their careers again"

Very fun game but only recommend if you have a few friends to play with knida boring if you dont but if you do this game is great. I didnt think it was going to be worth the money so i got it on sale Id buy it again and again now... one of them games were if you win your happy and mad if you lose. Constant updates making the game better and better easy to run and the graphics are ing dog... just buy it and refund if you dont like it... but you will... probaly...

love this game its a perfect mix of sports and racing. Its a great clean game that I think is also great for playing with friends and is enjoyable for a wide variety of people. Highly recomend it. (Note If you are planning to use this game on split screen you need two controllers will not work with keyboard and controller)

Simple fun turned into competive fysics its fast paced action in which control strategy but mostly skill are ever important +Great dev+Cheap n Fast DLC. +Hard to master+Fun n Fast paced Controller is by far the best control systemA 32 hour marathon made me realise I crave my cherry browns.

Stop reading reviews and just get the game. for every minute you waste reading reviews you are missing out on the combustable flying customizable rocket car kicking overly large soccer balls (which don't even look anything like soccer balls) action... and we all know you don't want to miss any of it.

"When I bought this game I would have never thought I would now almost have 300 hours in this and still be playing it ten months after I bought it. But the game is just easy to pick up and super fun to play together with friends. The ""easy to learn hard to master"" type of game."

A really addicting great game. I've been play This game is definetly a fun one to play with but could still use a bit of improvement. There is quite a bit of lag and the match ups can be really bad when new players get paired up against/with level 20+ players. If some of these things are fixed as well as a few other bugs this game has huge potential. Plus who doesn't like hunting and killing their friends?ying it for ages and it's fun and exciting and very competitive. 100% perfect.My only negative point about this game is that now i'm on anti depressants it is very difficult to play effectively. It's kinda crushed me that i can't play competively anymore.

Super fun with friends. You don t even need to be good at the game to enjoy it. I think that this game is good to play when you have 2/3 friends and all of you are bored just join rocket and you will be more happy! enemy goals are not included in this happiness but... when your team scores its a really cool moment D Also games are super fast so if you are just spending a little time this game is great )

Having to write a review for the first time for steam so it may aswell be this Bought it on sale a while back for about $15 a little under 400 hours later and i still can't get enough of it! Have bought all their DLC and i don't plan on stopping any time soon. Great community of gamers and supporting developers who are constantly updating and improve this game9.5/10 .5 deduction for making wasteland a thing

Really an amazing game.. One of the best soccer realated games on Steam. Fun to play with friends and also to play online with randoms. Has many gamemodes that you will enjoy and that's what made this game unique. Any computer can basically run this game.. you don't need a complicated setup. Amazing game 9/10

Alright so... the game itself is awesome and I can easily say it's my favourite game on steam. There are a lot of maps cars and customizations but there's one thing that I hate about this game... the community. Sadly it's full of s ready to insult you for every little mistake you make. If they lose it's your fault if they win it's their merit.So yeah you should definitely buy this game you're gonna have a ton of fun but bring some friends with you!

If you love cars and soccer this is truly your dream game!This game is both competitive and fun and is definitely worth more than a cheap $20Definitely one of my favourite games so far!Definitely recommended to get it especially if you are a fan of soccer/racing.

I love this game!!! I have a few suggestions You should add a Super Rare item/car. It should be abled to be sold on the market and it should have like a 1/10000 chance of getting it after an ONLINE game. It should be a red colour.You should reduce the amount of XP gained in exhibition mode to stop people farming.

First game Didn't know what I was doing Didnt touch the ball Couldn't figure out how to jump/boost Kept hitting space to jump and changing the cameraSecond game Looked at settings to figure out how to controll Somehow scored a hat trix Got boosted from level 1 to level 4 forgot to save replayNext Played tutorials Failed at tutorials Still suck at game Still wonder how I scored that hat trixYou can ride on walls use your rocket booster to fly and the music is pretty good.10/10 Awsome game!

Easy to learn hard to master. Fun game to play solo even more fun with friends! Graphics music gameplay interface etc. everything is smooth and clean. This is the kind of game where you still have fun losing while watching a replay of the other team scoring an epic goal.

Rocket Cars capable of flight driving on the ceiling/walls double jump dodging. In door arena soccer combined?It's quite fun easy to pick up quite difficult to master very addicting. A lot more addicting and fun than you'd expect just watching streams of it. Tons of unlocks and it sounds like the devs will be behind this one for a while. Totally recommended at face value or especially whenever it gets discounted.If you're tired of the endless stream of MOBAs FPS' and RPGs give it a shot.

Rocket League. This game can be a fun and rediculous game with the cars paintjobs flags hats ect. But once you realize that it can be something more than a silly game it can be super intense man. Like the silly parts of it hides the esports part of it and its crazy. The game get more tough the more you play through it. Me and my close friend realized it early on once it got us hooked on it. Lets just say its super stressful.

The game is so much better than intially thought. The idea of cars playing football should stay on the TV (Top Gear).....oh how wrong I was! Such a great game when played with friends it is well worth the 15. You will have many many hours on this game guaranteed!10/10 Would try flying around the arena again!

An amazing remake of the game Battle Cars. It's a truly unique game. The game is simple you customize your own car then you use it to play in a physics based soccer/football game. The game can be quite challenging at first but once you get the feel of the game it is truly an addicting game. Graphics Quality 9 / 10Gameplay 10 / 10

One of the best games I've ever played. When it comes to gameplay also lots of free updates.Crates are little bit weird also events now have microtransactions. Also had to mute all the chats because the community is really really toxic. Still can't stop playing this game just too much fun.

Product received for free. Pretty fun game. My buddies had been asking me to play with them for quite some time finally started playing and I loved it. It's got fun competition and I'm always on the edge of my seat feeling like I'm at some sort of sporting event getting loud when the ball gets close to goal then sighing when it doesn't go in. All fun and games love it.

8/8 gr8 m8. Really fun game! I love playing it! Great community and hours upon hours of entertainment! If you are thinking about getting this game do it. If you do not like it keep playing it. It gets better as you get better. If you can't get better watch youtube or twitch and it really helps! Thanks for making this great game Psyonix!

One thing you need to know about this game is that it's competitive as .Don't listen to the reviews saying that it's relaxing casual or whatever this is real and you will get yelled at.Just a friendly warning but the game is still awesome just suggest playing with your friends that way it's much more fun.

"5 more min? Games only go for 5min.... 3hrs later *played multiple games*.....""Well that game went for a little longer than expected""Fails english class because didnt hand in english assignment on timeThus doesnt know how to speak englishMoves to Japanmovetojapan/10"

Just love it. Great game constant content created by them for the player base. While the games community can be toxic sometimes overall the community and it's streamers are amazing banding together supporting their game and generally making it fun to log in and spend your time there.

Seriously addictive game once you get the hang of it! It is true that you might have to invest a lot of hours before you can do cool stuffs skill wise(around 200). But once you are out of the beginner's phase you can really add up the hours quicker than you think. Amazing game! never get tired of playing it.

Rocket League is a game that is very easy to pick up and even harder to put down. I've never been a fan of soccer or even sports games in general but something about this game just keeps me coming back every time I look at it. I would definately recommend this game to anyone of any age!

After being on the fence about playing this for a while I killed some toilet time by watching some livestreams of people playing this. I decided to buy it to give it a shot. 10.3 hours into day 1 I have killed my day off and still want to play more. This is awesome especially with friends.

Flying cars playing soccer? Bah leave me alone.Im not a great fan of sports games especially not soccer but this doesnt have a lot to do with soccer.Simply one of the most dynamic and rewarding titles i have ever played.servers 9/10graphics/audio 9/10gameplay 10/10learning curve 8/10 (git gud)skill factor 10/10gamedesign short intense rounds. still qualifying for the long term.Holy cow! Everybody dance!

10/10 One of the best if not the best game ive played ever. Gameplay is great and so is everything else.My only issue with it is that the game often crashes when match making and it always crashes when trying to change the wheels for my car. I would love this to be fixed

Was playing Rocket League and heard someone knocking at the door. Fought the dogs to get to the door and listened to a teen as she asked me to donate to a charity to help teens. Went back inside for the checkbook and wrote the teen a check. Come back to play rocket league. Kicked from the match and banned for 8 minutes for leaving the match.10/10 would get banned for donating to charity again.

Highly Highly reccomended. There's nothing else quite like it. Rocket league is one of those games that is easy to get into but extremely hard to master. You will have just as much throwing yourself at the ball in the first 10 hours as you will hitting aerials into the goal at 100 hours. The games are quick and satisfying and always leave you wanting more. If you pick this up on sale you will not be dissappointed. $13 is a steal.

One of the most fun multiplayer gaming experiences i have ever had (and i'm still having). Simple to learn but hard to master yet anyone can have fun. The game keeps getting better with each update thanks to the competent devs. It will keep going for a long time!

I finally understand Wall Street. I finally understand the 1%. I finally understand Capitalism. I witnessed a van wearing a sombrero propel itself across a soccer field using nothing but money. I am a true capitalist now. If only there were wheels with dollar signs to truly express my love for the stock market.Oh wait.There are.God bless America.And Mexico I guess.

Rocket League is a great and unique game one of a kind. It's great who wouldn't love football with rockets!? Because damn a lot of people do (including me). Dev team is really active and really active on community forums reddit and twitter. They have some great ideas and keep implementing them. The game just keeps getting better and better! Definitely worth the price.

Rocket league is one of the best racing games on steam. Its really fun and rewarding when epic stuff happens. The customization system is good and allows every player to make a unique car. The dlc doesn't make the game P2W because its purely cosmetic.I think this game is really cool so i will recommend it to anyone.BUT If you do not own a gamepad controller for pc i wouldn't buy it.

I rarely review games but Rocket League has earned a special place in my extensive library. Its like playing soccer but less boring. Fly through the air drift spin in circles score goals a multitude of ways and demolish your enemies I personally enjoy demolishing my enemies. Definitely worth a buy.

"Great game! You may think at first that how does a soccer game which is played with flying cars could be fun well it is! When a friend first told me about this game I said ""Nah not interested"". Then a bunch of other friends bought it too so then I decided to give it a try and I'm not dissapointed.You can spend hours on a single session playing with your friends and it's really competitive.Recomended 100%."

This game is so much fun. It's soccer... but with cars. It's one of those games where even if you're in that situation where you gotta play alone it's still super fun. Well priced. Graphics are great. Gameplay Mechanics are awesome. Easy to learn. Super fun to play. Even better with friends. Highly recommend this game. 10/10 for sure

Honestly I think the unique feature about this game is the game is about Cars and Soccer which is the only game I know that is about Car Soccer I think Psyonix Developer puts effort into making the players happy and make the game fun This might not be entirely true but I think they really give it their best.

Rocket League where if you dont do well your teammate calls you noob and get's angry i kind of like that....Its entertaining. Great game a MUST if you played the prequel Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars. A nice game that teaches team play control over emotions and eliminate errors by trial and error. An excellent skill based competitive physics game where you control a battlecar in a football match. A brilliant idea that is hard to understand without having played the game.Even though I am not a fan of racing games nor soccer games this particular experience is always enjoyable and leaves me wanting more. The best game to begin playing at 4 00 PM and look at your clock and realize that it's 2 00 AM. You get lost in this game and never want to stop playing. It's the most addicting game I've ever played with a huge skill ceiling.Edit 700 hours in still amazing. In case you wanted to know.

So is Rocket league worth the money ? Soccer meets driving once again in the long awaited physics based multiplayer focused sequel to Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars! Choose a variety of high flying vehicles equipped with huge rocket boosters to score amazing aerial goals and pull off incredible game changing saves!

Rocket league is easily in my top 5 games of all time. It has wonderful purly skill based multyplayer. It's fun for all ages (with mute) and for all skill levels. The developers are always adding new features that enhance the experience as well as fixing problems pointed out by the community. You will not find a better value in gaming.

Man this game is addictive and fun. I am a challenger 2 right now in solo ranked and was challenger 1 in doubles before I started learning to play on controller. Excellent Game.Original idea well executed very fun to hit balls around with flying cars. Note that it can be a little frustrating at first but if you keep playing it will become easier. Easy to learn insanely difficult to master but still fun!Fantastic art style look + feel.Only game where I don't care about losing even after 1000+ hours of playtime.Great devs constantly interacting with the community.Unless you only play games with a story + campaign there are few reasons to not like this game.

You would think car soccer is dumb but in reality its the one of the most perfect games out there. Although seeming to be less mechanically intensive as other games once you begin to understand what makes the difference between a good and a great player you see that it really is. As someone who has lost interest in soccer I still find this game very fun and entertaining.

If you somehow haven't heard of this game by now get INSIDE from OUTSIDE and start ballin with cars and soccer balls! You ever watch Top Gear? They did this and then BOOM Rocket League is born. Best part is Everything. You not a fan of soccer? Who cares. Not a fan of cars? Not my problem. You a fan of kickin some a$$ and snapchatting sick goals to your friends to make them totes jelly? I bought this game and didn't play it for a few months. "Neo Tokyo Hype!!! ......... ""Ten outta Ten"" JonTron... but in all seriousness... this is a really great game it's really unique... and it's just an overall fun game to play... I rate this game.... a... ""Ten outta Ten"" JonTron..... ok i'll stop now XD"

"When I was first shown rocket league my reaction was ""really? rc cars and soocer woooo"". However after a couple games it is straight up addictingly amazingly fun and it stays fun just because of the skill involved there is always room for improvement."

Incredibly fun game for all skill ranges.Offers a unique gaming expereince that can be both casual or competitive. Rocket league allows an expansive customisation system and allows players to trade with each other. It is an extremely addictive game that you can play solo or with your friends. Simply fantastic. This game has the community and support that every game wants. The gameplay and aesthetics won't stop making me come back for more. I'm not exactly good at the game with only me and my keyboard but the exhilarating feel you get when scoring an epic goal or save is so addicting. Spectacular game.

High intensity game with near to no entry skill level and a very high skill ceiling. Makes for a awesome game to play with friends on lan or over voip. Has crossplay with the playstation community and the community itself is fairly chill. Fantastic soundtrack good visual design and the different maps are great. Convinced

With amazing fast paced rocket cars and very fun battles I have yet to have a bad game.All the amazing accrobacies you can do in this game give you a very rewarding feel after performing this game is a must have.If you are on pc get a controller though because it's much better with that.

Rocket League is an amazing game you can have so much fun by just hitting a ball. honestly this game might seem a little bit childish at first but once you get enough hours in the game (say 100 hours) then a sense of teamwork and accomplishment will rise when you play (especially when you successfully score your first aerial goal). 20 dollars spent on this game is 20 dollars well spent

"I love this game! At first I was very hesitant about the purchase. I thought it would be a ""weekend game"" play it once and watch it collect dust. Damn was I mistaken. Amazing game highly recommended for anyone. Competative or casual you're bound to like the game."

Awesome game really enjoying it really quick and the game never crashed for me. Nothing like i've ever played before. Nothing i ever expected to play. And probably will never play anything like for a long time. Unique fast complex and pretty but easy to get into. And the Esports scene is taking of in a big way. Almost 3k hours played still just as if not more fun. Buy it nothing like it out there.

Very high skill ceiling for competitive players and also allows for casual fun if you dont play everyday.Game engine's physics are simple but diffcult to master (in terms of vehicle control).All vehicles have same stats which is good for balance and are only different for preference of looks and physical hitboxes.Just overall fun to play even when you aren't good and still learning to play. I recommend for anyone who can use a controller for pc. 10/10

"This is easily one of the most instantly addictive games I've ever played.You ever hear the saying ""a minute to learn a lifetime to master""? It was made for games like this. There's nothing complicated in the mechanics of it just in the interaction between players. It's just good old fashioned fun with a new paint job.Just one more game... just one more game..."

Great game to past time with friends.Played about 1 500 hours on PS4 and a bit on here and it is never ending fun. From the first goal to your 5 000th goal you will still feel the same never ending satifaction of destroying the other team and spaming (What a Save!).bought this game for all my friends and i do not regret my purchases.

This game is one of the best sports multiplayer ever made. It is a remake of SSARPBC and while the first game had a small community of PlayStation players this game has taken everyone by storm. It is a typical example of a game which is easy to play but tough to master. I recommend everyone to give this game a try on whichever platform you like PC PS4 or XBO and give it atleast 5 10 hours of play and the next 100 hours will automatically follow.

This game is Amazing! I have been playing for Almost 1 year and a half and Ive gotten so good. There are many ranking sytems and can trade Many items. It is a very diverse and different game and there are none that compete against this game. I would defienelty recommend this you if you havent bought it yet!

Well good for the most part! I really like Rocket League. Its a fun game to be playing with your friends Good trading system You can make some good profit from here. Good and friendly community.But some things are really annoying and have to be fixed! Servers are laggy in 3v3 or 4v4 Frequent ping fluctuations Frequent fps dropsThese factors really make it a bad experience playing this game.

With over 1000 hours in the game it's about time I give this a rating. Obviously it's an amazing game. The skill it takes to be good is what drives me to continue playing all the time. The devs are constantly coming out with new content and game modes and there's never a dull moment. The only downside really is the servers sometimes as they are known to have some issues. If that could be resolved everyone who plays it would have nothing to complain about as that would make it a solid 10/10.

I know it says that i've only played for 2 hours but ive played about 1000 hours on console. This is hands down my favorite game of all time. While many other games I've played tend to get boring after a while I never stop coming back to Rocket League. The fact that it takes years of practice to become better and improve makes this such an amazing game to play because it makes you want to get better and rank up. After 500 hours of play time it's time for a review! This game still continues to amaze me in that I'm still learning advanced techniques to improve my game play. Super addictive random crazy game play keeps me coming back for more! The devs are really active and continue to modify and add content to the game. If for some reason you live under a rock or haven't bought or played this game GO BUY IT RIGHT NOW! Highly recommended! The come back is real!

well i thouhgt after putting over 2k hours into this game i would finally go and write a review.TLDR if you dont own rocketleague yet then where have you been?It is THE game when it comes to easy to learn hard to master. The skill ceiling is enormous and with continued developer support there is no other game out there that has brought me as much joy as rocket league has.

This game is awesome and very unique Psyonix is releasing updates from time to time to fix the problems the community has within the game. Also this game is beginner friendly since you will (mostly) get matched against new players too. Also the training system is really useful for both beginner to pro. Overall a very fun and entertaining game. Really recommend it. A must buy!

Rocket League is one of those games that people question you for playing until they themselves have played it because the concept of it sounds straight out of a child's imagination.So to explain that point Rocket League is a child's dream with an added twist of competitive nature to attract any age group but also keep people playing with its harder mechanics that make you want to learn.

My view on this game? Buy it ONLY if you want to play it with your friends or on single player. The graphics are cool the gameplay is easy to catch and has a good set of skills to master.I strongly recommend it!! Again as far as you don't play with strangers.

I thought this game would be massively difficult but I was grateful to find out that thought it does have a learning curve its not that bad to be able to learn how to use the controls and start scoring goals! Highly recommend even if you are on the fence!!!!

Simply put it's a ton of fun. One of the most polished products out there. but where Rocket League really shines is its UX. So many more games should allow you to sit in matchmaking queue while you get in a few practice rounds then pluck and drop you right into your game when ready. Marvelous.9/10

Great game but over the past year or so the developers add stuff that isn't desired (crates xp leveling) and should know better than to merge casual and competitive. Recent changes now prevent two of the best modes (rumble and soccer) from being queued concurrently which was previously available. For many players the changes made over the past year have only had a negative impact on their gaming experience. Disappointing.

A very fast paced car ball (ok I know I made the word up myself).It is a good game if solo and a great game if playing with fiends. Rocket League is a Unique Game Based on scoring a ball using cars!Pros Decent Graphics for a Game like this typea Perfect Game If you have Friends to play with.anew Perfect idea that you cant try anywhere else!Trading System is Just Amazing!Constant Updates to keep the game up to date and new items cars fixes and new gamemodes!Cons There is a very large Scamming community!Overall a Game With that price and this unique game Would Recommend!

Easy to learn hard to master.Rocket League guarantees hours of fun with or without playing with friends. The community is rather active despite the fact that the player count has decreased during these two years since release. The game itself runs very smooth and is rather lightweight while still giving pleasure for your eyes. It still sort of lacks content so I for one hope that the developers continue to add great content to the game.

I think I've played enough of this game to write a review.This is a really great game and is worth buying. I recommend playing on a controller.It's really fun and it can be casual but even from gold and higher it gets really competitive and hard. There are a lot of mechanics that you can learn and there's always something new to do. The key and crate system is ok and you can get free keys (you can't trade with the items tou get from crates opened with then decryptors) for playing the game.

all in all worth the money+nice visuals+ranked mode+dlc s cheap and mostly cosmetic +new maps and game modes are free+cross platform+spectator mode+save replays made easy+did not encounter any hacker yet drive /physic model hard to pick up hard to master UE3 (2006!!!) DX9 (2004!!!) matchmaking fails way to often to creat an even match temporal serversided lags (rare but present) too few decals too many Hats/FlagsReview based on MAO

"Rocket League is basically completely physics based football/soccer with rocket powered cars. The aerial goals are done by jumping pointing the car up and boosting. There's nothing else. Rocket League is a very good game many amazing features and has different types of game modes. The only problems I have had is a few of the newer maps not being like the originals. The main map in particular Neo Tokyo is very good but makes the player have to adjust massively towards the terrain difference. Overall an amazing game and would reccommend to anyone. Make sure to use a controller though otherwise it is extremly hard.

super fun game. Was very skeptical and was worried it would kind of suck but luckily I gave in to all the great reviews and feedback of how fun this game is. I did not think I would like this game as much as I do. It's super fun and very challenging but rewarding when you make those great plays.

is physicly impossible to hit the ball when you start. You join a game and find that you cannot get higher than 10 points. You train a bit and find that now you can hit the ball. You train some more and overtime you are now a pro. This is rocket league. practice.is.key

I loved the way that Psyonix implemented the hitboxes and turning radius of the cars to make each one a little bit different instead of just reskinning the same car. I highly recommend this game to those looking for a challenging but fun way to play soccer.

Product received for free. This game is very fun and does not get tired after a couple of hours playing it has more mod than just classic. Occasionally when you have a camera on the ball so when the ball moves from side to side you will start to shake your head. 9/10

At first glance it is childish and simple game. Maybe it's true but this childish and simple game is one of the best independent games. Played this game for a long time.It's honestly really good. I can say that this game is insanely addictive and fun for anyone! I have over 1100 hours in rocket league and would advise you try to get your friends in on the action. Friends will make any game more fun but for rocket league it has a whole new meaning. Would recommend this game to anyone!

This is by far one of the best games I have played. It never seems to get old or dull especially when you have friends to play with. The new road map is especially exciting! Firstly i would like to say that the graphics of this game are excellent. Watching it on youtube was also entertaining. At first you will get annoyed at missing the ball and getting scored against shortly after like i did but you will eventually get the hang of it )

A very fun replacement for Grifball. The AI is brain dead so don't play them. Hop online play it and suck for the first 100 hours. You'll have good games and some bad ones. By the end of it though you'll know what you're expected to do and there's no feeling quite like pulling off a perfect pass that sails right in front of the net for your teammate to slam home. I highly recommend if you have the time to put in to it.

This game is one of those games that you can put hours into and still not master. It is easy to learn but hard to master. It has a deceptively large amount of depth with a high skill ceiling and that's how I think all games should be. Above all this game is fun regardless of skill level age or interest in real world football. I believe this is a game almost anyone will enjoy and I strongly recommend everyone to try it out as you get a lot of hours for a relatively small amount of money.

"This game is way too addicting for one's own good. Last night I played for 7 straight hours and 123.4 hours in 3 weeks. this is insane. I just say ""one more match"" and it turns into three hours! it's insane! I have to turn down my video settings but it runs well and plays great"

Rocket League is fun.No other ways to put it.It's fun when you just start if you dont take it very serious. Fun as a little game to play with friends.But oh my my if you take it serious. If you are a real competitive player you'll have the time of your life.

Lots of fun to play with friends! So far I only found that there is a slight problem with the server. Even with that I would recommend people to buy the game and play it with friends since it covers all its mistakes with endless fun and excitement!

consistent and solid physics that are easy to understand but very hard to master make for the perfect competitive game. Also has cool car customization and is frequently updated.Chinese player beware. Psyonix has partnered with Tencent for the chinese release of this game.

Nearly perfect game. After two years and 1800 hours on two platforms I can't see the end sight. The mix of slightly unbelievable but reliable physics with a meta based entirely around skill (no RNG) means there is literally no cap on the skill one can achieve. The better I get at the game the more I realize not only how much I CAN improve but that I still Want to. Anyone with a love of both sports and video games should try Rocket League though getting hooked requires neither.

One of the better multiplayer games I've ever played! It's soccer. With ROCKET POWERED CARS. Nuff said.Sometimes you do run into salty emote spamming players but really that's the only complaint I have in over 50 hours of gameplay. Great for quick matches great for co op play with a couple of buddies and the fact that the dev team are still rolling out new content and game modes is always a plus. An easy recommendation.

I love this game. You don't feel it but you get better really fast. I used to go into the games and be worried I'd mess up. Now? I'm looking for chances to style on people. Nothing feels better then hitting that aerial goal.The competative in this game can get INTENSE. matchups seem to always be against people at or above your skill. Grab a couple of friends sit down and have a blast.there's only one downside to this game. the cancerous community. that's all hahaha.

This game is a lot of fun I have played it for a while and still enjoy it. Psyonix's practice of never selling advantages in the game (extra boost is all I can think of) of any kind is wonderful and the only factor that decides who wins is skill (and a little bit of luck).I rate it a 9/11. great game would play again.

There's really no description that could explain this game properly its soccer with cars but not simple.
