EDIT I changed this from negative to postive...here's why It's original with it's unique idea!It's nice to grind and learn new stuff.You can team up with a lot of people or trade !!I used to have connection issues and when i contacted them they were very responsive and helpful!!! and after i could play properly i knew how awesome it was.Thanks for reading and have a good day D

This game is always fun. The game's physics are spot on. The only thing that is poor about this game is the VOIP quality. Often times other cannot even be understood when he or she tries to talk. Besides that the game is wonderful. Easy to play yet difficult to master.

The REAL killer for me is that this game overrides ctrl+alt+delete. Its an a mazing game to play but when I want to switch playlists I have to exit completely out of the game. Once my volume was way too loud accidentally. There was literally nothing I could do about it. ctrl+alt+delete just brings you back to the game.

I've been a gamer for about 27 years since I was 5 years old and this is seriously one of the best games I've played and would definitely be in my all time top 10!Very balanced and as cliche as it sounds it's easy to learn but near impossible to master! Lots of fun playing though!

This game is so great! It is so addicting and amazing! I love playing it so much! I've had it for about 2 weeks and I'm already level 30! It's the greatest game that I've ever played! You can play it for 5 hours and never get bored. I love it so much!

Very fun game with nearly infinite replayability. One of my favorite non FPS online games right now. A nice thing about it is that it isn't terribly demanding and will run on many computers. Only real issue is that some of the achievements require all the DLC cars to unlock.

The most addicting casual game I have ever played. I've been obsessed with a lot of games sometimes for a month sometimes for a year but Rocket League is the only game i can see myself playing casually forever. Thats not to say you can't become obsessed with improving to the highest level and develop extremely technical skills but you can always play it casually.

I love this game with all my heart. Do i still suck after hundred of hours of gameplay? Absolutely. Do I enjoy dunking on noobs one momnet only to get shafted by a god tier player the next? Yessir. Rocket League has been one of my favorite games for almost two years now and I see no reason to stop playing any time soon. This game is definetly worth the price and I would recommend it to anyone that wants to try out a game different from anything else out there.

Out of all games this is the only game I have bought full price so Psyonix will improve this or make other games (granted i havent bought a lot of games). If you like cars soccer or tricks n get this game if you dont get it anyway because YOUR MISSING OUT.

I'd say I have my fair share of hours into this game and all I have to say is that it's fantastic. The game is wonderful on all levels whether just starting out or an experienced pro this game never was boring to me. The game has quite the learning curve and definitely a bigger one than I expected. The replayability of this game is great I always find myself coming back to it to refine my skills. A must have game.

One of the most fun games i've played in a long time at the beginning you think its such a simple but genius game then you realise there's a lot more to it than simplicity and it takes a long time to get good at this game . Still enjoying almost every minute tho

Rocket league is a great game to play to get away from violent games.Rocket league has many customizing selections such as cars decals paintjobs boosts wheels hats goal explosions.this makes the game fun for me as I love to customize my car. I am also a big fan of trading but I have only just began so my friend M4TH14$ helped me out with some items.great game

This game is great and fun for a couple of hours when you play it alone however with friends its much more fun and you can keep playing it all day.You can customize your car however you want with decals boosts (They look pretty ) paint and a lot of other things like tops and antenna's! )Its a really fun game but it just gets funnier when you're playing with friends!Gameplay 9/10Graphics 8.5/10 (The reason is too much light)

Especially with the current sale (Christmas sale is at the time I am writing this) this game is completely worth it and maybe you can make some money off of it by entering and winning tournaments! Absolutely amazing game that I would recommend to all my friends.

I really like Rocket League for the most part just don't play on Ranked. Ranked is awful and unbalanced to hell putting people who are really bad on one side with really good on the other in a way reminiscent of Quake and early Halo matchmaking.Overall if you want to just play this for fun or with the family then it's worth getting.Would love to see a split screen option in a future update possibly?

Rocket League is the most genius and addicting game I've probably ever played. I owned the first game SARP Battle Cars and as amazing as it was then it's about 100x better now. It's definitely worth the $20 and anyone who is looking for something fresh THIS IS A MUST BUY!

In all honesty i play this game at least once a day. I genuinly have fun in this game and haven't stopped since i first got it.I originally got it on the PS4 when it was on PS+ thinking it was a small game but it's properly gone and changed my life its so good honest.Now i recently obtained it on PC and well it's even better (i still recommend a controller).Get it have some fun with friends or go solo either way you'll have a great time!hit me up if you wanna play!!

"A nice calming game that can be played while your waiting for something. Rocket League is a enjoying game that really created its own genre of gaming ""Vehicular Soccer"". While simple on the surface it has a decently high skill ceiling with flying teamwork and avoiding the one idiot trying to explode you. Although I will admit the game is a bit pricy but its still a nice relaxing game. Unless your unboxing or in competitive."

Very good game. Alot of fun all the time i play it alone or with friends.I have alot of houres in the game and i still really like it.I recommend this game to everyone! Good system Cheap and fun to play Updates almost every month New items getting added

Your car flies using nitro boosts to score a goal on a soccer match.A M A Z I N GReally tho it's a great game to pass time any pc runs it you can show off your stuns to people that doens't even play the game because the mechanics that builds it are simple.One of my best choices in Steam.

Rocket League is an addicting and highly competitive game! It combines machines and sports into an epic rocket car match. I recommend for any advanced or beginner gamers since the ranked mode can become quite exhilarating for experienced players! 10/10

Despite not being too big of a batman fan I'll definitely buy the Batmobile DLC to support the Psyonix devs. For less than $20 the base game (and no recurring membership fees required to play online) is more than worth it. RL DLC's aren't pay to win and for most part only contribute to aesthetics. So as long as I keep enjoying the game I'll keep buying the DLC's to keep the development funded. Recommend you guys do the same!See you at the kickoff!

"friends get hyped about new car soccer game get me to spend $20 install game open it yeah cars playing soccer try to enter a party ""not connected to rocket league servers"" try to play a game without friends ""not connected to rocket league servers""still fun playing with bots would r8 8/8 if not for the serversUpdate months later the game works I love it thank you based god."

Go buy this game if you like cars soccer and a competitive challenge! It has the best ranking system I've ever seen in a game after playing ranked for a while you'll notice that you're playing against people that play almost identically to you. In this way the game challenges you to better yourself and rise in the rankings!

Great game one down side the cross platform with psn 40 of time psn players got 400 ping (only me) Than it lags me too and well they dont know to play every time i had 2 players from psn with me i lost one psn or none i win (just move to 2v2)But great game alot of fun

Really worth buying this game. I have slowly but surely managed to get a large portion of my friends to try the game out. They all still play the game to this moment it is very relaxing and much better than alot of games out there that really stress you out.

When I first started this game one thing was clear I couldn't do a thing. I could hardly hit the ball. I'd race toward it turn to give it a tap and go right around it. But no matter how hard it is to really get the game down or to git gud it just. feels. right from the very first moment. This game is amazing.

Probably my favorite multiplayer game of all time. Fun to pick up and impossible to master I don't see myself putting it down anytime soon. The creators are constantly releasing new free content and features and I cant wait to see what people do with the workshop.BUY IT

Very fun Game most fun with friends... But the friends should not be much better than you AND easily salted.Every other combination is ok(Better than you and not salty carry)(Salty and not as good as you maybe toxic but funny)Not too many but often updates with new content and the game developed a huge trading network.9/10 Consumes your time like nothing else (except maybe Minecraft)Would not buy again because i alredy have it but I can recommend it so go buy it god damn.

It's like soccer and hockey with rocket cars. What's not to like?This set itself up to be a great esport. It has simple rules and is fun to watch. Anyone can figure out how to play in a few minutes but the skill cap is high. Nothing in the matches is random other than the exact positioning of the cars and the ball. You get a (skippable) slow motion replay for every goal.

One of the most fun I've had with friends in a long long time.A much needed addition to the multiplayer space with a developer that is not only competent but has a friendly DLC plan to support the game for a long time. Free updates come with this of course and the DLC is all cosmetic.A true gem.

this game has been out for how long and you still dont have to goal line detection on point????? so many time have i seen someone make a goal line save and the detction says its still a goal even tho you can clearly see the ball not fully pass the line..... fix you

9/10 looks like a retard game but actually extremely technically difficult. You'll learn how to ball chase how not to ball chase then when and where to ball chase to be a good midfielder. 10/10 game if you have friends to play with regularly. Lost a point because a lot of people in the community are pretty crap to play with. Leavers people who want you to kill yourself people who want to forfeit immediately after letting one goal in. Will have you screaming like a retard but in a good way.

Originally this game reminded me of the good ole days of retro car battles on the N64. This adds a fun team based twist with basic soccer rules. The multiplayer is great local and online. And the DLC content adds alot more customization. I'm 60 hours in right now and it still has me! Recommened for anyone and everyone!

At first i thought it was a boring game... just some cars that are trying to score with a huge ballI proved myself wrong after playing it.10/10 one of the most addictive and fun games to play with friendsthe graphics are gorgeous especially after you score you get hyped af after that blast11/10 would reccomend trying this game out and if you dont like it just refund it

Even if you don't like football you will like this game devs bring everytime new content in the game it's fun you can play hours and hours ! The game is cheap just go ) just know that you need to play with a controller forget the keyboard + mouse configuration ofc.

This is high quality edge of your seat fast paced fun.I have always been a competitive gamer and this game is one of the best. Each game has the potential to be the l negative 5 minutes of your life and I love every moment of the eternity that is a close game.

As a fan of the PS3 game this was a must buy and even though I knew what to expect I'm still overwhelmingly happy with how the game turned out. I have never met anybody that didn't like playing its predecessor and I can't imagine I will meet anyone that doesn't like playing Rocket League.

Fun. One of them games you can come back to time and time again. Always gets more challanging due to the fact that the players continue to get better. May be a bit hard for newbies to the game as they have to go againest players that have played for years. Either way fun game.

Rocket League is an addictive game once a player learns how to control the cars. It's fun and can be fairly relaxing when playing in career mode (depends on the player based on how you play in multiplayer games). The art visuals and music are great and it has a lot of updates and replayability. It's a favorite for a reason. 10/10 since it never gets old.

GOAT. I've never been happier with a purchase on Steam. I don't like soccer I'm not really into cars. But put them together and it's the best thing since sliced bread. I can't recommend this game enough.Still remains the best 20 dollars not counting all the crates that I've ever spent.

I've been playing Rocket League for a while now and I think it's safe to say I'm addicted to it..... I mean the game is full if child flaming.....but if you have a couple of folks to play with you're gonna have a blast with the game. There're gonna be times when you will be forced to ragequit due to a series of losses and missed goals (trust me you're gonna freak out ) in the other hand though there are gonna be wonderful memories. &lt 3

Low skill to enter but very high skill ceiling.You can go from barely hitting the ball to freestyling shots off the walls in a couple hundred hours with practice.Very fast paced.Quickchat and crossplay mean that you don't often get toxic players and Psyonix has made it easy to ignore them mostly for chat.

This game is fantastic! Love it to bits! The artwork and style of the cars is great.But I've been having issues the game has crashed on me twice now and both times a colored screen will cover my monitor. First it was all dark green then the latest time it was all orange. Not sure what the issue is but I know that there is one.

Spent numerous hours on this game and plan to spend many more. Spent $9 on it and have gotten my money's worth multiple times over.This game is excellent if you're into competitve games. Even better if you play with a group of friends.The physics are great and you will no doubt get really excited and really in every game because of them.10/10 would recommend.

Hi Everyone I just recently got into Rocket League and I must say its been a load of fun . It is a very challenging game lots of room for skill improvement and tactics on the players part . Keeps me coming back for more . A perfect diversion on these cold winter days !

At first look somebody will tell that the game is boring it is just a car which chase the ball. But that is not true the game is pure fun and I must recommend it to everyone. It is easy for everyone to start you dont need any skill to start it is beginner friendly but if you want to advance it becomes really hard. Only downside is that it is really addictive game when you start you cant stop playing the game.

When I bought this game I had no idea what to expect I didn't understand why my sister liked this game so much...Now after 400+ hours of playing I think I understand.I still can't fly or quickchat though... So I'd give it a 9/10 Tutorials are for noobs I missed my chance )

Best game ever!I LOVE THIS GAME! very addictive but still so much fun I really do love psyonix for coming up with this kinda game. Nothing to say other than i will not stop playing or uninstalling unless psyonix puts the game down themselves BTW i think is a big mistake I love it!

One of the best games I've ever played aside from Zombie Army Trilogy Counter Strike Global Offensive and The Binding of Isaac. I enjoy playing this game with a few friends and kicking back. It's a bit of a challenge. You'll need a goal keeper and the others to go out on the field and play. At times the goal keeper will need to move from goal long enough to block the other teams goal or to help out a bit but not for very long.

Few games in recent memory allow for such a broad range of players to engage with such a simple system in such an engaging manner. While anyone can pick up a controller and play the skill ceiling is endless. I can't wait until I can walk into a pub and watch a Rocket League match on the big screen.

One of the best multiplayer games I've played in a long time. Addictive isn't the word for it. 15 hours in 2 days haven't done that since Halo 2.Sweet graphics incredibly fun gameplay with or without friends (if your lonely like me then ranked mode is for you) and loads of customisation (including a rainbow of flowers for a rocket trail).Unreal's engine plus rocket powered cars a large bouncing bomb and 2 goals. It's the simple things that you enjoy the most.

I would recommend this game definitely it is a lot of fun to play however it is pretty repedative kind of the same thing over and over again for that I give it a 6 out of 10 I strongly suggest adding some sort of clan system on this game as well as tournaments and multiplayer seasons it would definitely bump up my score if that was to happen and I think this game would become crazy popular really quick if those features were added

After picking this up day 1 it has been the only PC game I've ever stuck with competitively. Controls are easy to pick up at first and hard to master at the high levels. Progression is extremely fun and certain aspects and techniques are introduced naturally as you get better. Could not recommend enough.

Easy to learn hard to master.Amazing soccer game combined with rocket cars with boost (nitros) on arenas. You can jump fly and crash your opponents!Very addictive and that's why it's awarded with ''Just 5 more minutes'' award )I highly recommend it to my friends and people that are seeking fun and some new experience with soccer games D

This game is great you get so much content and whilst they have extra DLC it isn t DLC to complete the game nor is it excessive. The gameplay is great crisp intense and extremely satisfying. 100% Recommend. If you can pick it up in sale even better!10/10

this game is an amazing game. Not a powerful computer is needed to run this game on Quality settings. My computer isn't very good but I can run this game on max settings on a laptop. Some maps may lag for me at high settings but most maps don't. I reccomend buying this game as it is great fun.

Just buy it.. Hours of fun with your friends unlockables that don't throw off the balance of the game. The only thing I would suggest to the Dev's... a 5v5 mode would be insane with a larger field especially for Hockey...DLC does not give advantages over those who are new to the game. Purley cosmetic.A Great Game.

"""Easy to learn difficult to master.""Rocket League is great and must be experienced to be understood. The developers are fantastic as well and put a lot of time and effort into the game new content is still added frequently and a lot of it is free.Great experience all around. Don't miss out."

This game is amazing. I'm more of a casual gamer and I fell in love. It's a pleasant mix of soccer and what I call race cars for the simple fact that speed is a factor in this game. Whether you're a serious gamer in search for something new to play or just a casual gamer looking for something fun to do online with friends this is the game to get! XD

"Such a simple game yet its one of my favourites ever. They combine 2 things that almost every man loves cars and football and let me tell you they did a perfect job at it. The games are 5 minutes long which means you're either laughing your off for 5 minutes or you are whining like a little baby for 5 minutes. It also sets for the perfect example for ""Just 5 more minutes mom"". Rocket League is truely amazing.10/10 would IGN again.Ervli"

My hands down choice for Game of the Year in 2015 Rocket League is by far one of my all time favorite games.Soccer and cars...not much else to say. Its crazy mad simple fun. There is a steep learning curve but once you get the hang of flying and aerials you can compete with most people.A must buy especially considering it's low price.

Physics based football game with cars that flies with turborockets. That's crazy enough isn't it? Even if I don't enjoy the competitive aspect of the game Rocket League has an original gameplay that deserves to be played. Recommended to both casual and competitive gamers.

I originally got this game for free on the ps4 with plastation plus. put a few hundred hours on that and then saw rocket league on sale on steam. Purchase to compare. Steam wins by a landslide! Either way buy this game if you want to have a stupid good time! Just hope you don't go up against me! D

"EDITED Pros Very fun and simple Car customization Easy to pick up hard to master (pretty hard)Cons If you don t live in any of the regions that dedicated servers are in your connection will be horrible May run slow in some computers9.5/10 ""A little laggy"" MonsaEDIT Dedicated servers in South America are a thing now but its still a little laggy"

Fantastic gameplay and little to no connection issues. Personally I stay within the US East and West regions. I've experienced minimal trolls and no hackers. Fun non stop gameplay and the matches last the perfect amount of time. If you have a bunch of friends that need that one game to play with a lot of non stop fun I highly recommend this game.

Rocket Leauge is really good game.Its all about teamwork and sometimes solo play.You can play plenty of gamemodes.U have great rewards that you can can get after a match .There are also some other cool features that are trurly amazing.Do I recomend this game.Yes I do.

I've never been a fan of soccer. Pretty boring sport if you ask me. However This is the best game ever made. I have 2500 hours in the game and I am not stopping any time soon. It's easy to get into the game and start learning the basics. You can join in matches and play with others at your skill. Then as you improve so will your competition. The skill cap is huge on this game. There's always new skills and techniques being discovered like the wave dash and ceiling shots. Buy it!

"This game is amazing. You start by barely knowing how to move around. Maybe you jump even hit the ball a few times. Then some er sails through the air juggling the ball past you like ""What now bro?"" and you're hooked.""What a save!""""What a save!""""Savage!""Can't recommend this game enough. Buy it for your friends."

Great game I played the original and im glad they made a sequel as the camera and various other small things made SARPBC difficult to play at times. However I think as an improvement you could add possibly playlists of music for the game As me personally im not a fan of that kind of music and end up listening to my own. Otherwise tbh its a great game definitely reconmend

I CAN'T STOP PLAYING SEND HELP.Rocket League is a combination of football and rocket powered cars done in such a way that it is far greater tha the sum of its parts. It is a very balanced skill based game with the wise choice of a cosmetic only based DLC model. Every time a DLC for this game comes out I'll straight up buy it regardless of the content purely because I feel Psyonix needs more of my money for such a brilliant brilliant game.Sidenote Play this with a controller trust me.

I've played a good 500 600 hours of this game. I love it more than any other game I think I've ever played. This game is a great way to relieve stress by just playing casual or you can take the sweaty route in this game and try to climb the vigorous ranking ladder. Overall this game is an amazing game and I recommend it for anyone. This game is really easy to learn but super hard to master. Im only a Plat 2 but I am still improving to this day. I highly recommend giving this game a shot!

I am not a big fan of racing games or soccer games but this is definately worth the $20. Demolition derby and soccer at the same time is really fun. 10/10Only downfall is the unstable servers but it's not frequent enough to where it ruins the game. I am sure the servers will be upgrade in the near future.Definately buy this game!

"Friend in College once showed me this game I told him it looks stupid. tried it on a free weekend then bought.one year and 1000+ hours later I realised what I meant by ""stupid"" was that this game looks stupid... fun.5/7.Cant wait for Rocket League Battle Powered Boost Stealing Stop spamming skip repley dont use what a save saractically no I will not unistall the game and no i will not stop trying hard Acrobatic cars 3.gg."

Great game.Make sure you practice before entering competitive mode some peoples just forgot on how to have fun in this community but if you don't mind the trolling and looking for a great way to let some steam off this action packed soccer like game is for you.Beside theres no need for flashy hot cars in order to win just skills aaaaand a bit of luck XD.

Great game i recommend it. I think the graphics are really good. Also the servers are fanstastic im stuck right now with Celluar Data because my internet services are anoyying but i get less than 100 ping which is amazing. The car cuztimizations are fantastic+trading included. There are a couple cons for example the the only way to buy keys without trading them is to spend real money on them.

I came back to RL to give it a new chance after a few patches. Some of the issues have been fixed and even though I still have 100 ping or more most games the game is a fair bit more fluid and predictable. There are still netcode issues but at least progress has been made.

Rocket league is a fast paced motorized version of soccer with cars. This game is one of the most unique and fun to play games to come along in a long time. As Rocket league has matured over the years so has it's playerbase. The competetive scene for this game has always had a small dedicated following but in recent years its Pro league scene has exploded.

I bought this cheap game as a recommendation. This now might be one of the most fun games in my game catalog. It takes soccer and cars with customizations and mixes them together with an extremely good multiplayer base and creates one of the best games i have played. Strong upvote!

What can I say? Been playing this since it came out in 2015 but am now part of the PC Master Race. The game is godly and I've probably played more than 3000 hours combined on all platforms. It is an innovative take that requires some getting used to but its awesome to play. Even better with friends...

Great game even sometimes when i have a short amount of time i can squeze in a game. Loving the skins and the trading system. Overall brilliant. If you would like to play a simple fun game this is a definite purchase. Wait for a sale it goes down to 9 euro. Use a controller i find it better

this game is so nice and thank for everything its very cool when u play mode servivle the monster is so scared us and has high damge the cars is very good u can run away easy the building is good all of things is good and you are good the sestym is good the game is good i cant express more than this game unbeliveable really amazing im sorry if i have mistake the life is wonderful iits ok

I think it might be the most balanced multiplayer experience I've ever played.Extremely addictive I stayed up until the early hours of the morning for days in a row playing solidly. Pretty quick to pick up and it isn't frustrating even when you lose. There is a constant drive to keep playing and practicing even after you have learned how to play.

Great game! So much fun! There definitely needs to be a best connection option from the servers plus the location because some of the games I join the connection is awful and I can't play! Particularly annoying in 1v1 ranked because you can't play properly.

"Just incredible the skills you can learn alot of possibilities . Fair ranking system for me some say it's unstable but for me it's alright . Highly recommended for people who likes to try new stuff out ( ex. ceiling shot wall to air dribble air dribbling etc. ) been playing for 500 hours and everytime I play it the game will be like "" come play more "" you get what I mean ? My point is that it is addicting so yeah ."

I cannot put into words how amazing this game is. Gameplay is highly satisfying and endlessly enjoyable. The DLC is only cosmetic and is very reasonably priced new maps and content are free cross platform play with PS 4 users and 4 player local play. You need to buy this game. It will complete you.

11/10. I got this game because everyone was on it and I felt left out. Wasn't expecting much considering i'm not a fan of football. But it's highly addictive.I strongly recommend partaking in the tutorials to give yourself a headstart in online play though!

REALLY FUN GAME!! If you like collecting items that make your car look amazing and then you love the action of an explosion of a car or a celebration that makes you go flying across the map and you love stradegy games that have teamates or just by yourself this is the game! NO BETTER GAME LIKE THAT FOR THIS PRICE!! I LOVE IT!

Great game. Works fine on Windows but on Kubuntu 18 04 the buttons aren't working correctly. I've checked in the KDE Joystick input device settings to make sure they're setup correctly on the OS and they are but in the game X doesn't work Y is X RB is START and there's a couple other buttons that are switched. Could still be the OS even though they're right in the settings but if not I hope this gets fixed.

Very addictive game when playing online multiplayer. One game is 5 minutes it always fits in when you have a bit of spare time left.Also this game is very cool when you are having friends over. You can play with 4 people with controllers on a big screen really nice.

I don't normally play racing games or sport games in general but man is this game worth the 20 bucks. You unlock something new after every game you play so there is tons of customization and I'm sure there will be more to come in the future. It also has a SUPERB soundtrack seriously the best one I've heard in a while. Super competitive adreneline rushing gameplay. And you can speed up and ram somebody in the butt to make them explode!

10/10SO MUCH FUN. Honestly i play it just about everyday with friends and it never gets old. With many different car models different designs and tons of colors no two cars are the same. Highly reccomend it even if you arent a fan of soccer! This is really a must have for all Steam users especially if you like jumping on a voice chat program and playing games with friends.

Very nice game. I started playing this game when all other games started to fell boring. Rocket League will refresh you need for gaming. So I highly recommend it to anyone who doesn't know what to play next. Also it is a game that takes time to get good and a lot more to master it. But I don't recommend it you people who get triggered in a second because this game already has to much of toxic players.

Without a doubt one of the best games ever made Fun and challenging after all this time. The controls are intuitive but also real challenge to master not because a fault by the developer but because of the very nature of puting a ball on the goal whit a car. I can realy recomended this masterpiece.

Definitely One of the greatest game that I have ever came across.I mean seriously who doesn't like a game that kicks a giant F**king ball around. (not to be offended for those who doesn't)But for laptop gamers be aware prepare yourself with some icebag or external fans because you are going to need it.

A fantastic game in every way that games should be.Most importantly it is without a doubt the most fun I have had since CS 1.6 ! Everything about the gameplay is designed to be skill based fun! Well worth your gold coins!If you need some help watch this guide I madehttps //www.youtube.com/watch?v n36fldtHYzw

As a huge Mario Strikers fan this game peaked my interest on release. I finally decided to drop $20 to try it out. Probably the best $20 ever spent since Minecraft. Rocket League is easy to learn has high mechanical gameplay and has a competative nature. It is very fast and easy to join matches online and play with friends. Since I do enjoy TF2 Yes... Yes there are hats.

"i now have over 150 hours invested into Rocket League and all i can truly say is i still enjoy the game the want to rank up in competive mode and earing rare new items keeps me coming back it""s a game where practice makes perfect so i enjoy the end result of playing alot visually it is a very pretty game with a fun and hooking idea still one of my go to games 9/10."

Extremely fun has great mechanics and awesome soundtrack you need this game! God I just realized I sound so much like those fake reviews on those video game commercials.Rev up those fryers cus' I'm GET OUT OF MY ROOM I'M PLAYING ROCKET LEAGUE!!!!!!!!!!!

I love this game it's a great game to play just for fun or for the competitive player.Pros Great mechanics great visuals great customization a wide array of modes great leveling Cons controls can be a bit weird at first no making a party between ps4 and pc.

This is currently my favorite game and I would definatly recomend this game to anyone with a love of competition. I currently have about 50 hours played and I just cant get enough of this game. Would r8 8/8!I mostly just wanted to give a positive review

runs smooth even on older computers best played with a controller (i'm playing with a ps3 controller works great).i hope future updates will make the game even better and add more items reporting players etc.it's easy to pick up since you really only need a couple of buttons not a million button combos like in fifa. yet it is very challenging to master it and the learning curve is just right i think.

"Really sad that I let this sit in my library for so long (was accepted into alpha) before trying it. Probably the best ""sports"" multiplayer game on PC since EA likes to treat us like step children and Konami has had the same online client/quality since the Playstation 2 days."

Rocket League is an amazing game for everyone. It can be played online or against bots although I highly recommend playing online because the bots are terrible teammates. Its skill based matchmaking works very well so if you aren't good or you're new to the game then you're set up against people that are in the same position but if you're good at the game it get very competitive. There are more relaxed modes for fun too. This is probably my favorite game of all time.

By far one of my favorite games! It never gets old and has amazing replayability!There are many different modes to choose from such as Standard Rumble Hoops etc all while maintaining fair and enjoyable online gameplay. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who enjoys a fast paced multiplayer game.10/10

First Off I do not like sports games. Sport games can get really complex to the point of why do I need to learn all of this? This game Rocket League is like SSX Tricky was back on the PS2. Stupid and Simple fun. SSX has Uber Tricks. Rocket League has Aerials and Defense madness to just name a few.The game is easy to pickup but very hard to master espeically once you get to the higher rankings.

Who doesn't like the idea of Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars playing soccer. Anybody can get into this game since it's something that everyone can pick up easily. It has some casual or competitive fun. The skill ceiling is always getting higher there are always new things to learn when you are at the top of this game.

Best game i've played since ages sincerely never had love for soccer games except for neketu from NES and later a little appreciation for mario striker.but this! really futuristic cars with jet &amp jumping capabilities plus updates plus speed plus explosions and spinning..ok try and buy. True story.

A great game that I can pick up for a few minutes or for a few hours depending on the amount of time I have available. One can play this game in such a way so that they learn all the tactics or the can play it casually for fun. Either way it's a great expirience.

This is a great game.I will be hitting 1000 hours in this game soon and I am still going strong. This is a highly competitive game where even the best players don't seem to be able to see the skill ceiling yet.The only improvement I'd ask for is more transparency in how the reporting system works.

This game never gets boring if you are a friend of soccer or cars or even both!I am still playing it day after day and already am about to it the 600 hours mark.Whenever I should tell people about a nice game they can play alone or with friends Rocket League comes to my mind.

Absolutely worth it for the price you pay. Hours of entertainment and has a place for both casual and competitive players. If you have any desire to rank up you'll need to practice mechanics. Thankfully the steam workshop community has multiple training packs for the people interested on focusing specific areas of their game.

10/10 I love it! This is the first game in a long time that I've hit 200+ hours and I'm still absolutely addicted. There is always something to improve on always a way to get better. And opening crates is super fun too!! I'm not into the trading scene but it seems super cool as well!

This is a great game!I have played about 400 hours of this and still haven't grown tired of it. The community is very nice and helpful.They make seasonal events but not very often.All in all it's my favourite steam game and i give it 10/10 ) (in this genre)

Even if you dont like football you will like this game.It's a very addictive game and can be enjoyed by all ages.The split screen is very nice if you have 2 monitors you can set the resolution settings higher than the in game setting in the settings files of Rocktet League that way if you have multiple controllers you can play with your friends or family while not having to look at a small part of the screen.even though there are a lot of dlc's they are all cosmetic so this game is not p2w.

Product received for free. I got this game as a free addon to my steam controller in Sept 2015.Have thuroughly enjoyed playing this hilarious game.Crates can be turned off which is great.I'm limited in ranked league matches because my nerves don't keep up with more skilled players.All in all a super fun game.

"Still learning the basics.Not a joke. The game is easy and fun to get into but very complex to master. I don't consider myself even of average skill after these 300 something hours. Still fun as hell no matter I win or lose like sheeetz.Don t get fooled by the ""car soccer"" theme the formula actually works and pretty well... never played an mp game so pure and refined since quake III arena.Doesn t need a beast machine to run at optimal playable speed."

"Absolutely blast to play if you don't mind ending up playing just one game... and another... just five more minutes... oh it's morning already? Suits for casual gaming as well as more serious gaming and believe me your competitive spirit will take a hold of you and you find yourself grinding for that next ""Division Up!"" level raise."

This game is absoultely Immaculate only word in dictionary that describes it. It for some reason gives me a feeling like no other game can fullfil the hype of every hit of the ball every aerial goal every goal period. If you want a game with great physics high skill ceiling pretty good community and like to drive cars and hit balls and score goals. This is the game for you!

Recently Rocket League has stopped working for me. All my other games have worked but Rocket League has just stopped working. Everytime I try to open and play it continuously updates and won't start. Can someone help me understand why? I want to play this game very much but recently it has stopped working and I can't play it. This game is very good not hate is going towards this game. I have no evidence to show that it is the game so no hate here.

It took me a bit of time to get the hang of it instead of just bashing myself in the general direction of the ball... but once you hit that point where you feel in control it's all downhill from there and wish your free time goodbye. Great game especilaly since i dislike football/soccer and cars. Devs are awesome. Community is one of the best i've seen. Just get it it's a lot of fun.

extremely addictive!!!This game is incredibly awesome!Its easy to learn and the fun is multiplied with the amout of friends you play the game with DThe only thing that could make this game even better more gamemodes (funmodes).But even with a single gamemode (playable 1v1 up to 4v4) its super fun and kinda never gets boring. I would reccomend this game especially for fans of football stock car or co op/multiplayer games

Great game very fun very skill based. I don't know about you but I like it and I think it was worth the money. The server issues were... well anyways besides that great game and using UE3 too I trust that engine so that helps. If your considering to get this game get it.

Love this game. I've only played in Exhibition and training but I already think it is amazing. It needs more online players but that can only come in time. It could also be cheaper it's not worth 15 at this stage of development a fiver maybe but not 15.

This game is so incredibly fun. I've had it since the day it came out and I haven't enjoyed any other game more than I have this.I'm not a big fan of football but Rocket League brings an air (literally you can fly) of enjoyment to me. I imagine a football fan may find it even better! Plus I'm literally addicted as you can see by my hours...

Highly recommend this game even from some one who hates football on all levels but loves cars this game is just fun in a box honestly. Amount of customisation is awesome aswell. You may think it looks easy but it does actually take a degree of skill to be good at it.

Rocket League is a thoroughly enjoyable time with a large amount of unlocks and customizablility. The overall premise is pretty simple but the mechanics thrown into car soccer make this game stand out. I do recommend finding a couple of friends to regularly play with as then you aren't stuck relying on the random match maker.

This is the counter strike source of the modern era. Highly competitive high addictive easy to pick up and incredibly difficult to master.Thought soccer was stupid......thought RC cars were stupid....but combine them both and magically its amazing.Controller highly recommended.

Personally I love this game But the one complaint that I have seen a lot is that it can be very boring at times Because it's virtually the same thing over and over I believe that the reason people fall in love with this game is because of how fun it can be with friends Thats why I think you should implement a full out online match making mic system for certain teams Like CSGO.

Haven't wrote a review for a game in a while but this game simply deserves one. It's simple and fun yet it also manages to really promote skillful play at the same time.I haven't encountered any bugs yet but I have experienced some connection problems nothing too serious though!I can't recommend this game enough for such a fair price and of course it's more fun with friends.

Extremely addictive and fast paced. If you love driving cars and crazy flips and spins this is the game for you. I have been unable to put the controller down for this. I definitely suggest using a controller for this game as it makes it easier than trying to use the mouse/keyboard.

Extremely fun game No hackers Skill based Not many toxic Russians A little teamwork but you should always try to hit the ball every time and never let your teammates get the chance becauseyou are superious to them in every way and remember if they ever try to hit the ball make sure they miss and ridicule them for it Mostly nice ppl

Mad fun to play alone to gain rank or with friends to mess around. I have over 310 hours on the game now and it's one of my go to games to play when I want to just relax and kick back. The customization options for your car are crazy and newer things are being added every update with crates. Great for de stressing and having some good fun.

This is by far the most fun I've ever had on a game. As what most would consider a sports gamer when I first purchased this game I thought it was stupid and would never live up to games like Fifa Madden and 2k. I couldn't have been more wrong Rocket League is like a never ending dose of competition with a forever growing skill gap. Even now new ways of controlling cars or hitting shots are being discovered which gives this game a long life spam. 100% worth the pick up.

Bought this game for 20 bucks off the steam store..... It's very addicting as several game modes and a usually bright community. I highly suggest this game for anyone though this review is coming from a guy who's played about 2 754 hours worth of it ) BUY IT

This game is probably one of the most enjoyable games out there even more so for its price. The only issues I've noticed have been minor server issues (Particularly if you're from an Asian country or Africa) and some issues with the way the system is. (That being people leaving games early in all modes including ranked.)It's worth the cost and the DLC isn't necessary unless you're going for achievements. It's fun. Fun for the whole family.

As you can see I currently have 1 200 hours in this game. Once you get into the game there is no stopping. The skill ceiling is yet to be reached and isn't anywhere close to being reached. This might just be the best $20 you will ever spend in your life. 10/10 would pay $60 for.

My absolute favourite game... There is no way you could get bored of it! So many possibilities! I love the fact that it looks like a game you could play on a game console even though I am playing it on PC! The graphics are fantastic gameplay is simple I would like to see some more free DLC that you can earn but that is just a minor problem and I am probably nitpicking! Well done Psyonix!

Possibly one of the best multiplayer games I've ever played. As someone who doesn't enjoy sports games and only somewhat enjoys racing games I was shocked to find how much I enjoy a game about cars playing soccer.The controls are incredibly tight the presentation is spot on and I just can't say high enough praises about everything else in this game. It's perfect buy it!

i don't like football games and i hate racing games but this is really a great game.this is by far the game i played the most over the last few years.2 hints dont try to play this with mouse and keyboard use a controller. never team up with ppl much(!) more advanced than you are the enemys you will get will be fun breaking for you. team up with someone as skilled as you are and it's big fun.

Rocket League is a game that is easy to pick up and hard to master. The fun in the game comes from the never ending drive to get better and the ability to play with or against friends. Optional paid cosmetics also allow players a reward for playing online and helps establish a trading economy that the developers are very mindful of. This game is amazing because of the constant new updates to the game content and list of skills players have.

Seriously fun game!!!played it alot its very fun to play with friends or alone. most of the people are very nice (defenitly not all!!). the competative ranked system is also very good and not that frustating to play.the matchmaking is very good you have no long waittimes ever!there is made alot of new content over and over again for this game wich i really like.if you want a very fun to play game to play alone or with friends this is the ideal game for you!

This is literally my favourite game. There are a lot of toxic people in the community but what game doesn't? Plus you can just mute them. Overall I would definately recommend this game to anyone whether they are new to gaming or a veteran who has been playing for years.

Rocket League is a good game to play with friends but playing random people online can be bad it's basically get better or off! I met some cyber bully while matching online...Well this game like other online sport games you become better while trash talking other gamers. It is a good game for bro gamers and people into sport games but don't know the rules of actual sport games like FIFA or NBA 2K. Okay game I recommend it but don't match online until 20 hours of solo playing.

Besides being one of the best games I've played in a while Rocket League is just one of the best feeling games aswell. It feels very snappy and precise. This is a huge plus as the shots you need to pull off require this very optimized engine. But this game also looks amazing on top of amazing fps and very snappy controls. 10/10 would recomend to anyone who likes a new esport.

Really cool watching the esports of this game I wish scammers couldn't get away so easily anyways hope this game becomes a really memorable game somewhat in the future. It is very easy to understand this game in ways other games don't have. It is truly a one of a kind game.

With me having a few hours in the game by now I found this game to be very fun for the first couple hundred of hours. However it seemed to start to get boring eventually. I still would recommend this game to a person who loves football and cars. I love those two things but after a lot of hours this game starts to get very repeatitive. The graphics and all are great for the game. The gameplay is also astonishing very very fun at the start and middle of your playing.

I love it but it only plays a maximum of 2 or 3 games before shutting off my whole computer (usually only half of a game). I have a 1200W Coolmax Power supply and 2 Nvidia GXE 760's so I think it would be an issue with the game since it runs games like GTAV online with no lag on highest settings. Is it the computer or the game? I've tried everything

Awesome game but can I point out one SERIOUS FLAW. If you solo que for a 2v2 ranked match and the game fails to match you with another solo que. CANCEL THE GAME. DONT FORCE A FRIGGIN 2V1. Such a over site. other than that BS thing game is most certainly worth the 20$.

Provided countless hours of insane fun playing this game over teamspeakwith my mismatched group of friends! This games brings me back the joyI had as a kid playing halo 1 &amp 2 with the bros!Games plays and runs great easy to play very hard to master!Havent been this tence while playing a game in a long time islitterally teeth grindlingly good fun!

Easy to learn difficult to master. This game not only supports splitscreen but it also allows players on the same machine to queue up and face the world.Matches (maybe even surpasses) Nidhogg in the number of shouts it elicits from spectators and players alike.

I now have over 1300 hours in this game though I'm not a super champ or anything worth bragging about. Still it has remained fun for SO LONG that I can't help but consider it one of my favorite games of all time. GGS!Play it for an hour... you'll know if it's your kind of game fairly quickly.

The best $20 I've ever spent on a game. Steep learning curve to be able to compete with the top tier players but so much fun even for the casual player. I've logged hundreds of hours on the XBOX ONE console just switched over to PC two weeks ago and already have logged 25+ hours. Endless fun! I recommend Rocket League to ANY and EVERYONE

Fast chaotic easy to pick up but hard to master. Online matches are found quick (YMMV) and match making is decent at finding skilled players around your skill. Thousands of customization to play with and each car feels different on the field. Community usually very nice even had people throw a match to help my improve my shots! You won't find a more unique and balanced online game than this.

"Totally awesome game! The game offers the unique experience of playing soccer with CARS. That is just awesome! The atmosphere is also pretty awesome between the fans screaming in the stands the announcer/horns and the visuals! What some people who are somewhat familiar with this game may not know is that it has a ""Season"" mode which is kind of similar to a campaign and feels pretty awesome as well."

When you create a physics engine and place a ball and remote control cars you get this such a simply yet entertaining game which actually promotes a competitive atmosphere. I have yet to get bored of this game and I feel like I've put so many hours already. Not to mention the fact that the developers still are creating new DLC to keep the game contemporary for everyone to enjoy themselves and have endless fun. Seriously a great game both casually and competively.

Super fun and addicting game. Good matchmaking with good playlists 1v1 2v2 3v3 each with normal or ranked options. Game is polished and controls are fluid and feel real. Physics are spot on. Worth more than $20 easily. 100s of free items amd free added stadiums for no extra cost.

Great things Online matchmaking is fantastic. Can launch the game and be playing an online match within 15 seconds. Great gameplay doing backwards bicycle kicks in your car or doing aerial Mctwists to score goals is a lot of fun. Great customisation Viking horns and a love heart antenna on my buggy Good graphics and physics Smashing a ball at just the right angle and hearing a thud as the ball rockets away is the best.Bad things I'm suppose to be working instead of playing this game.

Game is great. What can i say that has not already been said....*note you can only play with xbox and ps4 folks in private matches which is annoying. (you can not team up with them to play random online players)You turn on the game cuz your bored play a few medicore games. But you get in the one lucky shot I mean that shot your planned.... Satisfaction.

After this anniversary this game deserved a review PROS&gt chillest community&gt still relevant&gt gameplay is fun gets your palms sweaty. animations are very fluid&gt has better soundtracks than most Arcade Style gamesand the DLC's are always great prices what more could you ask for?CONS&gt I suck at it8.5/10

This one is literally one of my best games I've ever played ! I recommend it. You have many combinations of colorful colors on your car. Accessories antennas.... If you want to play fun multiplayer and ranked game Rocket League is your choice ! I'm playing it with joystick because is easier but if you don't have you may play with your keyboard.

A game about cars and football... what can be wrong with that?Addictive fun easy to play (but difficult to master) lots of players online hundred of visual items (skins antennas etc) but nothing about pay to win (yeah!!).You said you don't like football? That doesn't matter this game will make you forgot about that last thing (I have some friends under that situation haha).All I can say is... I ing love this game.

"""It s a simple thing done brilliantly well kept interesting by the thrill of competition."" PC GamerI think this quote describes this game perfectly! It is the perfect party game but can be way more than that. Rocket League is easily my favourite game of 2015 thanks to the fantastic developers working on it.Also cars+rockets+football/soccer... what could go wrong?"

its one of the best football game i ever played. i don't buy very much games as i think they don't really worth it but this game did worth each penny.sadly a lot of people quit the game but i hope that will be changed somehow maybe with some bans .i recommend this game for sure .i give it a 10/10. D

(Clutch moment in overtime) (About to rank up)Pass to teamateBump opponents out of the wayAll my teamate has to do it lightly hit the ball inTeamate decides freestyling is the perfect ideaFREESTYLING IS NOT THE PERFECT IDEATEAMATE COMPLETLY WHIFFS THE BALL AND EAT THE WALLOpponents score They winDerankBut thats why I love this game

"This game is a gift that never stops giving. Honestly the community is good and the skill ciling keeps increasing making it impossible to ""never get better"". Im still hooked on the ranking system after playing around 1500 hours of the game in just over a year (that's how sad I am).Would smash10/8 would lift againWorth money"

This game is amazing go play it. You might feel like the biggest noob when you start out but you wont mind because of the fun centred philosophy that hides behind it. Its not trying to get you trough any grinding. Every game I've played has been its own special little snowflake as for the people I have been playing with. 100% worth the 20 euro's.See you online.

Had a game where it went into overtime tied at 4. Spent 5 minutes and 48 seconds and overtime and finally scored the winning shot! Keep in mind that regulation time is 5 minutes so the OT was long then reg time.10/10 would play another 6 minutes in over time.

If you like competetive games This is a MUST PLAY. It is amazing. Easy to learn but a real high skill ceiling! Ive been playing over 600 hours and I still suck.If you like soccer This is better than FIFA games and much closer to real soccer than those games ever were!I replaced my Starcraft and League of Legends for this game and I do not regret it!

I was waiting for this game to go on some sort of sale but I just had to buy it because it looked really cool. I have to say after 60 hours it's a game where you start out and you're still compared to other people but the room for improvement means I could be playing this game for a while. Oh yeah and the developers seem really cool and they like to interact with the community a lot.

Even if you dont like soccerThis Game is tons of FunAll online Funktions are working and this is unusual for the half produced games you find these times.The only bad thing to mention is that you cant form teams between PS4 and PC Players.You can play with all of em but forming teams is limited to members of your Gaming Platform.

Rocket League is the quintessential casual friendly steep learning curve packing endless entertainment gold standard sports game for newcomers and veteran gamers alike. If you can get this game on sale DO IT. If you cant get this game on sale buy it anyway. After thousands of games played with thousands of people all around the world I dont regret a single moment of time I've spent playing this game.

This game! I was not a bog fan of the game when it first came out so i did not buy it. I bought the game later because of my friend though and playing the game with friends and just communicating was so much fun it bought a smile on my face after hard days and i have memories where we would die of laughter. The mechanics of this game are great and sometimes weird but overall a really solid and well built game. Would definitly reccomend.

Day 1 Can't hit a stationary ball Boosting 24/7 And no controlDay 2 Might be able to hit stationary ballDay 3 Can definitely hit a stationary ball now Might be able to save a goalDay 4 Attempting Aerials. Failing Can probably score a goal nowDay 5 you're all over the place.Day 6 ....

One of the best multiplayer games I've ever played!It runs smoothly the matchmaking is brilliant and the overall gameplay is something you can sink your time into.There is so much customisation which is a big bonus as well as having the choice between 1v1's all the way to 4v4's. I highly recommend this game to anyone who has an interest in fast paced acrobatic multiplayer gameplay!

Friend convinced me to get Rocket League. They kept saying it was so awesome and fun but I was too stubborn. I finally got it and now all I want to do is invite all my friends to come play with me.. but then i realized I have no friends and came to you guys instead.10/10 SUPER FUN!

This game is awesome fast paced and so much fun. Its one of those simple to learn yet hard to master games when you have absolute control of your car. I play it with keyboard mouse combo with no problems. Only bad thing are servers it still gets pretty bad quite often especially in prime time.

Product received for free. If you dont play FIFA i would highly recommend this game if you already like football this is the best version of all games when your not playing FIFA in the interest of playing something that has anything to do with football. 5/5

"Super fun to play online with friends. It can get really intense depends on how competitive you are as a person though I suppose... It's regularly updatet so there's always new stuff to achieve an win. I've had evenings where I stopped playing after 2 houres of saying ""just one more match"". It really can be fun!"

Likes High skill cap but low barrier to entry. Short intense rounds so you can either jump in for just one or play for the night without getting bored. Great team dynamics Not pay to winDislikes Too addicting Can't party cross console (although this is probably not the developer's fault)

I'm not a hardcore player but this game is the best I'ver ever met since 'ROLLCAGE'.I miss Rollcage very much it's not playable anymore with new Hardware but anyway 'ROCKET LEAGUE' ist a great spare!!!I'm new on Rocket League but I will play until my end....For YOUNG and OLD .. )

Rocket League is a very consistent and reliable game which can provide hours of fun. With many of the new (free) game modes the gameplay always feel refreshing. If you have friends to join you then it will be even more fun! I fully recommend this game and believe it is worth the $20.

Amazing gameplay gripping from start to finish of every game. Dynamics are brilliant and it's a pleasurably pretty game!Plus you can soul crushingly murder people in cold blood leaving a fiery explosion of death and despair in your wake... Never gets old!

Amazing game very addicting with great game mechanics. The splitscreen and full controller bonus are great too. I was able to play with my cousin on the same pc with 2 controllers and 2 monitors against other teams online. Haven't found any bugs yet either great gui and overall great game definetly worth the 20$!

It's a fun game... great fun with friends... if you've got a bunch of friends that like soccer or cars or both the this is the game for you guys. if you enjoy crazy chaotic fastpaced mayhem then grab your keyboard mouse and/or controller and play now!

If you've played SARPBC you'll love this game. Though right now every map in Rocket League is the same with a different skin. I'd like it if they introduced variable terrain maps like in the original. Otherwise this is a solid game with a sizable playerbase.

IT'S LIKE SOCCER BUT WITH CARS !VERY HIGH SKILL CEILING BUT EASY TO PICK UP.ONLINE IS FRUSTRATING BECAUSE PEOPLE HAVE NO SENSE OF ANY SPORT STRATEGY (POSITIONING ROTATING DEFENSE / OFFENSE ...) SO TRY TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS INSTEAD !ADDICTIVE GAME OTHERWISE GOOD COUCH GAME TOO.THE AI IS PRETTY BAD BUT AN OFFLINE SEASONS MODE WHERE YOU PLAY WITH BOTS AGAINST BOTS IS A NICE ADDITION !9.5/10

A game done right no faults! Worth every penny.Except the players are awful you join an exhibition match and the other team calls you names and so do your team mates if you mess up and when ever you conceded a goal or two you team mate rages quits... why it's exhibition is doesn't even mean anything. Sorry I don't spend my whole life on this game.

Well it crashes every time I try to leave a lobby and the sound just died and now the game is completely silent every time I launch it and that's t but it's fun overall I guess.EDIT restarting the computer fixed the silence going borderless windowed fixed the crashing game is awesome.

"A lot of gamers today look back at the Nintendo 64 or Playstaton 1 and think ""Those were the golden days.. simplicity yet super fun"" ... they somehow captured this magic and brought it into the modern world. Even when I get slammed 0 5 in a match I leave happy. 10/10"

Ahh rocket leauge. If Fifa and Forza had an incestial love chind this would be the baby. Not only is thig game cheap but it is alot of fun Constant customizations competitive games and fun games with friends are all things you will experience while playing this game.

Rocket league is the most fun that I have had recently in a video game. When I need a break from raging in Dota 2 or CSGO or just need a quick game to play that I can put down at any time Rocket League is the game to go to. Playing with friends makes the game 10x better but being alone is nothing to be unhappy about.Overall this game is fantastic and something everyone should have in their Steam inventory for the low asking price.

"A simple concept perfectly executed. Has an incredible ""just one more"" stickiness to it. I can't stop playing!!! It could use some mini games or challenges to break up the monotony and teach some more advanced strategies but for the price it provides a huge amount of fun."

A highly competitive game with a seemingly infinite potential for skill development. After playing for hundreds or even thousands of hours you will surely still have much to learn. The fact that the learning curve isn't that difficult (you can jump right in for the first time and have a comparable ability as your opponents) creates a brilliant balance. Best of all the game is simply fun.

is a realy fun game but sinds the last update when i want to play a game and i click on play online and then find match it saysloading. then it will load the games/ playlists but this takes frever. i kept the game on for 1 hour and still it was loadingdoes someon know how to fix it or can someon fix this?i cant play a game just bicus the new update and the loading.

"""Perfection. That's what it's about. It's those moments. When you can feel the perfection of creation. The beauty of physics you know the wonder of mathematics. The elation of action and reaction and that is the kind of perfection that I want to be connected to.""Samuel Anders Battlestar Galactica (#4.20)"

Rocket League is a great mix of soccer and driving. It has that very nice mix of being fairly easy to pick up and play with a very straightforward goal but deep mechanics that mean you won't be flying up and knocking down arials on your first outing. The game is played best 2v2 or 3v3 so each member of the team is very significant much moreso than traditional soccer.

"It's all fun and games until you get to veteran level and if you haven't mastered your aerials by then you're ed. ING TRYHARDS GET OUTTA MY GAMEEEEEEEEEEEE.Chat isn't even voiced not a single ""Shazbot"" in there (not even ""Hi"") it's all gay as hell.Great game for listening to podcasts and music though.Not worth the full price unless you're a dull person like me I guess."

This game is great. It is a simple concept soccer with rocket cars but once you start getting the hang of it you realize how much depth you need to master. The games are short and action packed. It will keep you entertained for hours at a time with jaw dropping moments happening pretty often.

You will start this game and you will be terrible. You will try not to be terrible again and again. You will practice. You will get better. Then one day you will try to score a goal off a wall while soaring through the air on a plume of fire and the ball will go in on purpose and it will be so beautiful you will wonder wistfully about a world where this game doesn't exist and what a limp miserable place it must be for the people who live there.

There's an eff' ton of good reviews and for a good reason this game is mad and it only gets more enjoyable the more you play it.Repeating what many already have saidI HATE car games...I HATE sports games...I LOVE Rocket League!WARNING Controller is not obligatory but a must!

After 2 years of playing this game it is still by far one of the most creative and most fun games to play. Fast load times beautiful scenery around each stadium cool different game modes different types of customization for all vehicles CSGO simulator and most importantly salty competitive players.

In the beginning I thought I wouldn't enjoy this game so I never bought it. A friend then wanted me to get it so I could play with him so i decided to just get it it was on sale anyway. After a few hours I started getting a hang of the game and that was when I really started to enjoy it. Now every time I play it's like one more game please and an hour later I'm still playing. if you haven't picked this up yet i strongly reccomend it.

This game is everything you want for a fun chill game with your friends. Either on a split screen or online this game has it all. Competitive modes Chill funny modes with crazy acts or just practice against AI.It's the perfect combination between football and car games!

This is a really fun good game that is worth getting fot the price of it. A great feature is being able to connect your Xbox One controller or Play Station controller up to your PC and being able to use it to play this game. I also really like being able to play with people on PS4 while playing on PC.I'm sure you'll really enjoy this game and I would highly recommend it

simple fun. Remember the good old days when you and your siblings sat down to play a skill based game and get all excited when someone scored... Thats this game in a nut shell. Cool for playing with friends online. No dlc bs (yet) no purchasing scams. Just simple fun.

I very do recommend this game! I love playing rocket league with my friends. I always play this game almost EVERY SINGLE DAY! I'm glad that one of my friends recommended this game to me because if he didn't then I wouldn't have been writing this review.

This game is utterly fantastic. I picked it up a few years ago and I've been hooked ever since. It has a steep learning curve at first but then everything clicks and it's one of the best competitive experiences out there. Tight controls and physics gorgeous visuals and satisfying gameplay all rolled into one wonderful little package. I would recommend this to anyone with a functioning computer

Easy to learn insanely difficult to master. The matches are a perfect length as to not demand too much time in one go and the gameplay is very addictive. This is worth it at the standard price but I'd still see if there are sales of any sort coming up through the winter season. I legitimately have no complaints with this game. 10/10

This game is revolutionary. Multi platform based game allowing pc and ps4 compete against each other. They've set it up so you play others around your skill level. Leveling up you play more experienced gamers. Never gets boring. Highly recommend you add this game to your steam library.... then ill smash you at rocket league.

I bought this game about a year ago and I loved it from start to end. I have came across friendly people and that were such good sports even though they lost or won. This game is recommended for playing by yourself and friends which is great. Buy it because it's worth it.

Product received for free. In my Opinion this game is actually fun and make me try hard to be a professional player.It's must practise and practise more to be skillfull player. On Graphic and Gameplay I like it a lot because 4D and Soccer by carHey guys I recommend for person who look for funny football game but not recommend for people who easily dizzy.This game can make you headace sometime XD I rate 8.5/10

Best casual game of the year! Tons of fun. Easy to learn hard to master. Player db is really good. The dlc's are great with new cars and models and everything. Gets regular updates and new maps are added occasionally.It's great to see such a simple idea could come to life in such a perfect way.10/10

Fantastic game I can pick it up and play a couple matches without commitment. Usually a couple matches turn into a dozen though. Always coming out with new vehicles arenas and modes of play that keep it fresh. It is also a great game for playing with friends to just catch up and have a good time doing something other than generic shooter 26.

Easy to learn hard to master and addicting as f***.Even tho it might seem a bit simple and repetitve in the beginning you can spend hour after hour trying to get better and climb devisions in competitve.Controller and friends to play with recommended.

Product received for free. Personally I think that thid game is very good. IM really bad a t football in real life and this game just lets me be free. Brilliant Game Get a few friends to play with you and you'll have a ton of laughs.Edit After more playing my main concern is whether the game will still retain its original enjoyment in the future with only one type of game and all the maps having the exact same layout I can see it becoming boring further down the line. Bear in mind that this is still early days so they may add more in the future

This game is the best game I have ever played every 5 min match is a new feeling and a new game altogether you can spend hours on this game and caution this game may result in you failing your GCSEs lol. But its a hell of a game and i cant stop playing!

I decided to drop 15 for Rocket League and I am glad that I did. The gameplay is very simple but damn is it addictive. It is good fun to play with friends and also random players you encounter on line. The colourful graphics are great as well.It also has the Saltire (Scottish flag) in the game for attaching to your vehicle DI highly recommend this game!

I would recommend this game to everyone. Regardless of your skill level there is fun to be had. It's difficult to find a game that can be something silly to play after a few beers but also one of the most skill based games if you want something to practice playing.On the topic of practice there are few things more rewarding than when you finally start pulling off nice aerial shots.

MUST PLAY GAMEpros&gt Unlimited Fun&gt Car Customisations&gt Great Stadiums&gt Creative ways to score goals&gt Epic saves&gt Team work&gt Good servers&gt Great powers for the car to make the game more challengingcons&gt Highly adictive Time will go in a flash

CARS + FOOTBALL throwing your controller into the TV screen because you missed the easiest shot in the last seconds of the game and your team lost in overtime . Throw away your fidget spinners people cause this game is going to take care of your nerves .

Product received for free. This game is loads of whacky fun! The ability to customize my own little car made me feel special. The chaotic nature of the game leaves plenty of oppurtunity for failures and exhilirating successes. It does get a bit repetitive eventually but the multiple game modes help alleviate that. Not the deepest game but still loads of fun

Dear Psyonix I need to say that this game is amazing I am totally addicted to it and I am playing it before and after work to bad I cant install it on my job .
