i bought this game at a sale and i can clearly say it is worth every penny even if it wasnt on a sale its still a great game thats very fun to play with friends or alone and its soo addivtive for example if you need to go to sleep but your gonnna play one more game good thing is that the game is only 3 5 minutes D

Great game. Don't get discouraged when you first get this game and you are terrible. This game takes a lot of practice to get even half way decent at it. Stick with it and you will get better. Get some friends and play this game and lose all of your free time. I've been playing since the first week and this game just keeps getting better and better. Get this game and just play it for a few days. You wont regret it.

This is now one of my go to games when i get on my computer.It is really fun with friends having a laugh and talking. i would give this game a 10/10 if the ranking system wasn't pretty poor. its just not fair matching pro(me) against masters. If this will get fixed defintenly a 10/10. i highly recommend you get this game.

Solid game. many many hours of fun. Theres only one problem ive been running into and its that somtimes when all my online games work good this one will give you the disconect symbol. Even though its been a reocuring annoyance this is a great game that is worth the price.

I've never written a review and I'll likely never write another one... This is hands down one of the best games ever developed and I'm extreemly glad Psyonix did this sequel proper... They took a solid game and improved upon it. Anyone waiting for this game to go on sale is wasting time worth every penny.

I was looking forward to this game when I first saw it announced. I was a huge fan of the Car Soccer mode in Forza 4 and I can say that this is 9 999 999 times better. Flying cars that can flip forward to kick the ball into the goal from across the field?! I'm in! This game relies on skill and having good teammates and that is what makes it great along with the car customization. I can't wait to see what they add in the future!!!

"Warning This game is incredibly addicting. It's truly an embodiment of ""minutes to learn a lifetime to master"" it's so simple yet leaves so much room for growth. It's great for blowing off steam after a long day as well as allowing you to push yourself if desired by honing your skills in training and playing against other high flyers. Well worth the purchase."

Have played the game before and love it but for some reason on my mac it keeps shutting off abruptly and not letting me play. It is also super laggy unless I turn all settings to lowest quality while csgo runs properly on full quality. If you could help please message me over steam thanks.

This game has stolen my life and I don't even care. Ranked matches resetting your rank every few months is annoying as hell because then for weeks youll match up with gods and be obliterated so it's unplayable during that period.. That fact alone takes it down to 4 stars for me the fact you have to buy the additional toppers takes another half star (I'm not mad about buying cars thats fine I suppose)

Wasted almost 800 hours of my life on this game!..... Sometimes I want them back but then I realize that I'm going to probably blow another 800 hours on it.... Joking aside probably one of the best and most satisfying 5 minute games EVER! Great for people like me who only have a few free minutes at a time. Wish there were more games you can play in short bursts that were as satisfying. Flying goals always make your day better!

I can't find anything wrong with this game. It's the perfect game. I don't know what else to say.Tons of people still play it even though the hype is gone. At first I thought it was really dumb. Split Screen co op works great car customization is fun I have nothing bad to say. The community is pretty good too.

Product received for free. great game to enjoy. love the physics and how fun it can be at times. the game is solid but has issues.PROS very fun with friends good soundtrack very satisfying at points great competition CONS customization could be better no way to get keys unless you buy them NPC's are dumb as a rockOverall it is not a bad game and is actually good but it needs just a slight few improvements and it could be a great game. 9/10 rate.

Good gosh darnit. This game is the bee's knees. The bird's turds. The ant's pants. The cat's hats.11/10 would buy again. Actually I did buy this on Ps4 and got it for a Steam friend.Those buttery aerials and the feeling of passing the ball to yourself for the ultimate top dog play. Better than a double D escort in a luxury suite with complimentary breakfast my dude.

This game is incredibly fun to just pick up and play but has the depth to keep you coming back for hunderds and even thousands of hours. On top of that the community is great and the developers are constantly listening to feedback and working to improve.Whether you're looking for a fun couch party game or something that will take you thousands of hours to master it's really hard ot not recommend this game.

"Totally addictive I think this is one of the best games ever made! Its the only ""sports"" game I have ever enjoyed I even watch the online RLCS to see the pro's play. The single player offline AI is good and you can spend all your time in this mode the online games are great and the DLC is cheap and feeds the addiction. Jump in for 5 minutes and find an hour or so has gone by You have been warned )"

What's great about this game is that you can play in short bursts or have an hours long session thanks to its 5 minute matches. You can customize your car with free items obtained randomly or buy keys to unlock your crates and hope for an exotic item to show off in your next play. The game is simple to pick up but hard to master. Every few months there is an new update which includes new cars/new items and new free maps to play. The game never fails to surprise.

"Reccomended.The game is fun pretty addictive and challenging. Game mechanics are initially pretty easy to pick up but difficult to master. With the new item trading system it also is much more ""inviting"" to play as there's a feeling of progression.I was reluctant to buy it at first but I'm glad I did. Very fun especially with friends."

You know how you occasionally see a footy match going on and the fans are losing their heads over in the stands? Great game to play with friends. Would recommend to anyone that has friends. Would not recommend to people without friends. In other words this game derives much of its value from social interactions and while it is possible to play in a bubble like many online multiplayer games you lose most of what you pay for when you do this. If you and a group of friends are looking for something to play for a couple hours a week together this is the game for you.

Fast paced. Easy to pick up very tough to master. Can be casual or very competitive and the games aren't long so you can jump on and play a few if you do not have much time. New in game items and modes get added every season. One of my favorite games of all time.10/10

100% worth buying this game. I have a few friends who also purchased this game and it's great just to jump into and make some mlg plays. The game is constantly being updated and every couple of months there's new content to delve into. The online matchmaking is consistant and balanced the DLC is unique and worth the money. I play on controller and the support for it is excellent considering it's PC. Definitely recommend!

Could be a really good game if they fix ALL bug's the first 2 days there was no on line match's server's was not working now i have had random game crash's in game and failed to load the game a few times ! PLZ its really good fun when it works it just needs to work more !

Although it says i only have a few hours on this game it's because i just switched from ps4(about 350 hrs total) to pc (totally worth it) i basically have to say that this game is an incredibly fun and addictive game with an insane skill ceiling and that's what makes it so damn fun is the challenge. 10/10

Really great game! This game is really fun! In case you don't know it's soccer in rocket powered cars (football if you're not American)! I've been having a lot of fun with this game with my friends recently. Fantastic game would thoroughly recommend. Not only can you kick back into a casual game of football soccar but you can also try a competitive competition too for those who are.... competitive! Hands down this is the best college game. Whether you have 5 hours before your next class or even 12 minutes I will whip out my laptop just to get in a game or two. This is by far my favorite game and I've put in over 300 hours already. It's a must have game if you just want to shoot the bull with friends for a little while or if you're looking to go pro this is the game for you!

I wouldn't normally focus on an online multiplayer for fun but this game is pure perfection! Not the youngest guy online but this game rewards those who take the time to learn the nuances. Great game.The game is very skill based even though sounding like a silly concept. Community is pretty helpful you can find guides to help you become better at the game pretty quickly. If you buy this game don't expect to be hitting aerials quickly I have all this time on here and I still miss the occasional shot.9/10Hope this helps you. Have a nice day.

Yeah..I do recommend this game. Its pretty good. No really Its good. The game play is simple addicting and just full out fun. Even though it simple its just about perfect. I mean its just right on point! This is the reason freeweekends exist. To enjoy the wonders of the steam library!

Did you spend your childhood being torn between playing soccer and RC cars? "Rocket League is one of the most addictive games I have ever played. I originally got it for free on PS Plus when it first came out and instantly put over 100 or so hours into it. Rocket League is the very definition of ""easy to learn hard to master"". The game takes about 10 or so minutes to really learn the controls but there is so much more to learn. The game constantly revolves around skill and pure luck. The community is very active and for only $20 this game is an absolute steal!"

geat game fun to play solo even more fun with friends deffinetly worth the money 10/10. this game grips you with its fast past action soccer in order to win you must devise stratergies while incorperating all of your skill (ariels flips jumps etc) to get the perfect shot into goals.

Easily the best purchase that I have made on Steam in recent memory. It's like FIFA and MarioKart had an amazing lovechild. It manages to be super approachable as a newbie while having one of the highest skill ceilings that I have seen in a game (I'm 176 hours in and I am just to the point where I am starting to be comfortable even trying aerial shots).10/10 con't recommend this game enough. All I can say Wow!Wow!Nice shot!

I absolouty love rocket league. Great and amazing game. But i hate the ranking system online. Its kinda stupid and can take so many wins just to level up a division. I onces had to have 20 wins just to go to the next rank (silv2 silv3) i was kinda off by that. If rocket league can fix this I would be so happy.

Game is pretty fun and one of the few that I play nowadays. It can get very competive at times also. One major issue are the servers though! Sometimes it's hard to find a match (Not because people aren't playing there are just server issues) and ping can be quite high. Anyways I recommend the game to all! Especially if you have some friends to play with.

This is a very fun game that provides a new meaning to soccer and many other modes. This game provides a variety of modes whether soccer basketball or hockey or new rumble or mutated games. This provides tremendous variety and makes the game a very good game to play and I highly reccomend it.

This game is extremely fun to play but miserable at first since it has a lot of mechanics to master before you really get good at it. Only with 150 hours I can say it's one of the best multiplayer games out there. Also one of the best e sports game in my opinion. Definetly reccomending it!

This game is very addictive and nerve wreking. Nerves all ed up.. Beware... Especially online. It seems as if moving my body will get me closer to the ball.. I try and I try but I still manage to flip to far or to short. Either way its a head busser!!!

The Skill Ceiling in this Game is so unbelievably high that it even might turn off and drive away New Players. BUT the Training Modes are very good and the Bots can be very challenging. This rewarding Feel after Hours and Hours when you finally start hitting the Ball and then (if you have the Skill) it even continues to fly in the Direction you intended...10/10 would recommend!

I realized just now that i still haven't made a review for this wonderful thing. I've never had a game make me so anxious calm elated deflated and hyped all in just a 5 minute session. Truly the best sports game I have ever played and one of the best games bar none.

This is one of my favourite games of all time and played on almost every couch coop evening. Haters gonna hate but if you are one of us you just wont get enough of those sweet air shots. Newbies are welcome they learn fast if they are into it. Also the price tag is awesome. Get ready to get crushed online though.

This game is funny stressful and above all it recks your relationship with your friends ( in a good way) it destroyes it and then you build it back up ten fold. It can be dificult to get a good network to play on but there is a singleplayer mode where you fight bots. I reccomed this game to anyone with a strong internet connection and has time on theyr hands.

This game is a great filler. The matches are quick the physics are fun and the game play is intense. I enjoy the competitive mode even tho they just reset the ranks (UGH!!!). The graphics are great the car customization is fun to play with the DLC is affordable and fun. It's a great game if you play casually or competitively good for any level of player.

Super balanced easy to pick up game. Not frustrating. Enjoyable win or lose. Awesome game easy to pick up but hard to master. The crates are a fun addition and don't really impact gameplay besides pure cosmetic aspects. This is the only game I play every day for an hour or two. It's just the best for that kind of gaming. No you won't get as good as the others with +/ 500hrs hours played that way but it's just so easy to either have few matches or get stuck for hours... depends mostly on how you're doing at the moment.

To be honest. You have all heard of Rocket League by now. My friend a while back convinced me to buy this. I did. And I fell in love. The developers of this game are amazing. It sounds stupid but is just so much fun. Most fun I had in any game for a while.It's easy to get into but super hard to master. If you like getting personally better at something and playing a game where skill matters this one is for you.It's also nice that rounds are only about five minutes so you aren't bound to the game by prolonged periods of time. Be prepared for the ultimate learning curve. Your team will usually consist of people who have no idea how to hit the ball and the opponents have a guaranteed 600+hours put into beating the crap out of Rookies. Ranked and unranked are virtually the same considering your teammates will always be awful.9/10 will continue to play regularly.

Highly recommended game. The learning curve is so smooth and enjoyable on all parts. You start off barely able to hit the ball and progressively work your way to flying through the air to land a ball. For anyone who wants to become an advanced player there are metagame tactics involved but these don't become necessary until you've mastered all the basics. Overall a great game for casual and competitive play.

Product received for free. The seemingly unreachable skill ceiling makes this one of the most rewarding games I've ever played.You'll want to have a few friends because around 100 hrs or so into playing you'll start to require teamwork to succeed more.

Well the time has come.... i have 1000ish hours in this game have played across ps4 and pc and just want to thank the devs for creating such an amazing game this is by far my favoirte game i have ever played if you havent played it just give it a shot its amazing!

This is the best game I have played all year. Its like nothing I've ever played before and I would (and have) recommended this game to anyone. If you're still on the fence about this game believe me you will not regret it.Best $19.99 I have ever spent. 10/10(Also the Supersonic Fury DLC Pack was DEFINITELY worth it and I would buy it again if I could!)See you in a match!

I LOVE THIS GAME!!!!! ITS SOO WORTH THE 20 DOLLARS!!!!! This game is a lot of fun and when you have friends playing this game with you its even more fun. Plus come on driving super fast cars to hit a huge ball in a big goal where there is only 5 minutes to win??? The big goal sounds easy to score on but really its not. How can you not love this game? The game itself looks amazing with the detail to every little graphic awesome soundtrack and five minute games make it so the game is not overwhelming time consuming. Whether you are a hardcore gamer or a recreational one I think everyone will enjoy this game.

I've been playing Rocket League since launch and the experience has since never dulled. Few games pump the adrenaline at such an intense rate and Rocket League does so with zero diminishing return. I'm appalled at how the developers have kept gameplay fresh with so many variations and the title has left a plethora of unforgettable memes in it's wake.10/10 will play again... Just one more... Just one more..

"It's been a long time since i've played a game that's kept me coming back night after night.""Easy to learn hard to master"" describes this game well.Making an impossible shot or mounting a huge comeback are very rewarding experiences in this game.The hook to this game is that you feel like you are getting better all the time."

Best sports game on the market. This game will have you cursing your friends and enemies alike. It may not look like much but it is incredibly hard to master but very easy to play even if you cant ever master the complexities of the game like some of the crazy flying the pros do. Pick it up its well worth the $20 bucks.

565 hours on record and I still try to find the time to play it every night. The skill ceiling is so high there is always room for improvement and the satisfaction of pulling off more difficult moves keeps the drive going. Psyonix is also very responsive to player feedback. A+

Do you like football? Do you like cars? Well it doesn't matter because this is something of it's own... league? Anyways great game loads of fun especially with friends so get a friend or two lay back and score goals that you don't even know how you did it!

I think this game is amazing it has provided much playability for me. I think it is tough but it lets you play with bots to train. I have not done much with competitive mode but that doesn't mean I can't have fun. Rocket League is my third most played game on Steam and one of the things that beats it is a clicker game which I let run overnight. I think this game is very much worth $15 especially with new updates coming every month.

Product received for free. Got RL for free with the steam controller preorder. Even if I had to pay for it it's been one of the best games I've ever played definitely worth the $20. They update constantly and you can either play a few matches for 30 mins or binge it for a day straight. Once you get the controls down it's fantastic and highly replayable. A bit frustrating at first when you're getting wrecked by people who know what they're doing and are scoring air goals. Great game!

Fantastic game! After putting over 700 hours into this game I have to say that this is hands down one of the best games I've ever played. It can definitely get frustrating at times but pressing and playing over and over without giving up is the key to getting better!

"Don't hang on the fence here worth a buy. Enormously high skill ceiling awesome fun great community and it's even better with friends. My 'go to' whenever I have a bit of spare time. Playing some split screen through Nvidea surround is also something worth trying out! (Spread surround over two screens and enable vertical splitscreen). Nothing wrong at all glad to see that the developers are still working on new features!

I used to love this game but man the community is cancer.I recommend the game but the community and psyonix for not even taking any actions against the toxic cancerous players.LOOK HOW MANY HOURS DO I HAVE YOU CAN SEE IT RIGHT? NOW I'M NOT HAVING FUN OF IT CUZ THIS HAS GONE TOO FAR.

I've played this game over and over and to be fair it won't be for everyone. To me however it is this generations Smash Bros equivalent. Great fun with friends just tooling around online AND it has quite a good learning curve / deep skill set IF you want to take it seriously. 10/10.

I have played this game on both the PS4 and PC quite a lot. I'm not the best player but I always have fun. The game is easy to learn and hard to master. I have definitely not mastered it yet. I have however enjoyed probably 600+ hours in this game. Considering I got it for free on the PS4 it is an incredible return on my investment. Because I loved a game that I got for free so much I've now bought it several times for friends on both PC and PS4. I can not recommend this game enough.

Rocket League is the most fun game I have ever played. Also I personally feel that the DLC is well priced. However the seems to have been a problem for a few months now that still has yet to be fixed. This issues has made competitive unplayable for me as the competitive servers are worse than the ones for casual. The gameplay is great though but the servers need to be addressed ASAP.

This game is amazing it's really fun and it's really addictive to play. Not that you can't stop playing but it's hard to put down. I only have a 1000 hours on this but it is by far the best game I have ever played on any of the accounts I have. thank you so much for whomever came up with this game please don't stop coming up with ideas I will probably never stop playing this game!

Bought the 4 pack for me and the three friends I usually play with and man do I not regret this purchase. You know you wanna buy it so go ahead and support these devs. They deserve it!

Hi so Rocket League is a game that gets you addicted very quickly! It's a hell lot of fun to play when you get the first hang on it. I never understood how people yelled at sports before playing this game. I now yell at this game like people yell at sports. Except I'm yelling at myself for missing the ball. While it's incredibly frustrating at times those times you do make epic shots makes all the rage worthwhile.

I can't fault this game. Fast paced 5 mins of action every game. A very addictive game hard to put down once you start. I would suggest this game to anyone who loves single player fun and multiplayer action amongst friends. It's a MUST to get for your game collection.

Legit this game is one of the best games on the market today! I've been playing for almost a year now and have enjoyed it ever since. Bought this game shortly after release for a fun split screen experience with firends. Very fun and easy to play There's a ton of modifiers and game modes to keep things interesting for people just looking to have some fun but also has competitive modes with a surprisingly high skill cap if you're looking for a challenge.I can't get enough of Rocket League.

This game is just amazing it is a really cool game to play with some friend. It is a game easy to play and hard to master so even if you dont play often you can have fun too and on the other side if you want to play more competition there is always new tricks to learn. a good game that i recommend

I Think rocket league is a simple easy to play game its probably the cheapist game out there that u can have a lot of fun with on steam theres a bunch cool stuff in this game which is a lot of fun especially with friends the only thing i dont like about this game is u get crates for playing but u need to buy keys for money like cod points for supply drops but one thing they can do to make this game better is make it so every 10 games u get 5 keys otherwise this game is worth ur money

I bought it played it and loved it for the price you get what you pay for!A lots of fun and rage but if you got friends to play with it's even more fun.The game worth the penny.I bought most of the DLC to contribute to the dev and because I like to have some extra body to choose from in the game.No regret at all!!!

This game is AMAZINGLY Fun. When you play with friends it takes it to another level. This is the only time I like playing soccer is when I play this game. What I really want in this game is like some type of racing involved. Such as races time trails competitive racing.

"The game is fantastic. For something as simple as ""soccer for cars"" there is certainly a lot to master. The only down side here lately has been the amount of ""smurfing"" that happens with competetive play. It's great to pick up a match quickly if you have a short amount of time to play a game."

Thought this would just be a casual soccer game... neck minute.I've bought a controller for more precise aerials upgraded to an ultrawide screen to get a better refresh rate and a wider field of view.Hundres of keys later and all the DLCs I've got absolutely no regrets I cannot get enough of this game.and now I'm even looking at buying some merch....Rocket League isn't a game it's a way of life.

I usually don't like sport games but i love rocket league. The main difference is that in rocket league you don't just press a button to pass and another to shoot on goal in RL you have to drive or jump into the ball at a specific angle to get the result you want every shot is different and as a result every goal is exciting. The devs are also doing a good job of continuously improving the game. There are some issues with bad servers but most of the time it works just fine.

I bought this game pretty soon after it was available and still play it almost daily. It is one of those easy to learn hard to master type of games. The ability to join games in matter of seconds and the short format of the matches makes this the ideal game to play those short moments you have available.

this game will never get old! always adding new and exciting content which keeps the game feeling fresh! sometimes matchmaking may be bad but rocket league has many other qualitys that make up for it! i would reccomend this game as it is extremly fun! and playing with friends can make for some hilarious moments!

At the end of 2017 Rocket League remains one of my favorite games in my library. It was definitely my multiplayer GOTY when it came out in 2015. Games are fast intense and very fun. This game is easy to play but very hard to master. Psyonix the developer has been fantastic in their support of this game. Hours and hours of competitive fun!

A Multiplayer Blast! There are countless hours of fun to be had with rocket league. Rocket leagues fast paced football frenzy is defiantly worth picking up for just over ten pounds. There are plenty of awesome cars to choose from and decals to customise them with. The maps are stunning and the game modes are incredible. This game gets updated regularly with new content each time making you want to come back for more! 9/10

Soccer with cars? Absolutely! the graphics are great. the physics are fine tuned. the community can be childish but chat is easily customized or disabled in settings. Best of all it's not like other pay to win games. you won't be buying any special powers that make you faster or more powerful. Skill and practice is all that's required.

It's very fun. The game is able to be played for 100s of hours without loosing its playability. The ability to customize your car from drops you get in game or from crates adds a whole other aspect to this game by ways of trading and striving for the best gear.

Product received for free. When my friend first showed me this game i thought it looked stupid and dumb. He ended up buying it for me so i'd have to play with him and i've never put so many hours into a game! this game is full of fun and laughter. (with a tad (lot) bit of salt) The experience is still fun regardless if you're good or bad

This game will never get old. Ever. I Reccomend this game if you like having your bunghole clinched for a good 5 min. Although I do not reccomend this game if you get angry. I do not get angry at ANY videogames because i just play them for fun but this one I get ING AT. But hey buy it.

This game is awesome this game is fun I finally hit Gold 1In Doubles at 1.It took me long About 3 weeks + Now I'm staying strong Waiting for these servers To stop making a fuss And come back upYes you see the server are down And I'm not sure what to do So I sit here and frown Sitting here without you.SNARF!

This game is insanely addicting. I don't usually play sports games or multiplayer games but this one felt different to me. There have been some issues with matchmaking and server issues but my games have not been affected recently. All of the paid DLC is cosmetic and does not affect the game which is nice if you don't want to spend extra money after the initial purchase. I would recommend this game to everyone.

This game is so much difficult with my keyboard and mouth thus I got XBOX controller for this game.1st impression its amazing game that I've ever seen as soccer game.but its hard to play technically need skills and knowledge to expect where ball go.Anyway this game is not crap or something like you think. buy it.

This game is insanely funny. The controls will take you some time to learn but once you got them covered the crazy starts multiplying. I do feel the current price is a little high so you should pick it up on a sale which happens quite frequently.I also don't really like the DLC's but they are cosmetic only so it doesn't impact gameplay just another way for the devs to make a little money by adding a model.

Probably one of the most fun and adicting games I have EVER played buy it now and play with a controller you definitly won't regret it. No hackers nice servers a community that is not toxic overall this is perfect. I have 122 hours and i am not near getting bored of it.

Good but at times the game starts glitching and a red lightning thing turns up for the whole match leaving you stuck for the whole match this just happened to me 3 times in a row and so i forfeited each game then the game banned me from playing matches for 10 minutes because of me keep forfeiting which i think is ridiculous and disgraceful.

Easily one of the best multiplayer games ever made. I find myself coming back to this game more often then I realized. They could easily do a Tron Light Cycle Mod for this game which would be super cool as well. Or even Disc of Tron like that old stand up arcade game. Which was bad !! Anyways this game rocks plan and simple...

Well as the community grew and the fame of the game upheld I once again played the game. From my perspective now I DO like the game as of the FPS DOESN'T drop as much as the past version did from the further smoothing updates. So here is in my appreaciation to Rocket League creators Psyonix a good review NO ONE LISTEN TO THE OTHER PEOPLE THAT DON'T GIVE GOOD RATINGS AND HAVE LOWER IN GAME HOURS!

I have spent around 400 hours in this game in quite short period of time. Truely amazing stuff great competetive challenge posibility to master controls with your wheels ranked matchmaking section. All I love about competetive games comes with Rocket League. Get it boys!!!!

A game that at first glance appears to be a simple title that offers a fun night with friends Rocket league is crazy fun and easy to control with many menuevering tricks to learn for advanced players. I told myself after playing it at a friends house one night that I would wait for it to go on sale but the next day all I wanted to do was play rocket league!

this game may be very odd looking and ridiculus but you have to experience the game before you judge it. this game is an amazing crossover of cars soccer and rockets that somehow is perfectly balanced and fun. its so fun its even fun when you lose. and to anyone who is unshure about this game i can assure it is well worth 20 dollars and i highly reccomend it.

HeyThis is my opnion on the game. Its a realyl fun game its really worth the money but if you dont have any mates playing it it can be boring.1. its a really funny game wort 20Euros defiently.2. It looks really good ingame and its just a awesome game overall

Unique with a steep learning curve. But entirely worth it! Trust me this game for what this game is it is perfect at it and there is no other. It has a strong esports vibe great attention by developers and just a perfect formula overall. If you enjoy racing games and soccer hockey basketball or even just the idea of the combination of those GET THIS GAME This is a modern day rite of passage and something I recommend that you try regardless of your specific taste in games.

What should i say. An amazing game that brings a lot of fun with it. It doens t matter if you play alone or with friends it s always fun. For me i must say i like to play it more with a friend than alone and this is one of the main keys of the game to play it as a team. But you can only say amazing game hours about this game and Nothing else .

If you like team oriented sports and a game that can be very enjoyable both competitively and casually this is a game for you. It's a lot of fun. At first I wasn't sure how to feel about it but after playing it for a few hours I found that I really loved it. Give it some time and it will grow on you.

Many people start describing their experiences with this game with them explaining that they thought the premise of playing football with cars seemed dumb. I remember looking for stuff like this on free online game sites. Then this game came along. I was immediately hooked. I wasnt able to convince my friends that this was a good game. I have new friends now they do like this game. Rocket League is fun. I reccomend.

I played this game for first time on my friend's account. Decided to make my first steam purchase for this. Annnnnnnd it is totally worth it. have been palying 3 4hrs a day never get bored of it. it feel different in every game even tho its same gameplay. Have been hooked to this game. Would recommend it to gamers trying something new.

Good fun game with lots of variety however since the patch on April 26th I've experienced my ping going up from its previously stable 30ms to regularly being in 200 250ms. Not good enough Rocket League when I'm almost a third of a second behind the game.

Top game singleplayer good luck trying to play online. The amount of rubberbanding / connection issues this game throws up just makes it unplayable online. When the devs sort the servers this game is a must buy!Edit 09.02.15 For server issues unplug your router for say 1 min plug back in seems problems are rted can confirm myself I've had no issues at all I also kept all my settings for router.Edit 26.03.15 Why have you not bought this yet ?

Rocket League is by far the most fun game I played in a long time. The developers did a gread job (and still do with constant updates). The pricing of DLC is fair the crates are well balanced and overall it's a perfect example of how to release maintain and market a game.

"Pure fun. The game is crazy fast and doesn't pull down your computer at all. The physics in the game are so good that there is a massive learning curve. Matchmaking is almost instant and the games are only 5 6 minutes long.Get a few friends to play with you and your family will be begging you to be quiet. My friend told me about the game and I said ""so it's soccer with cars.""It sounded pretty lame. I'm glad I trusted him!"

I like Rocket League But there is a big issue concerning Lag spikes within the game due to the amount of RAM needed for this game... When you have 8GB the game laggs as hell.I replaced it with 16GB and now everything is fine again....This is a major issue for Rocket League which needs to be solved by the developers.

"Well I held off on buying and playing and then a friend said ""play it! WITH ME!!!!"" So I did then I won a few games then I made challenger in ranked. Then I just had this spiral of hookers and blow while playing rocket league. So much regret and abuse. . . . . Wait this is A.A. online meeting correct?You won't regert buying this game espcially if you're going to play with friends. See you punks! on the feild!"

This is no doubt the best game I played on steam. When you start the game you like what can be so good in soccer with cars but when you play its like you must scream (recomend not to play in night so father wont come and hit you with his fist because you woke him up P).

Easy to get a hang of hard to master. Really good game physics are well made you can expect whatever happens (except some weird rare glitches).Definetely recommend this game.Recommend playing with a controller but you can manage with the Keyboard and mouse.

Probably the only game I've ever played that's caused me large amounts of stress frustration and rage quits but yet I still come back for more. Why?!Fantastic blend of physics and fun game mechanics. I would say the only thing to watch out for is the attitude of some opponents but if you ignore that and sink into the game it gets really fun really quick and oh so satisfying when you nail an arial corkscrew backflip goal from your half.

Great game but a few problems The ingame mic is crapThe ping goes up sometimes and goes right back downThe quick chat should have a feature where u can add ur own textsSometimes when ur internet gets cut off and u quit from a ranked match in bans from matchmaking for 30 minsThats it but anyways this game is great

I got play this game in the weekend when it was free I thought my pc could not run the game but it was very easy not hard to do at all my pc is that is why I thought I could not run Rocket League that is why I did not buy the game I will most likely buy the game since I know that my pc can run it .

This game is a really fun sports game and pretty much anyone can play it. I recommend using a controller but keyboard and mouse is also perfectly fine. I recommend this game alot by its quality and amount of things to do. The only reason this game really has a downside for me is that people are mean in the chat sometimes but just ignore them and if you like sports Rocket League is a smart choice.

Really simple game mechanics yet so intuitive and rewarding.What most I love about this game is how fast you're diving into the action you can find a match in seconds with each game mode. Gets really addictive once you get the hang of it I thought it was childish at first but after trying it out on the free weekend I found it competetive skillful and good ol' clean fun.Had lots of fun this weekend if you have any doubts about purchasing it it is worth the money.

Product received for free. A TRUE test of skill strategy and occasional chaos. A simple premise with rewarding gameplay. It can be frustrating exciting dramatic and sometimes intense. Scratches several itches if you love fast paced gameplay that rewards quick reactions savvy team play and skill based learning.9/10

its a good game all above but i have frame rate issuses with the aquarium map i think they should at least add a setting were you are able to choose which maps you would like to play in matchmaking on to solve the lower specks people from lossing a competitive match over framerate issuses

Super Fun game xD Awesome to play with Friends the cars are Awesome and its very cool when you get new stuff for the cars in the end of a game. at the begining i was not sure if the game was worth spending 20 bucks so i bougth it on promocion but now i know that for the the fun it gives and play with friends i would probably buy it for that price xD

Absolutely love this game. The best part about this game is that it has something to offer for every level of player and at each level there is so much left to uncover about it. It's deceptively simple yet contains within it layers and layers of complexity should you wish to uncover it. I'm absolutely addicted and hooked! Would recommend this anyday!

To start off this game is amazing i have put many hours into playing this game and still enjoy it. It is very easy to learn and is fun to play with or without friends you can either play casually or competitevly. The graphics are amazing and each car has the same stats so it would never be unfair. If your looking for a fun not so realistic game that will last you a long time then this is what you should get.

I get every friend who comes to my house to play this game and we always end up playing for hours. It is so much fun the devs are very responsive and the DLCs are a blast. I could play the hockey mode alone for days on end. I can't get enough of this game.

So i said i would try this game when it was free on ps4 and said it looked stupid why am i downloading this.... after putting 500 hours in on ps4 and 200 on pc i can tell you this game is life.... life.... life.... only play it if you like ing your pants or like that you know... but fr fr it's life...

this game has its ups as well as the downs. It's one of those games that its your accual skill as well as luck to be good and yes this game will make you shake the controller and yell at the screen and you will quit but you just keep comeing back to it and even if you dont like soccer (i dont i find it borring to watch) this game is much more you drive you hit a ball you make goals and you blow people up its simple10/10 great game.

After playing this game for a while I've realized that this is a very well created game an awesome gameplay mode and it's awesome to play it with friends also you can always make a quick game when you don't have time so that's awesome too.All I got to say is that this game was totally worth it and I fully recomend it.

I dont like football and i dont like cars......but i LOVE this xDToo bad theres too many csgo players though.Games usualy start with full teams but as soon as the other gets 1 or 2 goals in advance most games usualy turn into players vs bots. Now regarding the quiters and losers two words git gut.

Great fun to play especially with friends not particularly hard to pick up but quite hard to master and perfect. Still love playing this even after 600 hours of gameplay.Just have to be careful of the trolls and sometimes harsh/incensitive language but that's to be expected from games of this sort anyway.

This game has been the epicentre of my year of gaming in 2016.Since release this game has became a massive hit and it's understandable why.It has great community support refined and extremely responsive controls impressive artwork and level design free new content and most importantly it's so cheap!!!

One of the best games i have ever played insanely simple idea with brilliant execution if ever anyone wants to play a chill game this is up there. You could just pick it up play a game and put it back. Amazing game.... would recommend to anyone to get it if you can believe the most fun you'll ever have like legit I THE PRESIDENT OF THE USA approve this game

Let me start by saying if you put more than 50 hours into this game you'll probably put more than 300 into it. It is so much fun and highly addictive because there is always a new skill to learn and if there isn't there is always another game to play. I highly recommend this game because it is such a unique blend of traditional sports and racing genres that will keep you coming back for more.

Oh boy... this game.At first I wasn't sure if I were going to like this game and a friend of mine convinced me to buy it.One of the best decisions in my life.This game just rocks your whole world and everything beyond it.It's cool fast loads of fun and simple af. But once you get to learn all of the depth of this game it just becomes more and more awesome while you slowly start losing all of your friends even those who play this game because they suck.I rate solid 5/7.

Simply the best game I've ever played. It's easy to learn but there's always new things you can practice and perfect. There's always people better than you forcing you to work harder so you can eventually beat them. More fun to play than full price triple a games. Just buy it already!

This Game is totally addicting. I'm playing it more or less regularly since September 2015 and i love it till now. It has many new things coming in frequently updates what kepps the game interesting although it's played for almost 1k hours. It's also ragefilled because if something doesn't work out like you wanted it to it can get pretty annoying and gets you easily But although i came back playing it and all in all i had a very good and nice time playing it. I totally recommend it D

So much fun! Even if you're not into football or driving games I guarantee you will enjoy this. Only negative point I have is that there could be more single player modes possibly tournaments or challenges. Nonetheless brilliant game worth every penny.

This game is one of the funnest games I've ever played. Even though I am rubbish at it it is so addicting. You know a game is good when you enjoy watching others play on their broadcasts and get the same thrill as when you are playing yourself. 10/10!!!

Rule #1 Buy a 4 packRule #2 pass out copies to brosRule #3 Destroy the competetionThis is one of the best games out there period. Top of its genre by a million miles nothing really stacks up to this game. The skill cap is ridiculous and the replay value is infinite. I bout a 4 pack for 20 bucks when it came on sale. Totally worth so worth that I gladly buy the DLC cars to support the developer.

This one of the best games I have ever played. I highly recommend it to anyone. Even people that do not play many games would like Rocket League. I have never got bored when playing this game and I think it is well worth money. The developers are some of the best as they always release new content for free and none of the game has any sort of pay 2 win aspect. That automically puts it at the top of my list for game of the year

"Bought it for twenty so basically full price. A phenomenon everlasting gaming legend already.Games are short so if you only have a few minutes you hop in for a quick game... and usually overstay your session by a lot . Then you just kind of forget you had to be ""in places"" an hour ago. And then you do it again and again and again...RL is still getting content updates. And they're free. In 2018."

"Product received for free. I love this game but there are some things that should change but they are not because of developer they're because of the players who play this game. Too much toxicity too little compliments and ""I'm having fun!"" players. Developers are doing great job giving us new stuff to obtain new maps and new game modes. I recommend this game because it really is fun to play this when you don't let the other players bring you down."

THEY FIXED IT. Now only improve FPS on the maps that got fixed.Ruined by new maps. The frustration with it outweights the fun now. Ranked queue has experimental maps that ruins it's play and there is no way to disable it. The community is also immensly toxic and this is coming from a DotA2 player. Don't put time in this play it as a party game.

To put it simple this game is a blast. Whether playing solo or with friends you can have hours of fun. It takes a little bit(not too long) to get used to movement especially for mouse and keyboard users. Better if you use a controler. However after a few games you should have it down easily. I an honestly entertain hours of fun with this game. I strongly recommend buying this game. it is amazing.

This has to be one of the best games I've ever owned. Always keeps me coming back for more. No matter how long you've played there is always something to get better at! Just when you think it starts to get a bit stale a new mode is released! If only Omni didn't mis the ball so often...

"good fun game in which you will think you will never be like the pros but when you spend enough time in it you will be ... sorta.. kinda. whatever just remember its fun game and being pro is not everything.* the game is always updated (mostly with the content that players ask for). * all of its maps are free.* many other good things which i don't have time to lista handful advice. don't get drifted in the glorious infinite loop of ""1 more game"" D"

Wikid combo of cars and soccer mixed in with mad flips and crazy aerials. At 5mins a game super fun and easy for the laid back casual and the hardcore gamers alike. Huge customizational options for you from what car you use to paint decals hats and antennas. A must have hundereds of hours of fun await.

Rocket League...What more can I say... After hours and hours playing the SARPBC after years the sequeal had arrived. What a brilliant idea executed so well. Simple beautiful and fun are the words I would use to describe this game. I rate this game very highly and have played the sh*t out of it. 10/10 for me!

i have not purchased this game for myself but have been using it through my friends library and its the best. I havent had this much fun in a game in a while now its super fast paced and exciting. I highly recommend getting this game if you are on the fence about it just do it its amazing.

This game is the best sports game in a long long time. It takes a special kind of sports game where you can only blame yourself for things going wrong. It's about as perfectly balanced as any game can be and the developers have wisely resisted the temptation to pay for any advantages so far. I own it on both console and PC as do my kids and although I'll never be an expert it'll go down as one of my favourite games of all time to play with them and by myself.

"Great waste of time my favorite game. You can go on it for a 10 minute session or play it all day which is my favorite part of the game not being ""committed"" to playing it for long at a time.I played SARPBC it is a semi worthy sequel to that as it lacks the original maps (utopia is no longer round stadium too ship and stuff is not there) and I can only hope that they will bring this in the future"

Don't really know what they are doing with the game right now. I don't know what is up with the ranking system It's all over the place sometimes. When you play doubles sometimes it will be matched likes this (s2 g2 vs s2 g2) g Gold s Silver. It gets annoying when it gets matched up like this it can cause problems like for example toxicity and negative reactions. Other than that the game is pretty stable and fun to learn and play!

Simple but EXTREMELY addictive. There's a reason why there's a big competitive scene for this game. The game is very easy to pickup but extremely hard to master it. You may be able to achieve a few advanced tricks but it'll take a crazy amount of practice.

This game has brought me more joy than any other game in a very long time! For some reason I constantly find myself laughing my off while still fulfilling my competitive urge. So far the community has been very nice and have not run into any hackers (yet). I love the variety of customization of verhicles and all the different game types. Perfect game for killing 5 10 minutes or 5 10 hours. Highly recommend 5/5!

"""Just one more game...""Easy to learnEnjoy playing for 5 minutes or 5 hoursEthical microtransactionsGreat to play with friendsFun at all skill levelsRuns great on older PCsI find myself going back to this game every night. It's very addicting and worth trying."

This game is good but it is hard to play with a mouse and keyboard. I mean it is okay as long as the ball is on the ground but when it gets in the air it is very hard to hit if u are playing with a keyboard. So if u are planning to play ranked with a keyboard and u have about 20h into the game then u are problably gonna get stuck in bronze forever and even there it is hard to play but if u plan to play it casually it is a nice and relaxing game.

Not a big fan of competitive e sport games since I HATE what gaming has become. (A story for later) This game is just pure fun to play with friends for me. I stay away from the competitive side of it. Also it's money hungry with DLC and crates. If your like me and hate the triad of evil in gaming (DLC MIcro transactions E Sports) then avoid this one. Unless your ALSO like me and have friends to play with.

You really can't describe it till you've played. If you don't like sports you'll probably be put off by this game. If you love sports let's face it you're already playing this. I just encourage you to give it an hour of your life. You can thank me later!

A game that is easy to pick up but that allows you to become skilled if you play enough. It's a really fun format as matches last 5 minutes. If you're getting crushed and rage it's only gonna last 5 minutes ). The best thing about it for me is that it allows you to play multiplayer split screen. (ON PC? YES!) Best played with a controller in my opinion.

Do you like football ?NO !Do you like Cary racing ?Hell No !Well do you like rocket ?#uck jeah Thats all it is. Cars suck football sucks but rockets ? maaan rockets are freaking awsome.So if you like science space and match o god damniot this game is for you !!!

Sometimes I'm good sometimes I'm bad and for the occasional abuse you get from your team when you are getting mauled it's a wonderful pick up and play game. It's taken over from CS GO as my multiplayer favourite I don't even mind buying the DLC.Don't go watching YouTube videos of professionals as you will come away feeling very inadequate.

If you want to play this game competitively it's going to dissapoint you if your ping isn't absolutely perfect. When you have 75+ ping the game likes to dc you for a few seconds at a time at least once a game and it's enough to make you want to pull your hair out. Could be a really good game but the servers aren't good enough to warrant anything more than casual fun.

Literally soccer with rocket powered RC cars this game is completely addicting. The high intensity gameplay mixed with the mentally challenged teammates of online play come together to create this perfect game. This is one of those games where you can play for hours and not even realize it.Just... one... more... game...

Well well well.Don't get stopped by the fact that this game is about cars or look like football if you don't like any of these two things.Rocket League has a unique gameplay and will provide you as many hours of fun as you need being in split screen or online.There are new free updates every month or so and the community is quite nice (for an online game ))

"Car soccer is the best game for when you want to kill 5 minutes then have it turn into an hour. Fun with strangers and even better with friends. The community isn't toxic and not many people are tryhard. You'll be quick chatting ""Wow!"" before you even know it."

"It's a game that even though you can't get good enough at you can still have a lot of fun.This game provides those ""last minute"" plays that makes you feel like a part of the most awesome match ever even if you are a noob.Played many hours on PS4 moved to PC and playing ever since.It's good to see a game made by some passionate guys and that care about the community and are always trying to improve (I'm looking at you NMS)"

This game is awesome! Normally I am not into cars or soccer but the way this game combines the two is just phenomonal. I play this game a lot and i'm glad I found it. Rocket League is a surprisingly addictive game and I reccomend this game to anybody looking for a fun action packed multiplayer game. It's definitely worth the money.

I love this game so much I play it more than any of my other games. I would say get it it is so much fun to play alone or with friends with crazy modifiers to the game. I do find that I had to go out and buy a controller specifically for the game. It might just take more patients to learn keyboard and mouse most all my friends who play the game play keyboard and mouse though so its do able.I would recommend the game I have had so much fun with it.

no but seriouslythis game is awesome. the gameplay is intense and the replays just look so ing epic there are so many different strategies that you can carry out with your friends and i haven't even gotten into ranked yet. you should just buy this game already.
