Very nice game Very smooth and is worth the price.If there is a toxic person just report them and move on.Nice quality and looks amazing.Realy nice tutorial and maps.It has so much combinations of cars and the crates are on point.10/10 Worth the price

What a Game!What a Game!What a Game!Chat disabled for 4 seconds.This game is basically football with cars.This game comes in layers.By the time you get good at something there is something new to learn.By the time you can stop all grounded shots aerial shots will start coming.By the time you can dogde the ball you'll see everyone flying and dogding.By the time you get good enough to fly and merely touch the ball you'll see someone 360 no scope.I love this game.

Have not been this captivated by a videogame in a long time. Approachable at many levels. Fun to play online solo or with friends.Only reason it might not be worth getting is if you have very poor or zero internet access as offline vs AI is only okay.

Alright... so if you thought cars we're awesome this game made cars even better. Rocket league brung cars and soccer together making this game what it is now... With your selection of your car and costimization it makes the game 2* the fun.personaly I love this game and you should try it.

I have had so much fun with this game! I love the customization options for the cars ball and stages. This game never gets old! There are training classes you can take to hone in on your skills you can create custom games with friends or join other random players online! If you enjoy fast cars competition and sillyness you should give this game a try!

I have so much fun with this game even if I suck. This is the only game I play right now that when I am playing it I am having fun. This game can sustain gameplay for several thousands of hours if you wanted it to and it is well worth your money. On top of this the DLC and in game purchases are executed perfectly.

One of the best implementations of cross platform multiplayer that I know of. Great gameplay for lan partys split screen family fun or just playing online. The competitive esports scene also supports this game so there are plenty of options for all types of people. DLC is addictive and affordable. Overall great game.TL DRRead the damn review pleb.

514 hrs at the time of review. So I'm either a sadist/masochist that enjoys playing games I don't enjoy or the other way around. Work that one out. I really do hope they come up with a Rugby (remember that Top Gear episode) or American Football mode of this. We already have football(soccer) Basketball and Ice Hockey and it's evidently not enough.Only gripe is some rubberbanding experienced even in low ping servers choose your servers wisely Psyonix.

This game is just flat out amazing. I picked this game up last year and have been playing it almost every day since. Its so fun and addicting I can not get enough of it. I would recommend it to anyone who likes cars that can fly. 10/10 would play soccer with cars again. XDDDddDDDd

Yup it's soccer with cars.Pros Solid skill based gameplay plays just like a sport Multiple awesome gamemodes covering both casual and competitive Great graphics audio and soundtrack Great base price microtransactions are only for rare cosmeticsCons Don't expect anything mind blowing from random cosmetic drops unless you pay for keys

Get some friends or make friends in game at your level and play play play. After 200 hours you'll finally be feeling confident. After 500 hours you realize you'll need 3000 more hours to be as good as a pro. Have fun. It's the toxic teams that lose most of the time. They tilt their own teamate by spamming what a save! I know I throw on purpose when they do that. Play ranked not for grinding your rank but so that you won't be placed with ridiculously easy or difficult opponents.

when you leave a ranked game it asks you if you would like to rejoin. if you say NO you are forever unable to join back in with friends. PLEASE ADD A FIX. I from Time to time need to switch internet connecting for better ping. i have two internet providers because i live out in the middle of no where.

pros 1. it's a really fun game 2. it's easy to learn hard to master 3. cross platform (ps4 and pc) 4. only 20 dollars for a game that can keep you entertained for a long time.cons 1. servers are offline a lot as is ofcourse expected with an online game launching 2. doesn't work with all controllers but there are programs that can solve this problem so not really a big dealoveral a really great game and i'll be playing this for a long time i'm sure.

MatchMaking is ed up... I once played against 4 levels above me then 3 levels below so as people can be boosted easily since there is no cap for ranked that play together so... I even once won twice then lost 1 and got demoted 0.0 Anything else is awesome so 7/10 When they will change a bit the matchmaking it will be 10/10

The amount of hours I could put into this game..... Seriously if you want to play a sports game that is arcade y and extremely fun choose Rocket League. This is a game I can always rely on and will never get old whether I'm playing by myself or with friends.

"This is the most incredible well polished and addicting game ever. So many game modes and the new drop shot mode is amazing for fine tuning your air game. Ranking system has come a long way and for someone who has a hard time sticking to a game and despite getting frustrated at climbing the ladder I will always come back to Rocket league. Buy this game amazing ""bang per buck"" value here. Keep up the great work Devs."

"So a while ago my brother got a computer and got this stupid game called ""rocket league"" but little did i know that that stupid game would come to take up 277 hours of my life. This is the best game in the world. Look up best in the dictionary and you will see a picture of rocket league. Download this game immediatly!!Update 11/23/17 Still the best!! 460 hours in SOOO MUCH FUN!!"

Very great game the way this game exploded from a game that no one new about (super sonic rocket powered) that no one really knew about to Rocket League its pretty amazing how much Psyonix has changed the graphics in this game and made it cheap r8 10/10 m8.....

AMAZING GAME!!!!!!However the matchmaking is SOOOOOOOO ED UP!You're teammates that get matched with you play like they just started the game thus preventing you from being able to rank up any higher than you are. The only way around that is to find someone to play with all the time who makes a good team with you.

game is good though ranked is full of entitled little kids that think they own the servers...these servers require clensing of those entitled punk kids..but other than that its a great game expect to be raged at for playing normaly in every match you join... Enjoy

Cons Why aren't the cars female it's 2017 Where are the cars eyes I thought this was like my favourite movie Cars 2 Where's the story Why so many Hd graphics too much I can't concentrate on the game Ranking system is rigged I keep scoring own goals Overall good game 9/10 would recommend again

Great game overall. Having so much fun after just a few days. Extra note for Mac users don't worry about the hardware requirements the description says you need a 2.4 GHz processor and 8 GB of RAM but I'm running it with a 1.6GHz processor and 4GB of RAM and it works perfectly.

When I first looked at the game I didn't know how fun a game of soccer would be. But now this is one of my go to games when I do not know what to play. It combines cars with soccer. Highly suggest picking this game up if you are interested in trying something new.

Product received for free. I hate driving games.I hate sports games.I love Rocket League quite what the mix of content is that makes it so appealing I'm really not sure and had I not got this as a freebie when buying Steam Link I'd never have played it... but 1000 hours later it's the game I hate to love.

I recommend this game to literally everybody . It's fun to play it in a casual way and it's very challenging to try getting better . The dev are doing a great job . Almost 0 bug . A lot of customization . Many dlc but it's not helping you in game ( not in the pay2win style ) .

A successful marriage of football and racing this game offers fast paced action and tactical considerations all along. Controls require a bit of training but the tutorials are fine and the league system eases the player gradually into the most complex maneuvers. Graphics are sweet replays are real eye candy! There a lots of single and multiplayer modes to choose...Start this game at the same time with your friends to make sure you are all on the same skill rank and enjoy the multiplayer more!

Simple game with simple rules but hard to master with a high skill ceiling but there are enough people playing that there are always games to play at your level. Easy to pick up and play for a few minutes or a few hours. Hard to fault this game or the devs.

Awesome game hooked since SARPBC was released for PS3. What they did with Rocket League was jumping on the big plane making an awesome game even more awesome and doing so for many more years to come!Very nice game for kickin' a few rounds after a hard day of work but also for diggin' deep and mastering a masterpiece.

This right here is clearly one of the must buy games on PC. Plenty of different cars to choose from to suit your liking. Before then flying off onto the football field where you can score some amazing aerial goals with flames sticking out of the exhaust on your car.10/10 Love the fact that it only takes 1 second to load the different maps (for real).

Great game except for the ranking system. It is totally flawed. 1/2 the times it pairs newbies with veterans and everything in between. Also the whole leaving a match and getting banned for 15 minutes is stupid. The mailman came and I ran to the door for maybe 25 seconds to come back to me being kicked for being idle and banned for 15 min from all online gameplay.Not a huge deal except for people like me who have a newborn and try to get a game in here/there now I lost chance for awhile.

Best GameRocket leage is the best game. My brother got this game and I family shared it with my brother and loved it until the summer sale when I bought it and got serious. As of this review I have 500 hours and they were all well spent on this excellent game. I have recommended this game to so many people and nobody has said bad things as this is the best game ever created. Buy it now or you are just missing out nerd.

This game is really fun and is very different to other games. It is rare and unusual to see a game about cars and soccer but when you start playing the game you cant stop playing it its that fun. I really recommend this game if you are wondering if you should get this game.

Recommended games are really fun when you get matched with the right people. But know the matchmaking is a mess now and people are nothing like when the game first came out. Used to be a fun community now it's a lot of people crying all the time. Turn off chat and hide crates. Oh right they want you to pay for loot. Welcome to 2017.

Rocket League is a excrutiatingly long game with laborious comes and goes. This makes it addictive yet also fun. Through each and every game you find that the controls will get easier and you will find rocket league more appealing. This is why most people would probably find it more positive than negative but even so Rocket League is one of my personal favorites and I encourage everyone to play it.

I love this game it's a very cool combination of cars and football. You can also double jump and fly and with those combined you can make extroardinary goals!It's mostly multiplayer which doesn't glitch or anything. The matchmaking is also very good.I hope this review was usefull to you i really recommend this game if you are thinking about buying it.Trust me it's money well spend D!

As of 100 hours of playing I must say its a challenging game in so many ways its so much fun and very rewarding as you dont necissarily need to open Cases to get some cool stuff I got a pair of super rare wheels for trading some Turbos haha. Recommended for sure ) (but be prepared to get angry sometimes)

I used to play a browser based 2D soccer game called Haxball years ago. I played this a lot and then I found Rocket league soon after it came out. Either Rocket League is 3D Haxball or Haxball is 2D Rocket League. I fell in love immediately. My enthusiam for this game has not changed since I purchased it.

Soccer with cars that you can make fly. Very percise controls. Good servers good graphics that aren't too system intensive. Arbitrary resolution support. I dislike the monitized cosmetic scheme but other than that this game is fantastic. Very high skill cap yet also very casual. Match Making is pretty solid in ranked play.

Simply amazing game. The possibilities for new mechanics are countless the skill ceiling is high matchmaking is great everything is balanced well. Impossible to tire of. Probably dare I say it the greatest game of the 21st century and possibly beyond.

Do you like Epic shots? Do you like landing on your back and spinning in circles thanks to nitro? DO YOU LIKE EXPLOSIONS?Cuz this game is full of that and more. Holy crap this game is both fun and a joy to play. The controls are a little funky if you don't have an Xbox or Playstation plug in controller but for someone like me who does it's a blast. If you don't have a PS4 you don't have to cry in vain cuz Steam brings the goods to the front door of YOUR PC.

I Think Rocket league is Totally awesome! I play Rocket League because i play Soccer! It's basically Soccer but Humans Are switched with cars. I Played Rocket league About a Year ago... My level is 62 900+ hours Steam Says. I Would say when Your About the Level 60 It's Basically really hard to Level up To Rocketeer But if u every had to Choose a steam Game I Definetly Would say Rocket league. I Know King of the hill is fun but I would say Rocket league is The best game I Have.

This game is absolute joy to play if you have a controller. 8/10I love playing this game with friends and have gotten alot of laughs from it.A warning though to people that do not have an xbox controller for their computer you might get the wrong impression of the game just by not playing with a controller.

This game is as close to perfect as they come. The mechanics are simple the execution takes hundreds (if not thousands) of hours to master.The games are only five minutes long.The matchmaking is solid.The maps are varried enough to feel like you're having a different experience but similar enough that the core gameplay is unchanged (which is exactly what I think map designs should strive for).It's excellent.

Though I have some gripes with this game (camera + controls mostly) it's pretty addictive still. 7/10Update after 300+ hours of play still have some problems with the camera and controls but I have gotten used to it somewhat. Otherwise considering I'm still pretty addicted to the gameplay it's just loads of fun. I'm raising my verdict 8/10 )

There are certain games that you instantly fall in love with.That's rocket league for me. From the start it was clear the developers love working on this game and have put their hearts and souls into making it the great game that it is. They listen to feedback constantly fix any issues that may arise and have made it possible to be an awesome community of both competitive and casual players alike.I cannot recommend this game enough.

"An extremely entertaining game with a strong competitive balance grounded in simple and symmetrical mechanics. Entirely skill based though some luck can aid you. I nominated this for an award because some shots and plays are indeed ""face melting."""

Game has gotten a lot better as far as server performance and the community. This game has taken over most of my gaming time (550 hours as of this review). I love this game. Watching gameplay videos is not enough of an endorsement. You need to just get it and play it to know how much fun it is.

It's rare to find a decent game that's updated often and actually cared about especially when there's also limited toxicity.While this game gets very boring very quickly on occasion I highly recommend it. If you play it it's much better with a controller IMO. The graphics are also stunning. &lt 3

Product received for free. Hi Psyonix I have been in some trades recently and when ever i trade for anything it does not come up specially crates and imports.I dont know if i done something wrong but i want my items back.I hope you can fix this soon Bye.

ive played an awful lot of this game and i want to say this is a great action packed multiplayer game that anyone can enjoy this graphics are amazing this control are an 9/10.(some just dont feel right but everyone has there own opion) i wish it would be a little cheaper because im not feeling the $ 20 it takes to play this game i feel 10 15 to buy. but dont we all wish every game was that or even free. if your really in to this game and you have watched game play and you love it buy it.

Rocket league is just pure rocket powered fun. It's been out for a while but my buddies and I still enjoy playing. There are a lot of unlockables to play for but the real joy is mastering all of the various techniques at your disposal to really excel at the game.Best sports game I've ever played.

My friends played this for nearly a year before I decided to try it which I shouldve done much earlier. It's a very skillbased game where you can easily sht on others or get sht on. Lot of smurfing involved of course as in other games but this is extremely satisfying fast and chill to play. I can basically play this all day almost. Think I already have like 1200 hours. Great game with an insane value for most. If you tend to suck at games this is maybe not for you.

i have play many a nights with friends offline 4 player with this game it is pure adrenaline racing high flying action it is one of the fastest games to pick up and longest to master! the ranking system is very well done and community is very helpful expect some which is to be expected!!

This game is incredibly original than other games. Almost no bugs. We're getting updated content quite often. Many things you can style your car with. Great fun with friends.It's hard you can't use your skills from other games. It needs time to learn.

This is one of those games that can be a lot of fun to play but is ruined by horrible and toxic players in the game. I heard vile and disgusting language especially vulgarity and profanity then loads of racism and bigotry. Some written some said in voice. I simply could not believe the things that were said... and that was before I even logged into the game.

If you are looking for a game that offers hours upon hours of fun with your friends I recommend this game! Wether you want to flame your friends in 1v1/2v2/3v3 or flame your friends and teammates for missing shots against randoms THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOU! I recommend playing with a controller because it allows for more aircontrol but keyboard and mouse do the job just the same. But seriously give this game a shot...you'll love it!

"When my friend told me to buy this game. I knew it was going to be good.Especially after watching Dunkey play it. But I had no Idea it would bring back all thosememories from playing soccer from middle school and high school. It has to be for sentimentle reasons but this game is really hard to put down. Much betterthan I would have expected it to have been. It's my nominee for the 2017 ""Better than Expected"" Reward."

"This game is unlike any other where there are clear differences in skill level when playing online opponents. Unlike other multi player experiences you can still have fun at your ""skill level"". Update The one complaint I have with this game after more than 2 years of playing is that they still have server issues where the action will not be in sync with your screen on close plays and they will go against you."""

The game is very unique and fun but I have decided to quit due to the fact I got scammed which is my fault. But after being scammed I feel like I don't need to play or the fact it's not fun enough anymore/enjoyable anymore the game is really fun and addicting tho would definitely recommend D

Amazing game. Well executed easy to learn difficult to master but if you have even a slightly poor connection the game becomes impossible to play. If you internet drops even a slight bit the game becomes unplayable and you're useless until the internet bounces back. Still its super fun and more enjoyable with xbox controller. If you don't own this you're seriously missing out.

This game is absolutely amazing! It is endless hours of fun and when playing with friends it is absolutely hilarious. Lot's of cool customization before DLC and even if you buy the DLC it's nice and cheap. 100% worth the cost! The one and only thing I wish though is that they add more types of cars but I'm sure eventually they will have more to choose from.

I had been playing this game for 4 months before I quit. I loved it so much but the game just got so repetitive and stale that I got so bored playing the game I didn't log into my Steam for a week. It's an amazing game with a really cool concept and a great future with a strong YouTube presence but unless they add new game modes and tone down the crates a bit I see alot of the fan base of this great game get bored and move away.

At first this game might seem to be a little hard to play but when you get used to it you'll see great potential in this game! Most important thing here is to have fun no matter if you lost or win a match. And if you do then this game can become one of your favorites. )

Did you know that you can play this if you have discord? Just go and write this in a chat basketball red_car That is when you are playing hoops mode hehe.This game can be really fun to play especially with friends but it can also be very frustrating and competitive strongly competitive.It is a good game overall recommended.

Best online multiplayer game I played since Counter Strike 1.6. Very addicting and action paced gameplay beautiful graphics and never ending fun with friends. Great for LAN and Couch sessions. Also appreciate DLCs with new cars paints rocket trails or wheels. Never had so much fun with friends on a single game before but Rocket League seems like a very good start. Gameplay 10/10Graphics 9/10DLCs 9.5/10Overall 10/10.

It'd be cool if you could customize a car for the blue team and one for the red. I like to have my car look great and the nitro hats and antenas are not helping my car look good in one team or another... But in rest is a great game and is worth buying even more when you have 3+ friends playing

"During the Steam Autumn Sale I nominated Rocket League The ""Five More Minutes"" Award. In spirit of that award I felt this review should reflect that. Rocket League can be summarised in the following three words FIVE.......MORE.......MINUTES......."

The game froze during a competitive match so I closed the game. When I restarted the game and was asked if I'd like to rejoin (about 20 seconds later) I said Yes. It failed to join and now I'm banned. So here I sit with 15 minutes writing this review.Great game. Lots of fun. Highly competitive.I've had the game on Xbox for a year now and finally switched to PC. I hope I'll be able to lobby with my console account so I can trade my items over.4/5 stars for now

Awesome game I play this on PS4 on a regular basis. I won't be playing it on a PC anytime soon though because even on a GTX 660M (which should be well above minimum specs) it plays like a slideshow dropping at times below 10 FPS even on lowest settings. Better stick to my PS4 for now.

At my first glance I thought this game had the dumbest premise ever. Flying cars playing football/soccer? 2 hours later... oh I'll play just one more than I'm done12 hours later.... I'm pretty tired I think I'll go to sleep now. It's a fun game frustrating sometimes but a lot of fun.

Damn noce game. OS You want to play footbal? Are you the fat kid who plays the goalkeeper.. Well NOT ANYMORE!! Be the scorer and the fat goalkeeper. And don't even run! (just run to go to the bathroom or to the kitchen while the match is loading and between the goal previews).

I love this game! Even if you are not a football amateurs like me you will enjoy this game thanks to the huge range of options and all updates from time to time update makes the game a different experience! In my opinion there are all sorts of additives that can increase the fun of the game as a tune when inserted Gaulle. The DLC will not give you skills but it give you options to design the cars and get new cars.The Bottom Line Buy this game as soon as possible!

You could be having the best day of your life. Just got some . Scored a gram or 2 of the dank dank. You get home grining ear to ear so you turn on your computer to play rocket league and have fun but this game will get you saltier than a horse's salt block.

what will bring you satisfaction while playing this game? score a goal?...maybe do some epic saves? could be do some acrobatics that end in a cool pass that leads to a goal? pretty cloe BEING THE SALT DEMON THE NIGHTMARE OF YOUR FRIENDS AND RANDOM TEAMMATES?...HELL YEAH10/10 friendships will be tested

So to be honest after i played this game almost for 1400hs there are no words that can describe how good this game is. Have tons of friends? This is the great game to spend hours and hours united with them. And if you dont have them you can meet every kind of people out there playing and having the same common things you love and hate. When i started playing i couldn't stop. A good online game is a new adventure im already in. Are you also ready for it? See you at the field champion.

This game is really fun and competitive at the same time. This game has the best chance to succed in and strive for champion ships and tournaments because the community is great. I also was a ble to learn how to freestyle and now Me and MY OWN TEAM play in tournaments ladder and stream and freestyle every week! ) I reccomend this game! GO AND BUY THIS GAME RIGHT NOW!

"The community (especially at lower ranks) is pretty sour. So either turn chat off or team up with friends demolish them and feed off their tears!After 400 hours of laughter loud cheers that irritates the girlfriend and mega rage that irritates her even more... I still find myself playing all the time eager to reach the top and perfecting my skills.The satisfaction when you hit a ""TOTALLY CALCULATED"" AMAAAAAAAAAAAAZIIING GOAAAAAAAAAL... it's great."

This is a really polished fun satisfying game with a very high skill ceiling due to its balance between mechanical and strategic play. It's one of those rare games that's super addicting from the very beginning it just shifts from being fun because everyone is hilariously bad to being fun because of how satisfying it is when you pull off some high level play. I'm 400 hours in but I can see myself playing for at least another thousand.

Hello!!! This is an awesome game and it is one of my favourite games. I like the combination of cars and football or basketball hockey etc. I have bought all the dlc except from the soundtracks. I love this game and I had recorded over 500 hours on my previous account!!! I hope you add even more dlc and can't wait to get them

Very good game. Awesome graphics and runs perfectly on any pc with i5 or higher. Also this is a not a pay to win game. The items you can purchase are only accessories which change the appearance of the car you play in. They dont influence the gameplay. Very addicting game!

Rocket league also known as known as gaming heroin is a game that is so addicting you simply can't stop playing once you start. Quite frankly I don't know how I took time out of it to write this snip. Get it enjoy it and have fun unlocking everything so you can rainbow boost your sunbrero donned rocket car into that perfect aerial shot. And miss. Every. Single. Time. 10/10

I came from Xbox and after having 720 hours played I had to buy this game again. It's the most addicting game I've played in a while and the constant updates from Psyonix keep me interested. If you're looking for a game you can just jump into and play for 10 minutes or 6 hours this is it. This game is one of the best eSports in recent years. 10/10

If you like soccer trucks explosions and driving vehicles on the ceiling or any two of the preceding items then this game dose not disappoint! If you are interested in rockets... It dose not deliver all that much in the way of rockets maybe try kerble space program?

Well I enjoy the game very much DGood points about this game #1.I like the concept of cars shooting balls#2.I like the fact the game can be very fun with its creative modes#3.I like the Game for its Adrenaline.#4.Cool funny looking cars stickers Flags and etc.#5.Fun to kill time at.#6.Love it!Cons *The Servers lag a lot meaing ping would be high meaning u will lose the game too*There could have been more maps and stages i feel the maps are not enough.

i dont usually like sports games and all the fun people were having in letsplays looked me skeptical since in my experience i hate sports related games but this is a fantastically fun multiplayer experience and a great couch game. i dont think ive ever played a game for this many hours that didnt have any sort of campaign. recommended.

Such an awesome game. 100% would recommend.This game is currently 15 but I would happily pay 50 for it. The developers are fantastic bringing free DLC with the occasional small purchase DLC. I couldn't ask for more from them. Great game even if you don't like car games or if you don't like sports games. The community is mostly friendly too.

Great skill progression and depth. Game starts off with hilarious chaos as you learn to just hit the ball in the right direction. As you gain control you start to make crazy plays and work as a team. One of the best games I've ever played. Oh and devs constantly add new (FREE) game modes like hockey and basketball.Edit um rumble is so much fun and once again... FREE! Love Psyonix

This game is more addicting than heroin.Played this for the first time on my friend's PS4. Liked it so much I bought my own PS4 to play it. After 500 hours of playing it on PS4 I found out I could be better by playing on PC. Went out and built a PC just for Rocket League. WTF is wrong with me?

One of my favorite games! In my opinion this game is fun only if you are playing with friends. Btw i recommend you to use a controller bcs it's better and much easier.I used to play this game this summer when my arm was broken and I had to find a game to play with only one hand )))

Recommand it 8/10 PROS funny gameplay A lot of car costumisation Updates comeing every month A lot of gamemodes CONS A lot of visual bugs RL its a bit expensive as a Romanian im still useing the country's type of money and 20 E its like 100 LEI for me.

"Hit play and see the magic yourself. I was like ""wtf is this game"" before ever played it. Now cant play any other game without waiting for round to end and start RocketLeague afterwards. Gives you the emotions you need and takes away all the stress.Nomintaed to be best game for latest years!"

Rocket league is a game where if you had friend and asked them to play you've either made your friendship stronger or no longer talk that's rocker league for youEDIT Just a quick bit of advice to the peoole who down vote the game because of the crates. You don't have to get the keys for them so it's your choice not the games it's all cosmetic stuff

So with over 120 hours currently on this game I can say that I still have yet to get tired of it. This is one of the best games I've ever played. Usally I get bored pretty fast with games but this one just keeps me coming back for more. Definitely recommend it.

I have never played a game with this level of replayability. It's incredibly easy to pick up but has an almost nonexistent skill ceiling. After playing for hundreds of hours you are always learning new things and improving. The gameplay is incredibly fun and intense and includes many game modes to vary up the game a bit. I have run into a few issues with connectivity but it's nothing major.If you don't like crates or microtransactions then don't buy them and stop whining.

A fun game that keeps evolving both in free content paid content and gameplay. A sportslike primary multiplayer game where personal skill and teamplay decides the outcome. The tactics and strategies employed in this game change over time as it's growing pro scene continues to innovate to gain an edge.You looking for a new obsession or just a casual game with friends this is it.P.S. Consider using a controller to play this game.

Rocket League is the type of game you can play for hours on end as it is very addicting. It is also the type of game you can play for jusst 10 20 mins at a time as the games are quite short! It is a game with a very simple concept and i enjoy the sharp movements and fast paced gameplay. Pros They are constantly updating it with new things e.g Hoops etc.Cons No own goal systemNo xbox one cross platform multiplayer.9/10

This game is super addicitve. The new hoops mode is incredible the ball physics around the net is well done. The fact that the wheels of the rocket cars squeek like shoes on a court is an awesome little thing that helps with the immersion into the basketball world.

Fantastic game with loads of customisation good split between people that play for fun and those who play competitively. Good feeling of accomplishment when you rank up in competitive mode. The only downside I have found is the extreme bait to buying keys to further customise your car. Overall this is probably my favourite game.

Rocket League is a fantastic game. It is full of hilarious hours especially with friends!The ranked system adds a working competitive element! Hoping for this game to join eSports!And might I add Aerial wall jumps/goals and full on rocket goals. WHAT A FEELING! xD

Rocket Leagues basic mechanics are quite simple. Scoring goals and win matches. But when it comes to master the game you can put hundreds of hours into the Game. Making it great for people interested in E Sport Games and competing against other players.Besides its Gameplay Rocket League has a quite friendly (compared to other Games of the Genre) and helpfull Community. Psyonix is very productive Developer and the professional Esport Scene of the Game is growing more and more.

Overall amazing game go shoot some ball with a car that can explode others and fly trough the whole arena. Can not get much better than that right?. Little bit sad about the crate system not a fan of that. And the new reward system from season 5 also not a big fan. Besides that nothing wrong.

Pros Very fun game to play alone or with friends. Different from most of the games you see nowadays. Nice and frequent updates. Good community. Cons Rank system better ever season but stil too much based on win streak and not in game actions. No free new content like cars only a fews maps nothing agaisnt paid content but they should realese some more free content as well to balance it.

Very addicting and awsome to play with friends and without.Have you every wondered how would it be to crash a car into a giant football? Well this is basically it but it's a mini car and a regular sized football which makes it technically the same. Then add nitro into their engines and a SpeedRacer jumping gear with a sudden zero gravity propulsers that can only be used once a jump.

Rocket League executes a simple idea beautifully with nuanced controls lending themselves to both skillful displays and screwball comedy. Rocket League also had a perfect balance of fun and competitive gameplay. This game is a must for... Well for everyone really. Doon Savage

A brilliant game to enjoy for 5 minutes or 5 hours. No two matches are ever the same multiple different game modes and plenty to choose from in the workshop. The many game modes much more than you might expect. Especially good if you have limited time and want something fun to play.

If you're looking for a fast paced car game with balls I think this is top 1. Better with friends Competitive Scene Growing Community. All around great game with all major known bugs fixed No issues with FPS unless you have a toaster and banging soundtracks

it may take a little time to be good and all but once you do this game is just pure entertainment i have to be honest when i say i have become obssesed with this game there are so many game modes that are also really fun like dropshot and rumble i highly recommened this game and it is also only $19.99 so it is not that expensive

300+hours on xbox one.Only cons in this game If your internet is bad you will get put against higher level players much better than you and scammers if you don't know how to avoid them these are literally all I can think of other than that an absolute amazing game.

I really like the different combinations of items and I really like the Hoops mode. What I dislike is the people with who I play. Sometimes I play with Rookies (which I hate to play with) with Masters/Pros (I don't like it because I can't do anything) or with AI (I dislike it 'cause sometimes they auto goal the team where they are. Please fix those AI auto goals.

Great game if you dont own it yet buy it you'll get what you paid for in no time. Takes a lot of practise and I would recommend playing it with a controller. If you decided you like the game anough you can buy keys and get cool cosmetic items through opening crates or trading. My only request is that they add the community market to the game other than that a truely amazing game.10/10

This game is really fun but if you get it on pc quite often the servers act poor and you get constant UNPLAYABLE lag like warping around the stage if you have a ps4 or xBox One I would recommend you get it on those platforms. The game is also cross platform so xbox players can join with pc players anyways. Please stabilise your servers as this is a great game. READ THE COMMENTS

This is the best game ever! After I quit DCUO in 2015 I was on the search for another game and then this amazing game came out. The game is all about fun and even if your not good you'll still have fun. The developers care immensely about this game and are always creating great content be it free or paid. More people need to get this game!

I'm sure I'm not really adding anything to what's been said about this game already but very few games have been able to hold my attention over a long period of time like Rocket League. I haven't even played it that much compared to a lot of people but it keeps me coming back for more.It says a lot about a game that even though I'm pretty terrible at it I still enjoy playing it. But people probably don't enjoy playing with me. Sorry! Sorry! Sorry!

I frickin love Rocket League it's the sort of game that's both simple and accessible at the surface yet incredibly engaging and infinitely complex at a deeper level. Just don't buy the crates. Once you do you cannot stop. I am not kidding. I'm having to work multiple dead end jobs in order to support my crate opening habits. Help me please. But besides that Rocket League is truly a fantastic game. I would absolutely reccomend it for anyone who needs an escape from their stressful lives.

I give this game a 9.5 out of 10. This game is exelent!!! The only downside is that a couple of the maps are a little bit laggy on my low end PC. Besides that this game runs like a dream. If you're even a little bit unshure as to weather or not to get the game then you should just get the game because once you do you'll be addicted for the next 20 years. XD

This game.... Friend told me to buy it and I did not knowing what to expect. I don't play any racing games and this is far from it. 0/100 real quick most fun and addicting game ever in the universe and also very fun with some fun with it but it's also very addictive and fun and add me to play better than a orgy with the hottest girls/guys in the history of ever defintly get it asap add me to play it's fun fam.

"This game is 1. Fast (Queue times matches loading and the actual driving)2. Fun (Playing with random people and with friends customizing your car spamming ""What a save"")3. Friendly (No bugs or glitches no lag settings menus)4. Future driven (Updates with new arenas new cars new gamemodes new items)Overall freaking amazing.10/10 IGN"

This is a really good game but don't buy it if you play solo. I have been playing solo for a few days and it keeps annoying me that I join matches with a bot that are 0 5 behind. This is just impossible to win vs 2 other players. As long as you have a premade to play with its fine though. If that's the case you should buy this game.

"I got it! This is one nice shot of a game. You will have no problem picking it up for the first time. Eventually you'll get to grips with the game and will be able to take the shot whenever the time is right. Within seconds of beginning to play you'll be saying ""wow"" to the billions of different customisation options and you'll be shouting ""noooo"" as you just lose in a close one with your mates.This sure is one hell of a game that everyone should give a go."

Its the best game but would be better if each car had more characteristics such as it it has a low acceleration but high top speed or high accleration and low top speed and dlc cars should have more to them and be better than the non dlc cars. Definately recomended

"I will recommend this game but just have to say the quality of the servers are often very very poor. When the whole thing breaks down there is no EU tech team ready to get it up again we have to wait until its ""day"" in the US. Frustrating not for people with high bloodpressure who loves to get teamed up with PSY noobs that has so long load time they join the server 2 3 minutes after everyone else."

Deleted this game because its ing annoying as when your getting ed by RNG ball bounces. Almost wrecket my entire room because of this game and had to change my mouse because i broke it during one match. 11/9 would download this game to delete it again.It happened again i rate this game a perfect 5/7

A really addictive game.Easy to learn the basics and hard to master but also unique in all the ways you can freestyle with the ballPlaying with friends makes my mouth hurt because all the smiles and laughs i highly recommend it to play it with your pals

Fantastic game with a great skill ceiling. Constantly room to improve and you are never really good. Easily my favorite developer with continuous updates and free content mixed with DLC. Even better with friends. Soccer is my least favorite sport but soccar is my favorite.

Amazing game! This game is so fun and i dont think i will get bored of this game. Very good matchmaking on 1vs1 but if you wanna play 2vs2 you're gonna need a person you know to play with or else with random person u will always lose . I just hope you can make the matchmaking better but other than that i love this game.

Great game addictive just remember to have fun (and you will) while getting to know the physics and controls. Can be frustrating at times. Still trying (and failing) like hell to fly and score an aerial goal. I highly recommend to play it with friends.10/10

How about this Every time a game is about to start and I see that we're playing on a standard vanilla map it lights up my day. Because the core game the physics the mechanics etc. are so well balanced that no gimmicks at all are required. Rocket League is just a really compelling competitive experience with a perfect learning curve and an impossibly high skill ceiling.

Product received for free. First bought the game for ps4 and had a blast with friends. Decided to switch my playing preference to Pc and my god one of the most addictive games i have ever owned. The learning curve is defnitely up there but at just over about 400 collective hours im already at diamond level in comp and i feel thats really good with such a high learning curve.

One of the most balanced and skill oriented competitive games around. Full of exciting car models and skins to choose from. Lots of customization in all aspects of the game. If you want a competitive game to consume your time or casual. Get. This. Game.

Love this game. I play it on my mac and the quality is not great but I get a good 60 frames on medium settings. This game has so many game modes that you will never be tired of it. If you play it with friends it is so much fun just to get in there and play a rumble match or drop shot. I would recommend this game to anyone who wants a casual fun game that can be competitive at times

With almost 900 hours logged I'll give a review.This game is simply amazing very addictive and overall fun.I would however like to see more attention to the hockey part but other than that probably one of the best games purchased in a very long time an extreme amout of replayability.

This simple game is deceptively addicting and will ruin you if you have a competitive spirit like me. If you can get hooked on something easily and have no self control then I suggest that you don't play this game because the only time you put it down is when you're the 1st Place winner of the RLCS and retire. And even then you may not quit.... 10/10

Phenomenal. One of the best games I have played ever. It has a somewhat high learning curve but more than makes up for it with some of the most rewarding gaming experiences that can be found.I could say more so much more but the game speaks for itself.It's car soccer but it's so much more than that.

Rocket League is a game that's easy to learn yet hard to master. Within a day you'll have the basics grasped within a week you'll be good on the ground within a month you can fly and then after a year... you're hooked.An excellent game with unobtrusive microtransactions and devs who listen to the community. What multiplayer games should be.

Amazing game to profit from. I did a nothing to something and i profited 150 dallars e z. The competitive game is great as well i love how they hand out season rewards at the end of each season thats something ive never seen befor (might be because ive never done any comp. games like this before).

You just need to look at the hours I have played the game to see if I like it or not.I'm a soccer fan but I hate the physics of the new FIFA games so this game fits the spot perfectly for me. I even recommend it for someone who doesn't like sports but likes competitive games. Pros Addictive Fun Easy to start playing hard to masterCons Paid DLCs (mostly cosmetic so you don't have to buy it)Overall this game is relatively cheap specially on steam sales so It is easily worth buying

As you get better the game gets better. Matchmaking hasn't been bad for me but I play unranked only.They do more game modes though. Online seasons or some way of grouping unranked players in divisions would be nice. True playlists would be nice where one game is standard one is experimental etc. With the popularity of the game you would they would still be working on it ......

This game is like crack for me if I want to play for a bit &amp game for 5min this is the game of choice. I brings something refreshing to the table &amp you dont have to spend the $ for DLC's to enjoy what it has to offer. For $20? Mmmmm maybe. Find it on sale if your can.

THIS GAME IS SO FUN!!! Pros decent amount of modes so it doesn't get stale dlc/micro transactions aren't necessary and are cheaper the almost any other game (like csgo cases) the trading in this game is top notch good or scene easy to learn hard to master much room for advanced learning and potentialCons tbh none really can get a little stale at times though

Aquadome map sometimes crashes game then it bans you from matchmaking for it. Great game but after getting back to it after a year it has a ton of microtransactions absolutely 100 tier maps IN RANKED and just another loot crate system.It's sad to see a game this good become this festering hole.Still recommend the game though because playing with friends and banning the bad maps is still worth the money.

rocket league is fun and all but there's one problem. i've been playing doubles and i specifically have starbase arc disliked and i got it 3 times straight EVEN WITH IT DISLIKED. so psyonix plz in the next update fix the like and dislike system sincerely a fan

This game is a lot of fun to play especially with friends. I used to only play csgo after playing Rocket League for a while I realised that there are a lot of other games on Steam that I would enjoy. This game was a struggle to master at first after messing with the controls for a bit I got the hang of it pretty smoothly. D

Rocket League is an excellent multiplayer game that envokes competitive gameplay and a fun environment with friends. The game mechanics are good and once mastered makes for a great gaming experience. If you play in the online matchmaking the community can be quite salty. Thankfully the developers have implemented a new system to deal with this. So far it looks to be rooting out the riff raff. I highly recommend this game to anyone of any age. Its a great time.

When i first was about buy this game I was unsure wether or not i should buy this game. the game looked fun and all but I didn't know wether or not I was gonna play it all that much but I thought who give a crap so I did and that I don't regret at all i play this game all the time daily and i have so much fun doing so.1.Competitive2.Hard but easy to learn3.Good communityI think you should go and buy this right now cuz its high on my list and on many others

There's so much about this game that's perfect. The graphics are some of the best from an indie the gameplay has that uniqueness where you can't hate it (I hate playing football and FIFA games) the community PR at Psyonix is the best I have seen and I have clocked near 300 hours and regretted none of it because of the sheer replayability and fun of it.

Absolutely love this game hours and hours of fun...even better with friends! The exhibition games are great and when you want a bit more of a challenge the ranked matches will get you playing against people with higher skill.No complaints at all. 10/10.

This game is hard to see how it could be so popular to somebody who hasn t played it before. I was one of those people. I was finally convince to buy the and it was probably the best decision of my life. Love this game. Never played a game that is so frustrating...

The game is really good. Be prepared it has a steep learning curve. At the start you struggle to hit the ball but once you get the hang of it you get improved every day and end up doing incredible air goals. It's a very fun game especially playing with your friends. Totally a must buy!

Rockets cars &amp balls. Able to whack the ball for 5 minutes per game. Would recommend this game even though the learning curve is a bit steep.I like cars I dislike balls. Being able to whack the balls makes this a must buy for any year after its release date.

I've spent over 600 hours on this game and I'm still enjoying it. The new crates cars and updates keep this game interesting. I find the occasional toxic player every few games (just mute them) but that comes with all competitive games. The learning curve for this game might make this game frustrating but if you put time and effort. You'll for sure have endless hours of playing this addictive fun game. Defiantly try it out!

Great game reminds me of the addiction I had to FIFA 13 (until FIFA went bad).Too bad about the current server issues but I'm sure it will be fixed soon. I don't believe the creators thought that there would be 60k concurrent users at any point in time and it's hard to blame them for that!

This game never gets old. Everything about it feels amazing the controls the gameplay the graphics it's all so finely tuned and with its incredible deep depth of skill and addictive competitive matches this game will be sure to break your sleeping schedule but don't worry it's worth it

Gameplay is super fun and addictive and somehow actually feels more like playing soccer than the FIFA games and I *LOVE* the FIFA games. Very easy to pick up challenge gradient is well done and it's hilarious. I highly recommend for either casual or hardcore gamers. I just can't decide if this is the best dumb game ever or the dumbest best game ever haha.

This game has to be the most addicting game ever. As soon as I started playing my friends and I never put down our controller for a good week. The multiplayer ranking honestly isn't very good and the algorithm behind ranking up or down seems to still have issues. Though seems to be improving over time and the game is being updated constantly.

This is a really fun game to play with friends and strangers.WHAT I LIKE Very addictive great gameplay &amp very intuitive controls and UI.WHAT I DON'T LIKE You need to buy some DLC to be able to complete all the base achievements which is sneaky and not necessary if you trust your game as a development company. Also there is no LAN mode and that always sucks.

Best game I've played in a long time. First of all it was pretty hard to get started hit some balls jump in the wrong direction and so on. First you have to get started with the basics don't even think about earials. But after some hours you can fly like a boss.

9/10 Very much would recomend this game this game is very fun when your bored of something this game actually made me quit minecraft and ive been playing minecraft for 3 years but the only thing that theres a problem but this happens rarely sometime my rank get de promo or de division But they happen rarely but still would recomend this game alot of fun A+

this game is probaly one of the funiest games i've played in a long time now and for $20 it's a great deal and far better than playstation and xbox version becasue you pay for it and donwload then play instead of having to pay for psn or xbox live and can run on almost any pc at the lowest settings so i would recommend this game for anyone who would want spend to much for a game and not be fun at all

Well this game has no problem with me... this game let me do freestyles and not like an ordinary soccer game like PES or FIFA... they run like a s**t and how fool i want to play that silly game... i can't do anything on that soccer game untill i found this amazing game! this game made me feel more challanged and intense because of the saving the ball... The point is this game is perfect amazing graphics awesome gamplay and no doubts about the game! AMAZINGLY AWESOME!!!

This game is one of a kind true gem. It's one of the very few games in my library that I go back to every single day just to play for fun alone or with some friends. I can tell you now that if you really want this game but don't know if you should buy it full price listen to these next two words very carefully... BUY IT. At $20 this game is a must have even more should it go on sale (which is pretty common as it has been on sale numerous times recently.

It's one of those games where it's easy to play but hard to master everything in the game is extremely creative and it's quite action packed you can sometimes feel yourself leaning forward to hit the ball in the game. And let's not get started on the mutators and playing with friends it is the most fun a person can have with friends Overall I think it is an absolutely FANTASTIC game and would recommend it to anyone and everyone.

Pretty fun and awesome game is a lot more challenging that it looks like. Almost no one at the start knows this but the best part of the game is the secret trading game. A lot more fun and more adrenaline than the actual game because trading is good trading is life. 10/10 would trade again those sweets nitro crates.

"It remembers me of a game called ""Road Trip Adventure"" that I used to play with my PS2 that had a mode that was similar to this game where you could play a football match with your car. Rocket League makes me feel so nostalgic but I also have a lot of fun playing it it is so well designed and the coolest thing is that they keep creating new content so it never gets old."

I'm decent at football.I'm decent at remote control cars.I'm terrible at Rocket League.Very good game only downside is that teams are often unfair with all the pros on the other team and my team is full of bots and people who are terrible (me).Definitely worth the money for this.

Hell yes I recommend this game. Rocket League does have an extremely high skill cap as you can do aerials but with some practice you'll get there! If you're thinking you'll only have a quick few minutes to play a game each match is about 5 minutes. Never ending fun! I would buy this again if I need to!

I got this game for free on PS plus. I like it so much I bought it on steam. I dont like where they have taken the game in terms of micro transactions but I guess they have to make money and I dont have to buy anything I dont want. If you want a game with flying cars and football you have found it. Buy it now. Buy it. Come on. Get it. Its real good.

This game is the only game that continuously have given my hart going adrenaline pumping and sweat pouring from the first time starting the game up to now 80 hours into it. Exciting easy to get into hard to master and mentally/almost physical demanding game. I never thoguht I would love this game as much as I do. 11/10

You drive flying rocket cars into soccer balls to score goals. Beautifully simple deceptively complex. So so so so much fun. Just buy it.Also the developer continues to push out awesome free updates and the eSports scene is burgeoning. It is 100% worth your time to play this game.

At first I was skeptical as to the depth of strategy in this game however my doubts were soon to be revealed as nonreal. At the surface Rocket League may appear to just be car soccer but the level of nuance packaged throughout is insane. Features in the game such as customizable cars boosts toppers (hats) and more all add to the amount of playability and replayability in this game. 10/10 would put hundreds more hours into this game.

What is this game?Soccer? Rocket cars? Insane fun? Weird People way too good for the League? Yeah it's all that and much more! This game can't be described but it's so much fun. Fast paced game Simple to pickup but very hard to master. A lot of customization Lots of mods and constant update Esay to lose track of time while playing.If you do not have it in your library by now what are you waiting for? At this price you won't find many games that fun.

The most fun game if you put some time and effort into it.Whether you just play casual or grind you way up all the way to grand champ theres something for everyone. The devs always listen to the community. New content is added frequently and it just never gets boring. Even if you are not into soccer you might still enjoy this game a whole lot.

There is a bit of a grind to get better but the community is suprisingly understanding. There may be trolls but it's not too toxic. I recommend finding a friend to play with that makes it way more fun. Overall it's an outstanding game which you can put many hours into and have fun.

One of the best purchases I've made regarding videogames. The skill ceiling for this game has so much room for growth that there's always a reason to come back and get better. Finding a game has never been a struggle nor has joining a game with friends. One of the only faults I can think of is that you'll run into the occasional salty online but that really doesn't stop the game from being a solid functional experience.Overall I think it was worth every penny 10/10 would reccomend

New update made a great game even better. This game can be taken seriously with competitive mode or be played casually with friends for a ton of fun. Super easy to pick up probably impossible to master. The amount of crazy and cool plays you can pull off in this game is near limitless couldn't recommend more

Quite honestly the best game I have ever played. Remember that feeling as a 10 year old kid opening up that brand new game and going crazy over it for a few weeks. It is just like that except it lasts the entirety of the time you play it. Seriously for such a cheap price you get some of the most fun gameplay anywhere.

A great game I've sunk more than a week of my life playing it and still enjoy it devs are constatly releasing new content from new maps cars even game modes like one or two a year it seems like I highly recomend this game if you want a nice soccer spin off

Simply an amazing game with some of the smoothest gameplay.Whether you have some hours or just 20 minutes to play the game is always waiting for you.Updates frequently which makes it more awesome. PROS fast games consisting of 5 minutes difficult to master endless amount of funCONS can get a little boring after you have played for a long time always the same9/10

Love this Game.This game is easy to learn but difficult to master. Its a great game to play with friends and by yourself.I enjoying playing this game in my spare time and it never gets boring especially with common updates.I recommend this game to all of my friends.

Remote control cars with jet engines strapped to their backs play soccer (and basketball and hockey). Fantastically addicting with a very active competitive scene as well as many modes for casual play. Cannot recommend this game enough to you buy it immediately.

I have clocked up 300 hrs on this. Easily accessible and great for those with limited time to play games. Easy to pick up but challenging enough to give hours of enjoyment. The bench mark for cross platform support and well priced. This has to be one of the best value games on Steam.

Spent all of my time in game upside down spinning on my head while screeching down the mic like a racoon in voice chat as I watched my team lose by a significant amount of goals. Completely immersive and unbeatable experience. I would buy a foxy suit then wear it and set it on fire and roll around in a field causing a forest fire that will kill thousands of innocent animals and people.

Rocket league is an extremely fun and addictive game that is simple to learn yet takes so much practice to master. Every game is always different and every goal you score is satisfying in it's own way. The game is really well optimized and servers are reliable and usually pretty easy to connect to. There is absolutely no reason not to purchase this game.

I quit other games so I could get Better at this one. This is one of those games that requires great skills .. No advantages are being sold in the market.. You should know this is not a football gameI never played fifa/ pes but I loved this gameThis is a casual game which you control a car trying to fly and hit the ballIf you are doubting then you should probably try first!This is definitely worth more than its full price

I love this game but there needs to be some changes. There should be a much bigger penalty for quitting a competitive match the advantage that one team gets when its 3 v 2 is too great. Also if a person does quit a competitive match the handicapped team should not risk losing a rank because of it. I can't tell you how many times I've gotten a rank down because someone quit and its been a 3 v 2 or 3 v 1 match.

Soccer meets driving once again in the long awaited physics based multiplayer focused sequel to Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars! Choose a variety of high flying vehicles equipped with huge rocket boosters to score amazing aerial goals and pull off incredible game changing saves!

"Absolutely the best Sports game ever made.The skill curve in this game has no ceiling. Explaining it as ""Soccer with cars"" is not enough to convey what a joy it actually is to play. I got it for free on PlayStation Plus and still bought it on my PC so I can play it in my office. 10/10."

Product received for free. This game is amazing. I have over 300 hrs on this game. If u ask me why well this game is addicting and also fun to play with friends. This is the type of game i will never get board of or sick of. If you are wanting to play this game and your firends have it get it. In my eyes it is worth getting this game if it not on sale it is that good. To all of my fellow Rl (Rocket league) players play on and have a great time. pce

Best $30 I've ever spent. Have had a couple issues with updates on my low end PC and net connection but they have always been fixed promptly! Psyonix is always in the reddit community listening and the game is fun as all can be. Did you know you can fly driving a car while and hitting a Soccar ball?

Product received for free. Two words Got boost?Beautiful arena almost endless car customizations to pimp your ride as you like and physics drive game to drive home the goal.... you gotta love this. Rumble mode is a throw back to super mario that everyone will love. Normal/standard play is awesome too. I love everything about this game. Rocket League is promising cure for pms I swear.

I just can't get enough of this game. This has replaced my competitive gaming completely (was pretty much mobas before). The last update seems to have fixed the start game crashing in Linux. Everything now seems to run well on Linux with a Steam Controller.

Amazing game you will love it if you're a lover of high paced adrenaline and the combination of cars with football.It's a lot of fun to play with friends and if you get really good at the game the competetive mode is for you where you can set out to be Grand Champion(The highest rank in the game).

I have spent so many hours in this game. Well worth every penny cannot say enough good things about both the game and Psyonix as a developer. Including all core DLC as free is something that goes against the grain of game devlopment today. I cannot help but buy every skin and car pack simply in the name of supporting such a great company. If you haven't purchased this game you're missing out.

U Like cars games ? Sports games ? Co op games ?well Rocket League is made for you. It features small cars fighting into well designed arenas fitted for all kind of modes available in the game. Like most car game you got boost but what is boost when you can fly with your car. Enjoy.

Everyday less and less players are playing so it's harder for the matchmakers to find the perfect compatible teammates and opponents sometime average joe would get overpowered opponent or super underpowered ones.Unlike the PS4 version we dont have to be friends with anyone in order for us to make party with or trade with them. But in steam version of rocket league we do. And this is another one of its weaknessThings are getting less and less interesting.

Quite simply the best low cost indie game ever. Got it free on ps4 bought on a bundle deal on steam. It's so good I felt obliged to buy in game dlc to support the development. Steep learning curve yet easy to get into. It's not football it's not a driving game. It just is and it works. 80 hours in I felt comfortable with air shots 300 in and I'm still not comfortable with ball cam. Just awesome

This game is great.you can do sick stuff like ceiling shot double touch redirect etcbut it has flawsif u are bad at competitive you're gonna get all the hate from your teammate (especially solo que)try to get a real friend/real teammate that you play together most of the time.and yes i have a 300 hours of this game... which mean i'm still (my average ranks is Platinum).

WOW! Get this game. It's as fun as it looks. If you think it looks fun it's because it is. This game is 100% worth every spent on it and then some. I bought some of the DLC just as a way to give them more money because I feel they deserve it. The sheer amount of content you get with this game is insane. And it's so damn fun. Get it. You won't be disapointed.

Love this game but there are serious consistent lag issues that make competitive not worth playing because you're never sure if you're going to have a good connection for that game or not. Rocket league also has one of the most toxic communities I've ever seen besides maybe Dota. This has been addressed a bit with Rumble as it makes it less competitive and that's not really the games fault but it definitely makes it less fun to play.

Incredible game with great developers. New content keeps being added for free. I'm perfectly fine with paid DLC cars and the crate system as long as it provides no advantage and it doesn't. The game is incredibly fun for newbies all the way up to the grand champion level.

It's a really great game to play with friends! The thing that makes me sad is the community in certain places in this game that makes me look bad or feel bad. There are nice people exist on this game if you're lucky to be matching with them!!! I would prefer getting friends and play this game together for some and giggles with custom games. Ranked is something that i'll shall never say. It's a bloody circus! It's okay but not perfect. BUY THIS GAME ALREADY.

I like carball Who doesn't like carballWhat other game could be made an E Sport 3 days into launch?Do you own this game? if you said no then where are you and why is it not earth.Another questionWho is your favorite character from friends and why is it Phoebe?

I dont know why everyone complains about matchmaking. You cant expect developers to hold your hand. If people you play against are better than you then what does that mean.. Get better. Its not hard and this game is fun AF. Highly recommend. Graphics and music are incredible. Gameplay superb. Cusomization is perfect.

Product received for free. Stop reading this you are wasting your time buy this ing game.Picked this bad boy up along with my Steam Controller not expecting much (better played with an Xbox One controller) but this game blows Mario Kart out of the water.

"Lots of customization options unbelievably fun gameplay and Splitscreen for up to 4 Players. Do you hate soccer/football but love cars or vice versa or both! Then this is the game for you. The last time I played a match with a veteran I no scoped him and scored 7 goals.11/10 IGN would no scope again. P.S. I know this IGN thing is becoming too mainstream but deal with it.

Got this game a few months ago and returned it because people with controllers have a bigger advantage over people with keyboards. Probably the best game I've ever played in many different ways. I didn't imagine I loved the idea of cars and soccer mixed up in one game but now after 100 hours I am completely sold. Amazing graphics physics that feels real even though flying cars might seem weird at a first glance. Easily a 10/10.

Cars? Check.Soccer? Check.Short matches that don't make you want to kill yourself because you're getting your beat and don't want to wait 10 minutes for it to be over? Check.This game is a blast. I don't play it as much as I should which almost makes it better. Bored with what you're doing? Pop Rocket league on smash into balls and cars for a while and move on.

Rocket League is the best! Found it out PSN and played well over a 100 hrs. Now on my PC addition I'm having a blast! Ranking is putting me with other Masters and Experts even tho im a Semi Pro. It some how can tell my skill range and puts me up against some good competition. RL!

After about 300 hrs on record I can say that this is probably the game that has gotten me the madest ever. I think this is one of the best game ever made in the world because in every single update psyonix are giving us new modes crates stadiums items cars and more....One thing thats psyonix should change is this banning stupid things i didnt speak once in chat for 20 games and i got banned for being TOXIC if they fix this without any doubt best game i played ever.

Gameplay is great graphics are nice and the server problems seem to be sorted out for the most part. This is the most fun I've had with a new game in years and even worth writing a review which I never do. Think of this as 11/10. Well worth the full price.

rocket league is a fun addicting game however the cummnity from what ive seen is toxic and banning is unfair you can get banned for no reason for three days for vulgar languge meanwhile my friend spoke more then i did good game but banning system is bad

Nothing special...a game to play when you want have a spare 15 mins before bed...and then you're still playing it at 4am...a week later...and everyone you loved has left you...but it's ok...you don't miss them anyway...cause you're still playing this game.

Great Multiplayer title for little money.DLC is only for bling bling effect you don't need to 'buy to git gud'The Community can be toxic during ranked matches but overall the games are fun and tense.Pretty easy to learn and you improve while just plaing no need for boring training. This game is really fun! Pysonix are really good creators and listen to there fans to what needs to be added and or fixed. I have nearly 200 hours on this. One thing i will say is that the rocket league community has gotten alot more harsh. Other than that its a great game! I Recommand buying it

One of the best games i have in my steam library!i know people have bad luck with crates (me) but the skins and special boosts/toppers etc are not needed to experience a great game like this one which still has loads of great potential for the futurefu*k fifa and all other football games buy this unique 'car football' game and experience the HYPE for yourself even if you dont have any crates or money to buy keys the game is STILL a great hit for steam

One of my favorite games on and completely worth the money. I got so many hours worth of entertainment out of this game and it never gets old. Grab a copy of this game with your friends or make some new ones online DSavage!Savage!Savage!Chat disabled to 4 seconds.

I thought the idea of Remote Control cars playing football was a cool idea but was hesitant to buy Rocket League in case it would just be a novelty game. No.This game has rapidly become my favourite game of all time. It is fun from the novice stage up to late game progression...buy it!!!!

Soccer meets rocket cars in a highly a addictive one of a kind gaming experience. Solid controls tons of customization and hugely satisfying gameplay. Simple to learn and play for the casual gamer but with a skill ceiling high enough to keep players interested for a long time. You won't be disappointed with this game.

One of the best games of it's time. It is a mix of some of my favorite things (Soccer and cars and explosions) It is resource intensve which slows down some computers. I have a powerful computer so it runs fine. It's a good game. Reccomend for it's sale price.

This is a very enjoyable game. It is simple and can be fun for everyone. Easy to grasp how to play but as others have said hard to master. You can have amazing interactions with other players. More often than not though the people you will meet will be absolute asshats. This is not to say that everyone you meet will be a complete bastard but the population of those who play this game is saturated with such people. All things considered Rocket League is a game worth having.

Absolutely amazing. This game is everything I imagined it would be and more. If you like competitive games but still want to be able to mess around once in a while you'll love it. There's no possible way I could be happier with my purchase even 935 hours in. If you're on the fence go for it.

This game got it all. Easy controls. A great community ( tho after the last sale a lot a salty Lol/csgo players have joined)fantastic graphicsOne of the best customization system i have ever seen.many different maps to play.18 different cars to choose between.THERE IS ACTALLY CROSSPLAY WITH THE CONSOLES WOAH WOAH WOAH15/10 What a save!!

It is easy to pickup and quick to become good enough to have fun. However it takes much much longer to master. Playing with friends makes the experience much better as even the most basic communication will put you ahead of your competition.The developer is one of the best in the business with regular updates free content and user feedback. This should be a staple in any multiplayer library.Well played!

I hate racing games and I hate sports games.Cars suck soccer sucks having to deal with players on your team sucks.Having to play ranked to feel good about yourself sucks.Playing hours on end to go from trash to garbage at a game sucks.This is the greatest game i've ever played and none of those complaints apply to it.Rocket League does not suck

I've been playing it for 2 weeks. It's been ultra fun from day 1 and I can see how skillful best players are I'm going to play this game for a looooong time. Amazing game but not recommended for people with low FPS because you will need to lower the quality settings to make it better I have bought the game of the year edition it came with few amazing things I really liked it 10/10. "Ridiculously addicting game. No matter what happens you keep wanting to come back for more punishment. Probably one of the few ""sports"" games I can actually play for hours on end. If you want a quick and competitive match this game is for you. Each and every match is different even though you play mostly in the same setup. Getting that Aerial goal and that epic saves is a reward all on it's own. This game is a must have. You'll study crazy stunts as you see other do it easy as cake. IT WON'T BE EASY AND IT WILL TAKE TIME. But it will be amazing once you are able to do stunts you thought was impossible. It's a crazy game.

When I first heard of this game I thought it sounded really stupid. I then played it. My first experience playing it was couch multiplayer which is absolutely the way to go but if you can't do that hop in a voice chat with a couple of friends and you'll realize hours later how much time has actually passed. There's years of skill building potential here and you'll get more than your money's worth out of this game.

More fun than you might initially think.When i first heard about thsi game i thought it was dumb. Amazing music. 10/10 would rate again.Gameplay is super awesome as well. 10/10 Would rate again. Easy to learn 10/10 would rate again. I just really like this game. 10/10. Lost a couple rounds. 10/10. This game is beyond impressive. 10/10. Love the graphics of this game. 10/10Final rating. 10/10.Would play again.

Rocket League is jam packed with loads of fun and it is a must for any lover of cars and/ or racing. As an avid football fan it provides me with an excellent blend of action and replayability. It takes just a few minutes to grasp the basics but takes much longer to master. I currently have 30+ hours stacked up in about three weeks and I still enter each match with the same enthusiasm as my first game.Rocket League is an all round great experience.

This is definitely my favorite game just because i've had it for such a long time and played it so much but still have just as much fun if not more when im playing it. I would 100% recommend this game to anyone thinking about buying it because it is well worth the cost.
