This game is amazing i think its one of my favourite games i've owned althogh racing type a games arent the ones im most keen on!Overall i think its a great game defenatly get it if ur looking 4 game that u r willing to spend some money on.I also love the features of additional vehicles and crates.

"Amazing game truly fun even if you are terrible. Awesome game! But one MAJOR flaw in matches Your team could be doing pretty good and the opposing team members are quitting from frustration but then new players join and take the win from your team. They should just make the teams forfeit if all the players quit.

"Great game. Very fun competitive and alot of things to learn.You can try to get good at the game and focus on getting better or just about with a bunch of friends whilst having the time of your lives.Suffers from the ""just five more minutes"" syndrome."

One of the most fun multiplayer games to be experienced on any platform. Matchmaking is superb and local multiplayer on PC works flawlessly as long as you have two controllers.I don't even particularly like soccer or cars. But I love Rocket League to death. Even better with friends.

This is the definition of a real game! It's fun worthy of E Sports competitions easy to learn but hard to master with physics based gameplay. I have never played a game so fun in my life and felt a sports like thrill and adrenaline filled sense of challenge! It supports cross platform online play and splitscreen. The music is also really good. &gt 60Hz support is available in single digit increments so any framerate cap up to 250FPS is possible.

Rocket League is like an onion it has so many layers of gameplayer and challenge and everytime you play you will probably cry. But in all seriousness this is a game that was ressurected by an amazing studio and given new life through the opportunity of Esports. This is a game that you will love and hate but the one thing you cant say about it is that it is poorly made. This game is solid and for a game made in Unity it is impressive.

100+ Hrs on it I have to say overall it's just a great game and it hasn't lost its charm over this past year.It's just one of those games where you can just keep coming back and never get bored.New match anything can happen win/lose Rince and Repeat Nice Shot! Great Pass! Thanks!

Really nice game. It's good when u play solo but it's REALLY GOOD (AWESOME) when u play with friends &lt 3Pluses +good graphics+really nice soundtrack+good idea+short matches+many options of customizing ur car+good psychics+easy to start hard to master+easy rule SHOTMinuses sometimes u can rage no punishment for players abandoning a match without friends this game can be boring after one hour NOTHING ELSESorry for all mistakes!

Rocket League is a fresh and unique experience best enjoyed in the company of your friends. The neverending excitement you can get from competing online in unparalleled. Seemingly simplistic at first you'll soon realise that your gameplay can be taken to a whole new level with a bit of fine tuning and a lot of practice. Truly a phenomenal game.

So I have around 70 80 hours of playing by the time I'm writing this and listen closely...This is the least frustrating game I have played in my life it's so hard to master but not in abad way the only con of this game is the matchmaking I just ranked up to veteran and I don't know what I'm facing more rookies or rocketeers (max rank) which is annoying but I can get use to it this game is amazing and I guarantee that you will not regret buying this game

What an amazing game! It's such a simple idea but it's executed perfectly. Not only is the game great but so are the devs. Any DLC they have put out (which I've been more than happy to buy each and every one) is pretty much all just cosmetic additions. Definitely one of my favorite games of 2015. You will not regret getting it!

This game may seem silly and not worth trying at a glance. But It is a ton of fun. You get into the action literally right away and the matches are short. You can play with friends together or against one another or just join an existing game with other random people online. It's socer/football with Cars (RC Cars).. the idea works though. There is a hockey mode as well. Definitely worth the moeny.

Incredibly unique game that is also very fun and competitive. It has a decent learning curve and the skill level from the playerbase continues to increase. The devs are very responsive and are constantly making free updates and game modes. If you like video games and sports you'll love this game. Highly recommend.

I bought this gamea year ago played 1 or 2 games then left it alone. My friend reccently got into it and encouraged me o play and wow the game is a lot deeper than originally thought it was (I though it was hitting the ball not Pinch Shots Aerials Wall to Air Dribbles etc.) 10/10 for graphics gameplay and community.

"When I first started playing Rocket League I was satisfied just knocking the ball around on the ground and messing around with my friends. Now I'm 100 hours in and the game now has a vertical aspect to it and it's still just as fun as when I first got it.It's the only game apart from Civ where I have had to alt F4 the program because I just couldn't stop playing. The old saying in Civ ""One more turn"" is just as relevant in RL."

With a simple premise and straight forward controlls Rocket league is a game that anybody can pick up but it takes time and skill to master. Rounds are only 5min so it is a great game to play if you have a limited amount of time to spare. Once you get the hang of it ariels bring the game to another level. This is a game that anyone can enjoy whether you are a person new to games or a hardcore veteran Rocket League has a place for you.

Amazing amounts of fun in a game with such a simple concept. if you want to get as much as you can out of this game don't take it seriously and play the game because its CAR SOCCER and thats awesome! I accepted the fact i cant go pro so I play for fun. This mentality got me to Diamond 3. This game is a NEED TO HAVE if you play video games. It is quickly becoming a pillar in the online gaming community.

Non stop four wheeled action. Matches are super enjoyable and overtimes are painful as hell. You ll enjoy it even if you don t like football (or sports for that matter). Paid DLC are purely cosmetic Solo play (season) is enjoyable. Full controller support (necessary to unlock your full potential at this game)No brainer. You ll be instantly hooked for weeks.

I consistently come back to play this game more than any other. It never stops being fun. The community can get fairly toxic but I honestly don't know of any competitive online games where this isn't an issue. Is it a PERFECT game? Yes yes it is. Buy it.

started playing with some friends and slowly got very addicted to the game as i became more advanced with the game mechanics. Id easily lose track of time thinking... its only 5 more minutes for a game.. then realizing i have been playing for 3 6 hours straight.Allways fun to play and just relax with friends definitely worth the money. Would recommend to pick it up especially if u got friends u wanna try it out with D

You love car's &gt GoodYou love footbal &gt GoodCombine this together and you get Rocket League.No kidding this game it's awseom. You will get a lot of fun. As you progress in gameplay and become better and better the game will become even beter. Then discover freestayl... D.

Rocket League is a very well though out game with great gameplay very personalized and good graphics.The concept is simple what if you mixed Soccer with demolition derbys well you'd get Rocket League. When you first start to play the game it may seem difficult at first. But once get comfortable with the controls and sink some hours into it the game starts becoming fun.8/10

I was sceptical at first about this game. Then a friend conviced me to buy it and i can not believe how good it feels to play! It is one of those games that looks a bit silly when you first see it but when you play it it feels so good. I will say this however you need a controller to play this game (I use 360) because playing on kb and mouse will make you sick ) Just buy it!

Sharp mechanics rocket powered cars and overly sarcastic teammates. Can't get much better than that. But for real the multiplayer experience is a frustrating yet super satisfying set of trials in which you learn to hit the ball from the ground wall mid air and anywhere else you can imagine. At 150 hours I feel that my rocketeering powers have only just begun to develop.10.0/10.0

Dope AF10/10 would 10/10 again.Seriously this game is sick. It's hard to master at first and you press the wrong buttons all the time at the start of your Rocket League Career (cringey ik don't hate) but once you get it going you start doing sick shots like aerials and aerial goals and freestyle goals and then you feel like a god. If you're looking to buy and you're not sure trust me you won't regret spending a few bucks on this game.

Easy to learn absolutely difficult to master this is a game that will actually have you bragging about your replays and saving them to show off. Experience cliches such as taking it one game at a time it's a game of (one) half don't try and walk it in yeah nah it's a team effort and so on. Highly recommended you'll clock up 100 hours before you even know it.

Play by yourself Play with friends Play at 4am or at 12pm eating lunch. Play hard Play Bad and blame it on anything but pure mistake. Play with people 1000+ hours more than you and still crush them. Play with people 1000+ hours more than you and get crushed by them. Play around in the garage creating the ultimate car. Play on a server other than oceanic and prepare to get railed by lag spikes. Play Rocket League.Can not recommend this game enough.

If you're contemplating buying this game stop.Just buy it. You won't regret it. You have my word.In case you do regret it unplug your computer and throw it through your window. Because if you regret getting Rocket Leauge your life is a sham.Have a blessed day.

This game is super fun to mess around with you learn as you go there are thousands of tutorials on how to advance your skill but the servers are not good right now they constantly rubber band and with all the inevitable kids buying or getting this for christmas its only going to get worse fun with friends messing around with mutator settings in private matches i would reccomend but not for the online play ability

Product received for free. Well I'm going to go ahead add to the postive hype that surrounds this title. If you love Competitive Multiplayer games and this isnt already in your library its a must. "A great game where a player's skill not time or money determine their ability. There are very few games that will cause me to lose track of time to the point where it isn't until the sun starts to rise that I realized I spent all night telling myself... just one more game. Rocket League is truly great and one of the best multiplayer games of recent years.

This game is very fun and easily playable. Do you like games with cars? Do you just love soccer games? Me neither. I'm not really a fan of either but this game... this ing game just joins them together in such a way in which the result is much more than the sum of its parts. It's just a fun game that brings out everyones competitive side.

It seem easy game but it's not. It may seem stupid but well actually it is stupid and funny. Every game you learn something new new tactic new trick new tip. It's so funny to play with your friends but even alone. I would suggest it to someone who likes Funny Multiplayer games and no even if you don't like Cars or Soccer you will love this game!!!

I love Rocket League even the days where I solo queue and end up hating myself. The community is like any other multiplayer community some good some bad mostly neutral. Psyonix does a lot for their customers and have put out a great product. Even though I'll never be good enough at the rocket car game I'll always hold it in my heart.

This game is fantastic if you're looking for a simple game that you can start up almost instantly and get a few quick rounds in this should definitely be in your steam library. Psyonix has also been supporting the game well post release keeping it somewhat fresh.

Amazing game to play with friends or alone. The learning curve is great At start is funny as hell as you miss most of the hits on a funny way but then you start learning new things and improving constantly. I never noticed as well as in this game how I was better than before once every a few hours.My favorite game ATM and probably the one on which I have spent more hours since I was 10 and was addict to Age of Empires 2 or maybe Sims 1.

In my twenty plus years of gaming there have been very few games that have captivated me as much as Rocket League. Psyonix is one of the best developers out there right now and it's amazing to see how this game continues to evolve in so many ways. I can't say enough good things about this game. If you don't own it already what are you doing?

I've had this game for a while now and after 400 hours of playing this is definitely a must buy game. The devs clearly listen to their player base and have constantly worked on new things that make the game enjoyable. I love how their is a high skill ceiling but at the same time the game itself is just fun. It's just cars that hit a ball around and it's hard to take too seriously.

This game is great. To get started is very simple but to get to the more advanced techniques takes time and commitment and feels really good when you nail it after a few days of practice.It's a simple concept but very well executed and quickly became my most played game!

This game is extremely fun. The mechanics in this game are pretty difficult at first but once you get the hang of it you'll find yourself scoring amazing shots. The physics in the game are kind of broken but you get used to it and soon start understanding it better so it isn't really a problem. 10/10 would recommend to everyone. ONLY FUN IF YOUR COMPUTER CAN HANDLE ALL THE MAPS!! Some people get serious frame drops on certain maps.

Great game and extreemly fun. the only thing I find wrong about this game is that there are loads of self absorbed 12 year olds playing competitive that cant blame anything on themselves. However that is not the games fault so I cant hold it against the game. Overall I would recomend the game to anyone

I usually only play single player games but I was convinced to buy this during the summer sale. It's so addicting I had to hide my controller from myself for a week so that I could get work done. There are a lot of things that make this game addicting leveling up ranking up the item drop system loot crates trading and the passive agressive autochat features. It's also pretty cool that PC and PS players play on the same servers widening the match pool.

Do you like games with friends? Do you enjoy zipping around in an enclosed space to your hearts content? Do you like blowing up people that ruin that PERFECT SHOT?!Yes? Play Rocket League. Hands down (unless I'm playing) the most fun I have had in a very long time.

So this game is somewhat an addiction. It's really easy to get good at it and then you realize what you once thought was good is not good at all anymore.If you are competitive this game will be hard to put down.Even without being competitive this game is fairly addicting.If you don't like playing sports games too bad buy it anyway.I only have one request I want a 'Boop!' shortcut for chat.Nice Shot!Great Pass!

Oh boy this game is great amzing fun I have playing Rocket League. One poor thing is the players who you play with. Sometimes the can't handle the imaginative pressure of casual game and start toxic chat. Thanks for the mute option. Also thanks for the trading cards I sold them for quite decent amount of money!

This game...It is one of the greatest I have ever seen (and I mean that!)Even if you HATE cars and football I can guarantee you will love every moment.Scoring an ariel can make you feel like a god and it is one of the best feelings you will ever experience.

Great game. Basically soccer with cars. I have over 100 hrs in this game and it keeps me coming back. If you are looking for a game that you can play for a few minutes have some mindless fun and continue on with your day...this is it. If you are looking to lose a couple of hours in a game in fierce competition this game can keep you occupied. Developers are active and involved with the community. The paid DLC is a few bucks a pop and the game is updated with free content often.

I love this game. Very frustrating to start but it just gets better and better.And frustrating. I'm still trying to learn how to hit balls out of mid air in Aerial and I apparently have almost 60 hours played at the time of the review.Oh well much fun and madness strogly recommended.

To this point I have played Rocket League over 400 hours and I can tell I'm never going to get tired of it. Its great to play it on your own its superb when you play it with friends and it is great to fulfill your competitive necessities. I would gladly recommend this game to anyone who wants to have a great time.

Rocket League will be remembered the same way Super Smash Bros. and Star Wars Battlefront II will be. It's that fun that addicting and that intuitive to pick up and play. And like Smash Bros there's a whole world of competitive skill and strategy unnecessary to enjoy the ame mind you for those who want a little extra kick out of the game.An absolute must buy for every gamer.

This game has brought me to my absolut breaking point I'v uninstalled it twice managed to break more controllers and headsets playing it and yet for some stange reason I always come back to it. It's like a curse or a disease no matter what happens I still have to play it.10/10 Meh

I just keep coming back to this game. It helps that the developers are great and keep adding new content for free. Supported by keys now. Simple to learn hard to master. Rocket League is a great time killer. 10 minutes to kill? I load up a match of rocket league. Still a large player base this long into the game's life. Drive your way to victory with high flying goals.

Easy to pick up hard to master nearly 1000 hours and im still learning and trying to get better. Perfect to play with friends and with constant updates from the developers it keeps the game fresh even over a year after launch. Can't recommend this game enoguh.

All these hours and I'm still rubbish. I play this when I have 5 or 10 minutes to kill but end up having just one more game each time. It's very addictive and easy to start playing but difficult to be very good.I am always late to things now. I have missed a lot of trains because of this game. Many dinners have gone cold.

Hundreds of hours of fun. Simple to understand and easy to learn yet deep gameplay and hard to master. Good graphics rocking soundtrack respectable netcode esports friendly passionate community. Psyonix caught definately caught me off gaurd with how good this game turned out to be. And they're still adding tons of new free content and features. Rocket League represents video games in their purest form.

"This game literally is me saying after a match ""OK just one more match."" every single time. Considering that each match is 5 minutes long this game fits perfectly into the 5 More Minutes Award.Very fun game that is competetive challenging and approachable. You can literally just hop on for a few minutes to play a match or two or you could make your butt go numb and hone your aerial hit skills for a while. I highly recommend this game if you don't have it already."

Rocket League is an incredibly fun and addictive game. It is an easy to get into game with a simple concept and massive skill curve. It is great fun to play alone but even greater fun to play with friends.And I mean it's soccer with cars that can fly. What's not to love!

For some reason my rocket league won't save correctly i'll change the setting all I want... And the game sets it to default when I relog in. I can't even edit my car . I got Ara 51 the foam hat and another decal and every time I log in I have Zomba wheels I can't change my wheels or anything and trust the game that it's going to save. I still recomend this game because it's very fun and all just some one pls tell me how to fix this... Thanks.

The game idea is pretty simple but Psyonix really made it an awesome experience.You can either play it just for fun or really get into it and play it competitive.The matches take 5 10 minutes depending on how many goals are scored but either isn't too long so you can play it whenever you have a few minutes spare time.Solid 9/10

I just I've played few hours and got addicted instantly.Very fun game highly recommended.Just a thing to addSTOP ING MAKING US DOWNLOAD 0.8 1 GB of DLC when we can't play it if you didn't buy it it's pretty anoying srsly.Don't make us download DLC unless we bought it that's the only thing is annoying me.

When I started playing this game I was never a huge fan of it. My brother told me to play more often so I came back and started to gain some skill. The car customization options are almose limitless from antennas to paint materials. My only issue is that the cars have different hitboxes so I don't always get to pick the car that looks the best. Besides that this game is almost perfect. Highly reccommended for anyone.Also use a controller before you get used to using a keyboard and mouse.

Probably the most unlikely combo for me to like cars and fotball. Yet it has become one of my most played games! It is very addictive and easy to learn but if you strive for the higher ranks alot of training is needed. A fun way to test your skills further than playing ranked is to join tournaments much recommended!

Takes about 150 400hours to really get good at the game like gold level to plat level. I recommend keyboard and mouse on this game because if you play with remote in my opinion it s much harder and the max I got to was silver gold. Thanks for reading! Go for remote if you think your better at it!

Super fun!! Had lots of fun learning the game and watching advanced players play is super inspiring to only play it some more. ONLY EXCEPTION is to find a team to play with because most random people don't listen to your callouts/aren't a team player. 11/10

Rocket League is one of the best indie games I've ever played. It's a very fast paced competitive game that's fun for everyone. It offers a great selection of game modes including Rocket Labs competitive and Snow Day. The customization options for the cars are awesome. It has a great soundtrack. I would totally recommend this to anyone who likes sports and cars.

Only some problems have solutions Not a fan of the music turned it off.Not a fan of the gambling mechanic to win car customization items I don't buy keys.I own this game on steam and ps4 with plans of owning on other platforms Hopelessly addicted to the gameplay.2 outta 3 ain't bad

"This is a game when it comes to map choices. You have the option to ""Like"" and ""Dislike"" maps but Psyonix decides to ignore the fact that you did. Dear Psyonix can you give us the power to choose our maps instead of getting us ing Hotwheels updates fix your game. Stay Frosty Icey"

I love this game. Ever since I bought it i've been enjoying this game a lot. I already have almost 1200 hours in it but I keep enjoying it. Sometimes something unlucky happens but if you get a game for this price and constantly get new maps new cars and new custimizables for your car you cant really complain.

"Game is almost unplayable on my 15"" MacBook Pro Retina at lowest res/settings I get 15 35FPS depending on the map/game mode. On the few maps that I'm able to play on the game is very fun. I love this game and you won t regret getting it.Pros You drive rocket powered cars into a giant ballDifferent game modesCar customization Very very addictive Easy to pick upGreat with friendsNew items added all the timeSeasonal eventsCons Hard to get goodCamera when you first startThe communityMicro transactions

It's basically the best game. Fast fun addicting gameplay that is updated pretty frequently. In the first year and a half they've added 4 new game modes included 2 different sports and other modes with wacky maps. New maps are free and the themed cars to go with them are cheap DLC (Under $5 usually)Just do yourself a favor and get the game.

Simply... An amazing game where cars and soccer is united in one game. Where cars fly arround the field to score goals and lead your team to victory. There is also more game modes which make your game fun and enjoyable. I really wish to have more time to practice and train myself into the game.I recommend this game for sure!! I like the different graphics and video settings that you can change sometimes when i have them all on quality it laggs but still playable.This game is one of a kind the different ways of playing is unique and people that you can meet can sometimes be bad but ignoring it is best thing to do you can meet new friends and have people to play with I so recommend this game its so fun!

It is one of those games where the concept seems so simple and almost boring yet when you play the game it all makes sense. It is literally football (soccer if you're american) with cars that just happens to have rocket boosters at the back of them. It might not be for everyone so you're either gonna just play it for a few hours and then never touch it again or you're gonna play until your controller breaks (mine did).

#1 casual game on the market! Haven't felt this good about a racer since Mario Kart. Grab a friend play some co op or go online and compete for the lore of cup crowns and raked devisions. Indoor Soccer with VollyBall sets Basketball dunks Footballs stong headed collisions Set up like 3v3 hockey. Boys and Girls this is truly Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket Powered Battle Cars' Predator especially after the release of Rocket Labs! I recommend purchasing it on sale or with a friend to start.

"Started up a 3 v 3 i spawn furthest back as the goalkeeper. Both teammates veer off and go for boost and let the other team have a free shot at goal. "Best game I have ever played since the days of warcraft 3 and halo 2. EVERYBODY should buy this game. I look at every game I buy after this game as ""not being worth it"". I just bought rainbow six and don't get me wrong its a pretty good game. But i just doint see the value of the game being there. 20 bucks for an amazingly polished game with such a high skill ceiling. BUY IT."

The best game I played for the past 3 years. Really addicting and fun! I played maybe 180 hrs on xbox plus my time here tbh I bought it twice cause its awesome. IDK what else to say except you should buy it even if u think u wont like it its just so awesome.

"Rocket League is an insanely fun game especially to play with friends and progress along with them.The competitive opportunities are huge eSport is present and the learning curve is huge.Even after hundreds of hours of playtime you wont get tired of it because there's just so much to learn.Rocket League is a must buy for any competitive player out there and is good fun for more ""casual"" players especially during sales."

By far one of the best games I've played in a long time. With almost 640 hours and counting this game has definitely been worth the price and when on sale even better. Have fun with friends or solo the game continues to be one of the best competative games out there. What a save!

Okay so I'm coming up to 2000 hours on this and I've enjoyed it lots. I have subscribed to the idea of crates and believe it is a great idea to pool Prize Money for E Sports. Rocket league is the best $19.99 dollars i have ever spent. i have had countless hours of fun and its even better with friends. its sometimes fast pace but its definitly worth it.Pros good graphics Lots of items Lots of customization So many different cars to pick Endless funCons the only i can think of is that the packs/keys are a bit overpriced and that its too hard to get crates.

A very nice game but very adictive... Nearly every 2 months there is a new update /w cars dlcs crates etc. Really like this game would recommend to anyone who is looking for a game where u can have a lot of fun /w friends or even alone.Update Getting the EULA everytime i start up RL idk what this bug is but i would like this fixed really not enjoying it when everytime i boot it up i have to confirm the EULA and restore my settings again... Before i owned this game i never thought i would even play it so much or i thought i would eventually get bored but not at all this game is so worth it! And will never get old. I've played endless hours of gameplay and customization is amazing. This is one you are gonna want in your library and not be disappointed.

This game is really addicting. I feel like every game is a chance for you to get better. The match length is perfect as it is 5 minutes which is very easy to fit into your schedule. There are plenty of customizations options and a cool drop/crate system. Overall amazing experience for a game. 10/10

While a bit ping depentant with a decent connection (and a game controller DO NOT use the mouse/keyboard) this game is nothing short of amazing.When my friends and I play together against others we keep score in rage quits and forfiets. Good times.It doesn't appear to have a skill ceiling. The best players in the game the ones winning tournaments for money are still improving. And inspiring.Yet a new player against opponents of a similar level can still have a GREAT time playing Rocket League.

Incredible gameplay. Looks like a silly game at first but as soon as you start a game you realize how complex something so simple can be. Somewhat repetitive gameplay but the feeling of mastering a new maneuver is addicting and will keep you coming back for more.100+ hours and I am still learning

This is by far the best game I have ever played. It's skill based so you have to spend a lot of time practicing one thing but once you get good at it it feels so good. Recommend to about anyone whether you want to be a top player or just wanna goof around with friends.

One of the best games I've played in 2016. Easy to get into hard to master. Its fun to play for 15 30minutes but be warned its highly addicting and it will consume your time. Developers are great and provide frequent updates. Theres alot of game modes and training options to choose from. Only con for this game is micro transactions but if you dont mind using 2 10 euros extra to support developer then its ok.

Rocket League is incredibly unique hilarious and provides endless fun. I remember the first match I played I wasn't exactly sure of what I was doing. I drove around for a while and kicked the ball against the wall. It bounced off and trickled into the other team's goal. We won the game and I have loved the game ever since.

I really like this game it is lots of fun to play with friends or just by yourself. The only problem I have with it is that my game keeps having problems. It wont save any progress and it just now started to not launch. It just sits there and loads for 5 minutes.

You yes you! I know you're reading this right now trying to find any more reasons to convince yourself to buy this amazing game. Let me tell you this is one of the best games out there at the moment and is worth EVERY single penny. With almost 100 hrs in I don't think I've had a similar experience once!Did you get it yet? Yes?Nice shot!

Honestly when I first saw this game on the store i wasn't really impressed. Cars and balls? How could that fit. However once I got in the suprising connection was just addicting. 10/10 would recommend to anyone even if your'e not a fan of football or cars.

I never knew that mixing my Pre K level Football skills and my childhood obsession of RC cars would turn out to make me good at a game.8.5/10 Servers are fast games are quick easy to pick up but hard to masterIt's the potato chip of the games. Small and easy to digest but addictive and you can never just have one.

This is my favorite game ever. There is always something to get better at but unlike a lot of games its fun from the start. You have to give this game a go. Its freaking amazing. I have a lot more time on my PS4. It works pretty good on mac but theres still some glitches of mac but not too bad.

I have never been fond of soccer but this is beyond soccer. It's a new sports. And it's not just a game but raising rank in this game became part of my habit of life. levels are well arranged which you will never get bored of losing all the time or winning all the time.

I remeber when this game came out back on the PS3. This game was truly the best car game with soccer developed into it. When I saw this game was coming out a was excited and bought it in a heart beat. Everyone who loved this game back on the PS3 will love this one. Everyone should play this game it is hands the one of my top games.

Probably the best actual game to come out in years. Simple enough for anybody to pick up within minutes. Deep enough to keep people playing for hours. I put up hundreds of hours on PS4 before buying the PC version. PC is definitely a superior experience for the game due to easier communication.

This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. Played nearly 600 hours now and it still keeps on giving and you can keep improving and trying new tricks and you still get that WOW factor when you score that epic aerial goal or complete that killer pass! LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE it!!

This game is fun and intense you don't need to spend 40 minutes on a single match (only 5 minutes) like in LoL or CS However needs quite some time before getting used to the physics of the game and a lot more time to properly master the cars the flying and all that epic stuff 3

Game is stupid fun and pretty good graphics. There's a few maps but they all have the same layout the game is always the same except you can play 1v1 2v2 3v3 4v4. You can unlock all of the comsetic content within like 15 hours. There's not much content besides that the game is simple but really a lot of replayable fun. The skill cap is incredibly high some of the videos on youtube are absolutely insane. No brainer purchase if you have a few friends to play with.

All the bad reviews are cause of server issues. They're fine now. BUY THIS GAME right meow or get it on PS+ for free this month. Mechanically difficult beautiful to see execution. With comms &amp teammates for ranked this could get REALLY competitive.

How can I start... This game is brilliant! It popped out of nowhere and blew everyones minds. If you don't have this game I HIGHLY reccomend you spend $20 for it. One of the few games that I find are underpriced. Countless hours of fun is well worth the price tag. If you haven't played this yet then pick it up and try it.

good game to waste time and everytime i play i learn something fun. but random crate drops me off there is no drop rate for crates. items ill play one day for 2 hour get no items but 6 crates but the next day for 2 hour ill get a crap ton on items and no crate. but still a fun game altogther and a good game with friends and alone.

If you like any game with a football (soccer) element to it you will probably like this game. This game is really amazing and I love playing it with or without friends it doesn't matter. Once you learned the basics of driblling and aerialing you can do so much cool stuff. This game is definitly one you should have it is way better then a lot of other games which cost way more

Fun game gets really fun when you learn to play postions. Multiplayer isnt TOO buggy. a few ping spikes now and then. This is a great action packed skill oriented and all around fun game. The graphics are beautiful and the mechanics couldn't get better. If you have what it takes to go into one of the many Rocket League maps and smash cars while making awesome goals then this is the game for you.

I wouldn't recommend Rocket League for those without access to an Xbox 360 controller but they are cheap and well worth it and are useful for other games too.That being said Rocket League is really fun with a great community. This game holds many hour of entertainment and frustration for those who enjoy competitive gameplay. This game has brought me hundreds of hours of entertainment at this point. Easy to learn but hard to master psyonix has made an amazingly simple and fun sports game with an extremely high skill ceiling if you're willing to put the time into it. Easily my favorite game currently

Love this game support on my laptop and desktop are both awesome and both scale wonderfully to all displayss I have available. What started as just a new game to try with a group of casual gamers became an addictive challenge with the competitive mode. It's fun quick to learn the mechanics but slow to build on your advanced skills. Being able to gradually improve and still not be at the top is what keeps me playing.

Boosting around doing flips in the air smashing into other players and shooting for glory. There isn't much to dislike in this game! Overall this is a very well developed game. The controls are smooth the garphics are the matchmaking is precise. Can easily reccomend for hours of fun! 8/10.

I bought rocket league thinking i would play it for a day and get bored....I played it for hundreds of hours in just weeks of having it.if you are looking for a game that will make you question why you are bad at driving a car in a video game. Buy rocket league

Product received for free. This is the game you buy play for a few hours and then leave alone in your library for a few months then come back to again and realize it's pretty fun once you start trying to really get into it.And it's pretty cheap too. The economy isn't hard to get into either I spent one key and turned it into roughly 80. That's just my luck though.

Fun game!Would reccomend to a friend.Rocket league is a cool game to play with friends if you wanna play seriously or just around! I play both with my friends and rocket league has given us so many memories funny moments (raging moments) and also so a cool game to play just to chill and have fun.

One of my favourite games because it is all skill. Players who are mechanically better will win. There is no annoying RNG and also watching online it is easy to understand and follow unlike Overwatch/Dota 2 (both of which I have played). The simplicity of hitting a ball into a goal with a car is just the surface of what is possible.

Here's a game that's possible to play for 10 minutes at a time but also will keep you entertain all day if you let it. Easy and forgiving to learn difficult but rewarding to master and never quite letting you feel like you're done. New content is added often. This is the most played game in my library for a good reason.

Update is very cool but has alot of bugs such as boost is unheard when boost controlling (rapidly tapped) game crashes unable to join ranked games back if game crashes i cannot see the ranked trails from s4And much more. I hope psyonix fixes all theses problems.

The most addicting game i have played in a long time. Even tho i suck at it i enjoy this a lot with my friends.Sometimes the servers screw you over or people with high ping but overall that does not ruin the immersion.I cannot wait to see what Psyonix has to offer us more in the future!!

Probably the first e sport I have ever truly come across. The game mechanics are simple at first driving and hitting a ball but the more you play the more you can do. To me the best way to explain this game is like football except you are the footballer's foot and nothing else. With wheels. A footballers foot with wheels.

Rocket League is probably the perfect game. Everyone needs to play this.Your mom needs to play thisYour dad needs to play thisYour sister needs to give me her phone number and then play thisSeriously just f*cking get this game it's the best why are you still reading just do it

The game starts off with you as a car but then there is this ball that not only are you trying to hit there is a goal you are trying to get the ball into score points but there is other cars that are trying to do the same thing you are some are your friends and some are your enemys. And hats dont forget about hats!

Very easy to learn hard to master. Another one of these games that you're the one getting better not the car you're driving in this instance. First time I played my thumbs were extremly swore the next day. Bought almost every single dlc after that. Hard to beat easy to recommend.9.5/10

This game is really fun it has amazing dev suport that communicates with it's comminuty as well. It is really easy to jump into and learn but has an incredible skill ceiling. Rocket League also sets the bar for online partying and matchmaking systems.

"I can say this is a really good game It is highly adictive the sense of competition and excitement are allways present it can sometimes be frustating when you re playing with strangers on a team and they play like crap but overall it s a very solid ""sporting"" experience.After scoring a great goal the sense of empowerment and skill is awesome due to the complexmaneuvers you can pull on your car it is easy to pick up and play but it requires real practiceto master and compete.Very good game."

"Every match is just five minutes of intense fun. This game is the definition of ""easy to play tough to master"". You can play it casually but if you are interested you will find out that there are many layers of complexity in the gameplay. You will need to practice to get better but you really dont have to there is big satisfaction with every little action you know you did right in a casual or ranked game."

First couple of hours Think chasing the ball is fun and FLIPPING.Days later playing with friend who has played much longer How the heck are you flying AND hitting the ball.Months later watching replays of first games How the heck are you NOT flying and hitting the ball.10/10 still cringe at those replays.

This game is absolutely fun to play especially with friends. Would recommend and would almost say it is an essential to have if you are gaming with friends. It's fairly inexpensive which is good. Just a tip Controller is better than keyboard. Even though I use the keyboard.

I love this game! You can have so much fun just by playing football in flying cars! However I do have 1 big complaint that I would like if you could fix in the next uopdate. The AI. I played 1 season game with the AI diffucllty set to pro and the AI demolished me 4 times! Could you please make them less agressive. Thank you.

You like RC cars?You like rockets?You like to outmaneuver your opponents to score incredible trick shots?OK then buy this. It has rocket powered RC cars that play football. The european football not the not foot to ball american football.And while I'm a huge fan of mouse &amp keyboard this made me consider buying a controller.

You'll think there's nothing easier than moving around a large ball with a rocket powered car. You'll be wrong. You'll think you'll have reached your top skill once you've mastered the flips. Then you'll discover you can fly.You'll spend hundreds of hours trying to become just a little better to find out there are people than can do stuff you didn't even think was possible.And you'll have fun all the way. )

Rocket League is one of the weirdest although one of the most involving games i have ever played.At the beginning it looks like bunch of 5 year olds playing soccer (and it plays as such) but the game gets more complex the more experience you get (e.g. aerial play).It contains some singleplayer season mode but the real deal is multiplayer and because of whichi can recommend this game only if you enjoy playing with other people.

This game has many personal achievements for me it has my most number of hours played probably the game that I will continue to play for longest period of time and the only game that I enjoy playing online against others.I can't even explain why.But given it's ease of accessibility (you've always got time for a 5 minute game) it just gets played day after days.

One of the best games I've ever played. Wasn't too hard to learn yet I'm still learning new things and improving my game is good to play for 5 minutes or 5 hours no pay to win devs totally listen and adjust to their userbase not too expensive cross platform play...I could go on. Every once in a while I buy a new car they've released or a crate key just to support the devs and for flashy new cosmetics. Couldn't recommend more.

My favourite game... easy to pick up difficult to master and because each match is only 5 minutes easy to fit into your schedule until you realise you've been 'just one more game' ing for three hours!Note I mainly play this on the Xbox but bought on Steam so I can play on the move too!

Well am not the biggest fan of fotboll and i don't really like car games but rocket league... it made my life completei recommend to buy this game for having fun with friends or solo both works! well somtimes.. you can get a bit ragey but that does't mattar cause u can do huge turn backs/comebacks on this game so don't give upp if the oppent did two goals in the start!9.8/10

Rocket League is such a fun game for me when im bored or not. They put both of my favorite types of activites in one game soccer and cars! Overall i've had no problems or complants of the game or anything. The only thing is that the lag I get i unreal which isn't your guys fault. Thank you for making this game! Its amazing!

Its seems difficult at first but when you start to get the hang of it it becomes very addictive. Super fun to play with your friends.If you like challenging and competitive games this one is definitely for you as the skill ceiling is literaly unlimited and you can become insanely good at it.

One of the best games i played!!Pro Unbelievable fun with friends. Recommendable! The provided mutator mode is just awesome. Very competitive Pumped with emotions. You're getting really creative when it comes down to swearing!Cons Rarely lags but when it does then mostly short before you're about to score xD Unfortunately a lot of players leave as soon as they're about to loose.

What a fricking amazing game. I had completely ignored it when it came out as I thought it'd be lame to play football with cars. I don't even like football. And instead I am completely in awe by the responsiveness of the controls and aerial play and calculating trajectories. It's a pure pure blast. Buy it. Also if you want to understand how to actually play the game check out some of the pros on twitch.tv ... just saying.

"I really loved this game. It's incredibly fun and even better to play with friends but requires teamwork and skill development to really get ""good"" at the game. Although matchmaking can be bad at times the Items that you can get and just gameplay in general aswell as the maps are amazingly entertaining.9.75/10"

When I bought Rocket League I didn't have any idea how much I would become addicted and in love with this game I saw one video of the game and found it such an intresting new way to enjoy football and cars at the same time. I just knew I had to buy it and try it out and I must say it is one of the best games I have ever played.

"This game is very very hard at the bigging if you play on a keybored and to set up a controller is so easy with this game theirs no problems. The game is very hard to stop playing unless you get a bad couple of games then you might quite the game as i have done many times. The game is over all fun and i think its a good use of money in a game. AND that is why i nominated this game for the ""JUST 5 MORE MINUTES"" Award as this be suits the game."

This is another game that you need to take the time to really figure out how good this game is. The first 20 hours I thought it was soccor with cars then I watched someone score an areal goal and I found that there is another demension of this game that I had not realized. There is the ground game and the air game and you need to be good at both.

Best original indie title ever! This matchmaking system is the best. I love there is a casual that people actually try in and a comp that people don't troll in. This game is fun and hard to master and I love it the only thing is I can only play about 10 games then I get bored but absolute blast.ProsFun GrindyGood online communityNice pro sceneCons10 game cap9.2/10

Gosh this is a great game!I'm that guy that hops around from game to game often leaving some for good but somehow someway Rocket League has kept my attention. The game is easy to learn but hard hard to master. There's so much skill involved and none of that Pay to Win crap. The more skilled you are the better you will play and the more you will win. That's all to it. Graphics are awesome shame that I can't enjoy that (my computer is a potato). Hope you enjoy it! JARVIS

This game is easily one of my favorites! The game devs care about their game and are always releasing content. The graphics are good and aren't really that hard on the pc. The most fun you will have is when you play with friends online. It's really satisfying when you do great plays with your team mates. This game is worth the money and is a must have!

Super fun. It's a simple fast paced game that is easy to get addicted to. The gameplay is smooth the cars and maps are cool and overall it's just a fun experience. Good online play everything is evenly matched and there is no pay to win BS. Sort of has the feel of older N64 type games in a good way.

Besides the selling price continuous and varied entertainment is much older and repetitive fun ensured with friends in the team. Keep it up you are demonstrating how to turn on a game but that you do not abandon the user who has already bought the game but rather you continue to work for him by creating an increasingly large community.

Fantastic change of pace from strategy and shooters. Play hockey offline for a nice casual game or fly around in ranked for a crazy intense 5 minutes.The match making is easily the best in any game at every level you'll play people who are a challenge but against who you can definitely win.

Rocket league is like rockets on steroids. No football rockets on steroids but in the form of an RC car with jet turbines and really shoddy suspension.This game is absolutely fantastic great by yourself even better with a couple mates. Enough customisation to keep you going forever. Would absolutely recommend it.9/10

Really fun game. My only issue is that servers seemed to get worse over time for me. I used to jump on any server and I'd have a good time. Now it takes forever to find a match and it'll lag alot. My PC is not the issue here. Nor is my fast 100mbps connection. Make sure you filter to only your region or u may face the same problems as me

Truly the king of flying car soccer games.Kind of like playing a real sport no memorizing engine quirks or keeping up with the latest meta or anything just you the controller and the ability to read the ball and opposition to put the ball into the net. Review brought to you by the Steam Awards 2016/Steam Autumn Sale.

Rocket league is an incredible game to both play by yourself or with a group of friends. As it developed they added countless new aspects to improve the game (not that it needed it). Although the game can get boring to play by yourself for long periods of time you could always grab a friend and play for hours at a time XD

Addictive. Rocket League is hard to explain really. Going in it seemed dumb to me but popular. I got sucked in. They keep adding more game modes over time which is cool. I'm at 635hours and I don't think I'll stop playing anytime soon. I don't even think I'm really all that good. Fun adddictive game.

Probably my favorite Steam game so far.Recommending this to all audiences fun asf with friends insane graphics fast paced takes a bit time to get used to everything but ends up being very satisfactory. Playable for hours upon hours multiple servers for all people around the world community might be a bit toxic but a portion of it is still decent..Many cars to choose from and hundreds of items to decorate yourself with.Highly recommended.

One of the most enjoyable games to play. It takes some time to get the hang of it especially when it comes to aerials but this has been one of my go to games for awhile now. Psyonix has done a great job with their continued work on this game and it should be taken as a perfect example of what a developer should do. I look forward to see what else they add and I know that I'll keep coming back to this game for awhile.

It's a MUST! Suggest to buy without expansion.Best arcade sports game ever. Fun to play with friends the community is generally polite and it's a challeging game. All cars react the same only visual changes. So you don't need to buy any expansion because standard game allows you to play on every maps. Low cost game but fun as f#$%!See you on field!

This game has a huge skill curve At least for me. I've played I've think over 250 hours and i still suck. But it's really worth the money The DLC is always optional and doesn't inhibit you from enjoying the game in any way. Cosmetic items are given after playtime and there is by my knowledge no market for items other than micro transactions and a thriving trading community.

Amazing game. There is great competitive gameplay when you want it and ridiculous fun new game modes that come out every few months for free. Even after a year while most of the novelty has worn off I still want to play competitive Rocket League every day. It's a sports game like no other with a very high skill cap as well. Highly recommended!

I used to play Rocket League all the time on PS4 and thought I would switch to PC. The change seemed drastic everything was smoother faster and just overall better! I recommend this game but the skill gap is large. If you are a dedicated player and ready to learn get this game.

Don't have much to say about Rocket League other than that it is very good I have played a lot of it and I'm continually impressed by all the post launch support the devs have given and continue to give this game. Also most of the players I've played with and against in matchmaking have been suprisingly nice and non toxic folks which is rare to see in a competitive online game.

I have played rocket league on xbox for more than 9 months now and it is by far the most fun i have ever had playing a game. I reccomend this game to anyone who doesn't mind being bad and actually wants to strive to get better at something and try something new great game 5/5 play everyday.

I have played this game for a year and learned a lot of mechanics behind it. at the beginning as it is with most games it is a challenge to learn the controls and get better. There are scammers and toxic players so be warned but it is an overall fun game. You coyuld get a freind and grind in competetive online games or play with a reandom person or if you desire play online casual games with no concequences and just have fun. 5 star game 10/10 and they update it a lot so that adds to the hype.

Very good game! (Must have for local partys ) )I can highly recommend it to anyone searching for an local party game or just for some chilling rounds with your buddies.Besides of that there is also the ability to play competitive games to archieve ranks which can get intense sometimes Really funny and perfect for games with friends but also alone!Already played some houres and there will be more!

I totally recommend this game if you like cars and football. It is a lot easier to play with a controller and you would hit some shots that you couldn't hit with a keyboard. The controls are responsive but sometimes you will get matched up with a veteran whrn you are a rookie. Overall a great game for the price.

Fantastic game a must have for every collection (especially at the price point).Played many hours on this (second to DOTA) than any other AAA title on the market.DLC exists but it is cheap and not game breaking.Had very few client server glitches due to the poor excuse for broadband in Australia.AND LINUX SUPPORT NOW!! D DI rate it Glorious/10

very competitive super addicting never ending and ever improving! the devs are getting a bit money hungry with crate systems but it doesn't affect gameplay at all.. if you like football and/or cars (or even if you don't) this might be the game to try out for it's unique gameplay.

This game is a rather good game for the price.It takes time to get good at the game and alot of people will put you off because of the toxicity.But if you look through that there is actually a good community and a fun indie casual game.This game should be taken casually and not serious like these twitch/Elitest guys potray.Play with friends/randoms and have fun!

I love this game so much becuase it's such a chill game but it has a really strong competitive side to it! There are lots of tournaments for this game with lots of varying prize pools. The community is also for the most part friendly. I have personaly made a fair amount of friends playing rocket league.

Updating too often. I hate that whan I want to spend a few free minutes on Rocket League I have to wait for 30 mins to 1 houre (depends on internet connection and size of the update) before the game will be launched. I really appriciate the quality of the game but please keep calm and let me play

This is a great game to play with friends runs well for the most part. However I've run into some connection issues it seems the netcode isn't as stable as it could be and I'd recommed closing all other programs that could be transmitting Internet data while playing this game. Something to note as well is that there is no LAN support despite the game supporting split screen multiplayer.

"I love this game! It's one of my favorite games ever. The mechanics of the game are amazing and new content is constantly being added. The waiting time when you are trying to get into a game is super short at lower ranks however you can wait 5 10 minutes once you hit the higher ranks.The only downside is that there are a lot of s who like spamming the word ""noob"" for even the slightest mistakes. But if you can ignore those 12 year olds you're gonna have a great time D"

This game is fun if i had to rate it would come in at 10/10. This game can get boring but it is still a over all a really great game. there is Rank system when you win you will move up in points and if you lose you will go down in ranks and it is a x box controller compatable game.

This is the best game for those that are bad at racing games. You get to drive some sweet custom cars with rocket boost speeds and play soccer (and now hockey)!! The arenas are great the music is great!Only thing I wish they change is to have the music available in game and not just in the menus.10/10 would recommend!

This game is so insanely addictive and I'm not even any good at it. It's a great time killer game don't have to get really invested brilliant for a little bit of late night fun or just wasting some time between odd jobs. Blow off steam or get incredibly frustrated at the guy who keeps hitting into his own goal (normally me). LOVE IT.

I do enjoy this game. As a decent player it can be fun and challenging howevert the competetive matching algorithim is garbage. You will end up playing one person who you may beat easily and then lose to someone who could easily be several ranks higher. This makes it extrodinarily difficult to rank up. Though overall do recomend.

This game is super addictive you say Okay. One. More. Game. about 10x and then its 3am and you end up sleeping in losing your job and getting pretty decent... only to be crushed by someone better than you. Every. Time. bout 600 hours in after 6 months... many more to come

i have seem some youtubers play it and went hmmm that seems went ahead and bought it during winter slae and a got a really fun ga me for a very good price. though i wish i wouldn't always join a game that is always in progress but other then that i ahve no other compalins. overall great game 10/10

You will be addicted.I was mostly an FPS player and after trying this game I got hooked. It is very competitive and requires a high level of skilled play including strategic reflexive and practised play. It is also very fun to play with a group of friends.I don't even like soccer but have racked up plenty of hours playing this.Great dev team as well with a good sense of their player base.A+

Wait til it goes on sale and buy it. Play bots for a while until you feel like a god. Then watch any tutorial you can get your hands on and go start playing casual games. It'll change your god damn life. OMG WHAT/10 Would wake my wife up at 2am again.

Pure fun. It doesn't matter how good or bad you are. You will have fun playing this game because if you suck you will be match with others that suck and you will still laugh your a** off trying your best to push a soccer ball into a goal with a racing car. Eventually you wll get better at it and then it will become very satisfying. Awesome game.

This is the most fun I've had in a long time with a game. This game is easy to learn but hard to master. You can play competitive and put your skills up against others while learning new skills in the process. Would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes soccer and is competitive.

Probably one of the best multiplayer games I've played. Hours of fun and I'm nowhere near close to unlocking everything. They're times when I have become fed up with the game however the game is updated regularly adding unique game modes and new ways of unlocking extra content. The game also becomes refreshing when you meet other users and participate in tournaments. Highly recommend buying this game!

I will admit that this is one of my favorite games. However the recent update upsets me that all cosmetics basically cost a dollar... but they aren't even garunteed that are random. AND there is NO way to get them through only in game material. Thats a huge letdown. I'd rather buy a cosmetic pack for 2 bucks like it has been for so long.

Rocket League is by far my favourite game of all time this is a game that everyone must play.I can guarentee anyone who plays this game will enjoy it(seriously it's soccer basketball or ice hockey with Cars!)This game is also cross platform multiplayer game(so you can play on Steam Xbox One or PS4 with anyone playing on those 3 consoles)I Highly recommend this game to anyone.P.S. This game has just been released on Mac and SteamOS(Linux) so anyone can play.

It Reminds me of the golden days of gaming.It's only $20 and I've gotten more hours out of it than I've gotten out of most full priced AAA games.The only reason to avoid getting Rocket League is if you have been cautioned by a medical professional to avoid fun activities.

Have played the game for about a year now. When i first started the community was great and pretty polite. Now the community is pretty toxic (in game and trades). Still play the game because its fun. Before you buy If you dont want to deal with toxic players would not recommend. If you have played before and have fun then go for it.

I genuinely love this game i put so much effort into it.Honest review i would give it 9/10 just purely because of the epic skill required to play thisI personally use keyboard to play this but most people play with controllers as they just prefer the driving controls(Yes handling is better but it just sucks ok)

Rocket League is one of the greatest games of the century and is one of those games that you just have to play.It has some stratagy in it but moastly is about having fun with your mates and making epic looking cars.After you play it once you will probebly get it because it is awsome and in my oppinion one of the best gameson steam.

This game tilts the heck out of me because I suck but it's fun as hell when you win. The physics get wonky as hell sometimes when two people clash for the ball often leading to some absolute horse goals but other than that this game is polished and fun.8/10 would tilt again.

A soccer fan and gamer's Dream!It is worth every penny! It is especially fun whe nyou get your friends to comeover with their PCs to LAN with you. Hella good! Should buy 9/10 will play again....and again... and again....and.............again...........
